text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$引圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=16$的切线，切点为$T$，延长$F_{1} T$交双曲线右支于$P$点.设$M$为线段$F_{1} P$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，则$|M O|-|M T|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;F1: Point;Z: Line;T: Point;P: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/25 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 16);TangentOfPoint(F1, H) = Z;TangentPoint(Z, H) = T;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F1, T)), RightPart(G)) = P;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F1, P)) = M;O: Origin
process: 设F'是双曲线的右焦点,连接PF'\becauseM,O分别为F_{1}P,F_{1}F'的中点\therefore|MO|=\frac{1}{2}|PF'|由双曲线定义得,|F_{1}P|-|PF'|=8故|MO|-|MT|=\frac{1}{2}|PF|-|MF_{1}|+|F_{1}T|=\frac{1}{2}(|PF'|-|F_{1}P|)+|F_{1}T|=-4+5=1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为椭圆上动点，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 设P(x,y)为椭圆上任意一点,则\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}=(-\sqrt{3}-x,-y),\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(\sqrt{3}-x,-y)所以\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(-\sqrt{3}-x,-y)\cdot(\sqrt{3}-x,-y)=x^{2}+y^{2}-3=x^{2}+1-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=\frac{3}{4}x^{2}-2因为P在椭圆上,所以-2\leqslantx\leqslant2,所以-2\leqslant\frac{3}{4}x^{2}-2\leqslant1,即\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}_{2}的取值范围是-2,1]

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点在x轴上,且p=2,\therefore\frac{p}{2}=1,所以抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标为(1,0),

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(H) = F;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;RightVertex(G) = F;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)*x)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n}+\frac{y^{2}}{12-n}=-1  (n>0)$的离心率是$\sqrt{3}$，则$n$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (y^2/(12 - n) + x^2/n = -1);n: Number;n>0;Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)

text: 已知双曲线$\Gamma$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，且$P(\sqrt{6}, 3)$是$\Gamma$上的一点，则双曲线$\Gamma$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(6), 3);Expression(Asymptote(Gamma))=(y=pm*sqrt(3)*x);PointOnCurve(P,Gamma)
process: 当双曲线焦点在x轴上时,由渐近线方程y=\pm\sqrt{3}x可知\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},b=\sqrt{3}a,设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3a^{2}}=1,代入P(\sqrt{6},3)得\frac{6}{a2}-\frac{9}{3a^{2}}=1,解得a^{2}=3,b^{2}=9,故双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1当双曲线焦点在y轴上时,由渐近线方程y=\pm\sqrt{3}x可知\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3},a=\sqrt{3}b,设双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{3b^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,代入P(\sqrt{6},3)得\frac{9}{3b^{2}}-\frac{6}{b^{2}}=1,无解故填:\frac{x_{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1=1本小题主要考查已知双曲线渐近线方程和双曲线上一点的坐标求双曲线标准方程,属于基础题

text: 已知圆$(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=36$的圆心为$M$，设$A$为圆上任一点，且点$N(1 , 0)$，线段$A N$的垂直平分线交$M A$于点$P$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x + 1)^2 = 36);Center(G) = M;M: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (1, 0);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,N)),LineSegmentOf(M,A)) = P;P: Point
process: 因为圆(x+2)^{2}+y2=36的圆心为M(-1,0),半径为r=6设点P(x,y),因为线段AN的垂直平分线交MA于点P.所以|PN|=|PA|,因此|PM|+|PN|=|PM|+|PA|=|MA|=6>|MN|=2因此点P的轨迹是以M(-1,0),N(1,0)为焦点,以2a=6为长轴长的椭圆,即b=\sqrt{a2-c^{2}}=\sqrt{9-1}=2\sqrt{2}所以动点P的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的焦点为$F$，短轴端点为$P$，若直线$P F$与圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=R^{2}(R>0)$相切，则圆$O$的半径为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Circle;R: Number;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);R>0;Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = R^2);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;OneOf(Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)))=P;IsTangent(LineOf(P,F),O)
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1的焦点为F,短轴端点为P,则c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{2}不妨取F(\sqrt{2},0),P(0,\sqrt{2}),则直线PF的方程:y-x+\sqrt{2}=0,由直线PF与圆O:x^{2}+y2=R^{2}(R>0)相切所以R=\frac{|0-0+\sqrt{2}|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=1.数答安为青】本题考查了椭圆的简单几何性质以及点到直线的距离公式,考查了基本运算能力,属于基础题

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-3}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/(5 - k) + y^2/(k - 3) = 1);k: Number
process: 由于方程\frac{x^{2}}{k>0}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-3}=1表示椭圆,

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，$M$为抛物线$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点，若$\tan \angle A M B=2 \sqrt{2}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;Tan(AngleOf(A, M, B)) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 试题分析:根据对称性,如下图所示,设my+1,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\x=my+1\end{cases}\Rightarrowy^{2}-4my-4=0,\thereforey_{1}+y_{2}=4m,y_{1}y_{2}=-4,x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4}\cdot\frac{y_{2}^{2}}{4}=1x_{1}+x_{2}=m(y_{1}+y_{2})+2=4m^{2}+2,又\because\tan\angleAMB=\tan(\angleAMF+\angleBMF),\frac{\frac{y_{2}}{+1}}{-y_{2}}=2\sqrt{2}\Rightarrow\frac{y_{1}(my_{2}+2)-y_{2}(my_{1}+2)}{(x_{1}+1)(x_{2}+1)+y_{1}y_{2}}=2\sqrt{2}\Rightarrowy_{1}-y_{2}=4\sqrt{2}m^{2},\therefore4\sqrt{m^{2}+1}=4\sqrt{2}m^{2}\Rightarrowm^{2}=1,\thereforeAB=|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1=4m^{2}+4=8,故填:8.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左、右焦点，点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上的一点，满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$,且$|P F_{1}|=\sqrt{3}|P F_{2}|$，则该双曲线离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知椭圆方程$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$ ,过点$M(1, \frac{1}{2})$的直线与椭圆相交于$P$、$Q$两点，若点$M$恰为线段$P Q$的中点，则直线$P Q$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1/2);PointOnCurve(M, H) = True;H: Line;Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};Q: Point;P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = M

text: 已知$F(1,0)$为抛物线$P$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$且斜率为$k$的直线$l$与曲线$P$交于$B$、$C$两点，过$O$与$B C$中点$M$的直线与曲线$P$交于$N$点，则$\frac {S_{\Delta O M C}} {S_{\Delta O B N}}$ 的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;P: Parabola;p: Number;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;p>0;Expression(P) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Focus(P) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);k:Number;Slope(l) = k;Intersection(l, P) = {B, C};L:Line;PointOnCurve(O,L);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B,C))=M;PointOnCurve(M,L);Intersection(L,P)=N
process: 由焦点坐标得到抛物线的方程y^{2}=4x,与直线l的方程联立求得M的坐标,得到直线OM的方程.与抛物线方程联立求得N的纵坐标,得到\frac{|OM|}{|ON}关于k的函数表达式,求得取值范围,即为所求面积比值的取值范围.因为F(1,0)为抛物线P:y2=2px(p>0)的焦点,\therefore\frac{p}{2}=1,p=2,抛物线P:y^{2}=4x,\textcircled{1},过点F且斜率为k的直线l:y=k(x-1),\textcircled{2}\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}联立消去y并整理得k^{2}x^{2}-2(k^{2}+2)x+k^{2}=0,x_{M}=\frac{x_{B}+x_{C}}{2}=\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}},y_{M}=k(x_{M}-1)=\frac{2}{k},\frac{y_{M}}{x_{M}}=\frac{2k}{k^{2}+2},\textcircled{3}与\textcircled{1}联立消去x,y=\frac{2k}{k^{2}+2}.\frac{y^{2}}{4},因为\triangleOMC,\triangleOBN分别以OM,ON为底边,高为C,B到直线OM的距离,由于M为BC的中点,所以高相等,角形的面积比值问题,涉及抛物线的标准方程,直线与抛物线的交点坐标,中点坐标,属中档题,关键是将两三角形的面积之比转化为底边长|OM|与|ON的比值,利用直线方程与抛物线的方程联立,求得M的坐标,进而求得N的纵坐标关于k的函数表达式得到\frac{|OM|}{|ON|}关于k的函数表达式

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于点$M$($M$在第一象限) ,$ M N \perp l$，垂足为$N$，若$\Delta M N F$的面积是$4 \sqrt{3}$，则抛物线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;l: Line;H:Line;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G)=l;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(60,degree);Intersection(H,G)=M;Quadrant(M) = 1;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,N),l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N),l)=N;Area(TriangleOf(M, N, F)) = 4*sqrt(3)
process: 解析:如图可知,\angleNMF=60^{\circ}MN\botl,垂足为N,连接NF,准线与x轴的交点为A.所以MN=FM,则三角形NMF是正三角形.由\triangleMNF的面积为4\sqrt{3},则可得S_{\triangleMNF}=\frac{1}{2}|NF|^{2}\sin60^{\circ}=4\sqrt{3},所以|NF|=4所以在Rt\triangleNAF中,\angleANF=30^{\circ},则|AF|=p=2,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x.

text: 已知$F$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右焦点，$P$是椭圆上一点，$A(0, \frac{36}{5})$，当$\triangle A P F$周长最大时，该三角形的面积为?

text: 已知点$P$在双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=a^{2}(a>0)$的右支上，$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$分别是双曲线的左右顶点，且$\angle A_{2} P A_{1}=2 \angle P A_{1} A_{2}$，则$\angle P A_{1} A_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = a^2);a: Number;a>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));A1: Point;A2: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A1;RightVertex(G) = A2;AngleOf(A2, P, A1) = 2*AngleOf(P, A1, A2)
process: 设\angleA_{2}PA_{1}=\alpha,\anglePA_{1}A_{2}=2\alpha,P(x,y),A_{1}(-a,0),A_{2}(a,0)则k_{PA_{1}}=\tan\alpha=\frac{y}{x+a},k_{PA_{2}}=\tan3\alpha=\frac{y}{x-a}点P在双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=a^{2}(a>0)的右支上则k_{PA_{1}}\cdotk_{PA_{2}}=\frac{y}{x+a}\cdot\frac{y}{x-a}=\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}-a^{2}}=1即\tan\alpha\cdot\tan3\alpha=1所以\tan3\alpha=\frac{1}{\tan\alpha}=\tan(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha)因为\anglePA_{2}x=3\alpha位锐角所以必有3\alpha=\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha解得a=\frac{\pi}{8},即\angleA_{2}PA_{1}=\frac{\pi}{8}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\frac{3}{4} x$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = (3/4)*x)

text: 已知双曲线的左焦点坐标为$(-2,0)$，且过点$(\sqrt{2}, \sqrt{3})$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P:Point;Coordinate(P)=(sqrt(2),sqrt(3));Coordinate(LeftFocus(G))=(-2,0);PointOnCurve(P,G)
process: 因为双曲线的左焦点坐标为(-2,0),故双曲线的焦点在x轴上且右焦点坐标为(2,0)设双曲线的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),因为点(\sqrt{2},\sqrt{3})在双曲线上,故a=1,故b^{2}=4-1=3,故双曲线方程为:x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

text: 若点$(3,1)$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的一条弦的中点，且弦的斜率为$2$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Point;L:LineSegment;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(H) = (3, 1);IsChordOf(L,G);MidPoint(L)=H;Slope(L)=2

text: 已知$A(-1,0)$ , $B$是圆$C$:$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=8$上一动点，线段$A B$的垂直平分线交$B C$于$P$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 8);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);PointOnCurve(B, C);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = P
process: 如图所示,圆C:(x-1)^{2}+y2=8的圆心坐标为C(1,0),半径r=|CB|=2\sqrt{2}因为P是线段AB的垂直平分线上的点,所以|PA|=|PB|,则|AP|+|PC|=|CB|=2\sqrt{2}根据椭圆的定义可知,点P的轨迹为以A,C为焦点的椭圆.其中a=\sqrt{2},c=1,则有b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=1故点P的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1.

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点到其渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 - y^2/3 = 1)
process: 因为双曲线方程\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,所以c^{2}=3+3=6,所以c=\sqrt{6},所以右焦点F坐标为(\sqrt{6},0)令\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=0,所以y=\pmx,取其中一条渐近线l:x-y=0,所以F到直线l的距离为:\frac{|\sqrt{6}-0|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\sqrt{3}

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$A$、$B$在抛物线上，直线$A B$过焦点$F$，若$|B F|-|A F|=\frac{3}{2}$，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(F,LineOf(A,B));-Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 3/2

text: 已知圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-6 x-7=0$与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线相切，则抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-6*x + x^2 + y^2 - 7 = 0);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;IsTangent(H, Directrix(G)) = True
process: 圆方程为(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=16抛物线y^{2}=2px的准线为x=-\frac{p}{2},\therefore3-(-\frac{p}{2})=4,\thereforep=2,故抛物线的准线方程为x=-1青】本题考查抛物线方程的求法,解题中注意圆的性质的灵活运用

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;x2:Number;y2:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),LineSegmentOf(A,B));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);x1 + x2 = 10

text: 若椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则其长轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/(m + 3) + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/2
process: 根据离心率公式,列方程求参数即可.由椭圆方程可得a^{2}=m+3,b^{2}=m,c^{2}=3,由离心率公式\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\sqrt{m+3}}解得m=1,则a=2,2a=4,

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$E$为其准线与$x$轴的交点，过$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$M$为线段$A B$的中点，且$|M E|=\sqrt{11}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;E: Point;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = E;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, E)) = sqrt(11)
process: 分析:解决该题需要将点F,E的坐标求出,之后设出直线的方程,与抛物线的方程联立,消元写出M的坐标,应用两点间距离公式求得k^{2}的值,应用焦点弦长公式求得结果详解:根据题意可知直线的斜率是存在的,抛物线的焦点坐标是F(1,0),设直线l:y=k(x-1)将直线与抛物线方程联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\y=k(x-1)\end{cases},消元可得k^{2}x^{2}-(2k^{2}+4)x+k^{2}=0,从而可得x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},从而求得M(\frac{k^{2}+2}{k^{2}},\frac{2}{k}),求得E(-1,0),根据|ME|=\sqrt{11},可得(\frac{k^{2}+2}{12}+1)+\frac{4}{12}=11,求得k^{2}=2,而|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=2+\frac{4}{2}+2=6,所以答案是6

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左, 右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$x-c=0$与双曲线$C$的一个交点为点$P$，与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线交于点$Q$、$O$为坐标原点，若$\overrightarrow{O P}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{O F_{2}}+\frac{2}{3} \overrightarrow{O Q}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;Expression(G) = (-c + x = 0);c: Number;P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(G, C)) = P;Q: Point;Intersection(G, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = Q;O: Origin;VectorOf(O, P) = (1/3)*VectorOf(O, F2) + (2/3)*VectorOf(O, Q)
process: 如图,因为\overrightarrow{OP}=\frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{OF}_{2}+\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{OQ},所以\overrightarrow{OP}-\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}=\frac{1}{3}\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}+\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{OQ}-\overrightarrow{OF}_{2},即\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=\frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{F_{2}Q},所以F_{2},P,Q三点共线,将x=c代入双曲线中,y_{P}=-\frac{b^{2}}{a},双曲线渐近线为y=-\frac{b}{a}x',把x=c代入渐近线中,y_{Q}=-\frac{bc}{a},故|F_{2}P|=\frac{b^{2}}{a},|F_{2}Q|=\frac{bc}{a},故\frac{b^{2}}{a}=\frac{2bc}{3a},解得:3b=2c,因为c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},解得:\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知直线$y=k x-1$与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$总有公共点，则椭圆$C$的离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;G: Line;k: Number;b>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = k*x - 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(C),xAxis);IsIntersect(G,C)
process: 由焦点在x轴上得b^{2}<4,再由直线y=kx-1与椭圆总有公共点,得\frac{0}{4}+\frac{1}{b^{2}}\leqslant1,解不等式得1\leqslantb<2,最后根据离心率公式求结果.因为椭圆焦点在x轴上,所以b^{2}<4,因为b>0,所以0<b<2;因为直线y=kx-1与椭圆总有公共点,所以\frac{0}{4}+\frac{(-1)^{2}}{b^{2}}\leqslant1\becauseb>0\thereforeb\geqslant1综上1\leqslantb<2,e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{4}}\in(0,\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}

text: 已知点$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的一点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，$A$在圆$C$:$(x-4)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=1$上，则$|MA|+|MF|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;C: Circle;Expression(C) = ((x - 4)^2 + (y - 1)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, C) = True
G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/7 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 4/3
G: Ellipse;M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (1, 4);Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 分析】由椭圆的定义可得|PN|=2a-|PF|,则|PM|+|PN|=2a+|PM|-|PF|\leqslant2a+|MF|,即可得出结果.由题知,点N为椭圆的右焦点,设椭圆的左焦点为F(-2,0),所以|PN|=2a-|PF|.所以|PM|+|PN|=2a+|PM|-|PF|\leqslant2a+|MF|,又因为|MF|=\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}=5,所以|PM|+|PN|的最大值为2\times3+5=11.

text: 已知$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的一个动点，$A(-2,1)$ , $B(2,-1)$，设直线$A P$和$B P$分别与直线$x=4$交于$M$、$N$两点，若$\Delta A B P$与$\Delta M N P$的面积相等，则线段$O P$的长为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (x^2/8 + y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, -1);l: Line;Expression(l) = (x=4);M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, P), l) = M;Intersection(LineOf(B, P), l) = N;Area(TriangleOf(A, B, P)) = Area(TriangleOf(M, N, P));O: Origin

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(0<b<4)$的左焦点为$F$，以$F$为一端点、该椭圆上的动点为另一端点的所有线段的长度中，最大值记为$M$，最小值记为$m$. 若$M=7 m$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;F: Point;P:Point;m:Number;M:Number;0 < b;b < 4;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P,G);Max(Length(LineSegmentOf(F,P)))=M;Min(Length(LineSegmentOf(F,P)))=m;M = 7*m

text: 已知圆$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}+8 x+a y-5=0$经过抛物线$E$: $x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，则抛物线$E$的准线与圆$C$相交所得弦长是?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;C: Circle;a: Number;Expression(E) = (x^2 = 4*y);Expression(C) = (a*y + 8*x + x^2 + y^2 - 5 = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(E), C)
process: 抛物线E:x^{2}=4y的准线为y=-1,焦点为(0,1),把焦点的坐标代入圆的方程中,得a=4,所以圆心的坐标为(-4,-2),半径为5,则圆心到准线的距离为1所以弦长=2\sqrt{5^{2}-1^{2}}=4\sqrt{6}.】本题考查了抛物线的准线、圆的弦长公式

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$，点$F$为其右焦点，点$B(0, b)$，若$B F$所在直线与双曲线的其中一条渐近线垂直，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(B) = (0, b);RightFocus(G) = F;IsPerpendicular(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B,F)),OneOf(Asymptote(G)))
process: 根据题意:B(0,b),F(c,0),则k_{BF}=-\frac{b}{c}BF所在直线与双曲线的其中一条渐近线垂直,故-\frac{b}{c}\cdot\frac{b}{a}=-1,即b^{2}=ac故c^{2}-a^{2}=ac,e^{2}-e-1=0,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{5}+1}{2}或e=\frac{-\sqrt{5}+1}{2}(舍去)

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 9*y^2 = 9);Expression(H) = (2*x - 6*y - 21 = 0)
process: 根据直线2x-6y-21=0可得x=3y+\frac{21}{2},带入双曲线得y=-\frac{3}{28}.因此交点个数为1个

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0, b>0)$一个焦点坐标为$(m, 0)  (m>0)$，且点$P(m, 2 m)$在双曲线上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;m: Number;m>0;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (m, 0);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (m, 2*m);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$的焦点,过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$相交于不同的两点$A$、$B$, 抛物线$C$在$A$、$B$两点处的切线分别是$l_{1}$, $l_{2}$,且$l_{1}$, $l_{2}$相交于点$P$,则$|P F|+\frac{32}{|A B|}$的小值是?
fact_expressions: F: Point;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);l: Line;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentOnPoint(A, C) = l1;TangentOnPoint(B, C) = l2;Intersection(l1, l2)= P;P: Point;Negation(A=B)
process: 设直线l的方程为:y=kx+1,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).联立\begin{cases}y=kx+1\\x^{2}=4y\end{cases},化为:x^{2}-4kx-4=0,可得:x_{1}+x_{2}=4k,x_{1}x_{2}=-4,|AB|=y_{1}+y_{2}+p=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+4=4k^{2}+4对x^{2}=4y两边求导可得:y'=\frac{1}{2}x可得切线PA的方程为:y-y_{1}=\frac{x_{1}}{2}(x(-x_{1}切线PB的方程为:y-y_{2}=\frac{x_{2}}{2}(x-x_{2}),联立解得:x=\frac{1}{2}(x_{1}+x_{2})=2k,y=\frac{1}{4}x_{1}x_{2}=-1.\thereforeP(2k,-1)\therefore|PF|=\sqrt{4k^{2}+4}.\therefore|PF|+\frac{\sqrt{4}}{|AB|}=\sqrt{4k^{2}+4}+\frac{32}{4k^{2}+4}令\sqrt{4k^{2}+4}=t\geqslant2.则|PF|+\frac{32}{|AB|}=t+\frac{32}{t^{2}}=f(t)(t)=1-\frac{64}{t3}==\frac{(t-4)(t^{2}+4t+16)}{t^{3}},当t>4,f'(t)>0;2\leqslantt<4,f'(t)<0可得t=4时,函数f(t)取得极小值即最小值f(4)=6.当且仅当k=\pm\sqrt{3}时取等号

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{6+m}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-m}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 6) + y^2/(4 - m) = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)
process: 由于方程\frac{x2}{6+m}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-m}=1表示焦点在y轴上的椭圆,所以\begin{cases}4-m>6\\6+m>0\end{cases}>6+\frac{+}{m}1,解得-6<m<-1

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的点$M$到左焦点$F_{1}$的距离为$4$ , $N$为$M F_{1}$的中点，则$O N$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;M: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;Distance(M, F1) = 4;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = N
process: 如图所示,连结ON,因为N为MF_{1}的中点,且O为坐标原点,所以ON=\frac{1}{2}MF_{2}由椭圆定义可得MF_{1}+MF_{2}=2a=10,又MF_{1}=4,所以MF_{2}=6,因此ON=3

text: 已知$A B$是过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$左焦点$F_{1}$的弦，且$|A F_{2}|+|B F_{2}|=8$，其中$F_{2}$是椭圆的右焦点，则弦$A B$的长是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(A, B));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2)) = 8;RightFocus(G) = F2

text: 已知$A$、$B$、$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上不同的三点，且$A$、$B$连线经过坐标原点，若直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率乘积$k_{P A} \cdot k_{P B}=3$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A=B);Negation(A=P);Negation(B=P);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, LineSegmentOf(A, B));k1: Number;k2: Number;Slope(LineOf(P, A)) = k1;Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = k2;k1*k2=3
process: 分析:根据双曲线的对称性可知A,B关于原点对称,设出A,B,P的坐标,把A,B点坐标代入双曲线方程可求得直线PA和和直线PB的斜率之积,进而求得a,b的关系,进而根据a,b和c的关系,求得a,c的关系及双曲线的离心率.详解:根据双曲线的对称性可知A、B关于原点对称,设A(x_{1},y),B(-x_{1},-y),P(x,y)则\frac{x_{1}2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,k_{PA}\cdotk_{PB}=\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=3,所以e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=2,故答案是2.

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，离心率为$e$，则$\frac{a^{2}+e^{2}}{2 b}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (2*pi)/3;Eccentricity(C)=e;e:Number
process: 由渐近线倾斜角求得\frac{b}{a},然后求得离心率e,把\frac{a2+e^{2}}{2b}表示为a的式子,用基本不等式得最小值\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=4则e=2,\frac{a^{2}+e^{2}}{2b}=\frac{a^{2}+4}{2\sqrt{3}a}=\frac{a}{2\sqrt{3}}+\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}a}\geqslant\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}(当且仅当a=2时取等号),

text: 若直线$x-2 y+2=0$经过椭圆的一个焦点和一个顶点，则焦点在$x$轴的椭圆标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - 2*y + 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),l);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)),l);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis)
G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (5, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, F1) = 9
process: 先根据双曲线方程求出焦点坐标,再结合双曲线的定义可得到||PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}||=2a,进而可求出|PF_{2}|的值,得到答案.\because双曲线\frac{x2}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1\thereforea=3,b=4,c=5,F_{1}(-5,0)和F_{2}(5,0)为双曲线的两个焦点\because点P在双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1上,||PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}||=|9-|PF_{2}||=6,解|PF_{2}|=3或15,\cdot|PF_{2}|\geqslantc-a=2,\therefore|PF_{2}|=3或15,

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/m = 1);FocalLength(G) = 4
process: 由椭圆的定义可知a>c=2,故焦点在y轴上,即可得答案.由椭圆的定义可知2c=4\Rightarrowc=2,又a>c,故焦点在y轴上,\thereforem-1=2^{2},\thereforem=5.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点.$O$是坐标原点过$F_{2}$作$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$P$，若$|P F_{1}|=\sqrt{5} a$ ,则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F2,L);IsPerpendicular(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(5)*a ;O:Origin
process: 首先求出\triangleOPF_{1}和\DeltaOPF_{2}各个边的长度,然后利用\cos\anglePOF_{2}=-\cos\anglePOF_{1}找出关于a,b,c的等量关系,最后求出离心率即可.由题意知:|PF_{1}|=\sqrt{5}a,由于|PF_{2}|等于点F_{2}(c,0)到渐近线bx-ay=0的距离即|PF_{2}|=\frac{bc}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b,所以|OP|=a,在\triangleOPF_{1}中利用余弦定理有:\cos\anglePOF_{1}=\frac{|OP|^{2}+|OF|^{2}-|PF_{1}^{2}}{2\times|OP|\times|OF_{1}|}=\frac{a2+c^{2}-5a^{2}}{2ac}=\frac{c^{2}-4a^{2}}{2ac}在\triangleOPF_{2}中,\cos\anglePOF_{2}=\frac{a}{c},因为\cos\anglePOF_{2}=-\cos\anglePOF_{1},所以\frac{c^{2}-4a^{2}}{2ac}=\frac{-a}{c},整理化简得c^{2}=2a^{2},所以C的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2
process: 解:由双曲线方程C:\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1,可得a=\sqrt{3},由P(x,y)在C右支上,若|PF_{2}|=2,则|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=2\sqrt{3}可得:|PF_{1}|=2+2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知过点$T(-1,1)$作抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的两条切线，切点为$A$、$B$，直线$A B$经过抛物线$C$的焦点$F$，则$|T A|^{2}+|T B|^{2}$=?
fact_expressions: T: Point;Coordinate(T) = (-1, 1);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOfPoint(T, C) = {L1, L2};TangentPoint(L1, C) = A;TangentPoint(L2, C) = B;A: Point;B: Point;Focus(C) = F;F: Point;PointOnCurve(F, LineOf(A, B)) = True
process: 设设A(x_{1},y_{1}),在抛物线C:y^{2}=2px,过切点A与抛物线相切的直线斜率为k,进而联立方程并结合判别式得k=\frac{p}{y},进一步得以A(x_{1},y_{1})为切点的切线方程为yy_{1}=p(x+x_{1}),同理以B(x_{2},y_{2})为切点与抛物线相切的直线方程为yy_{2}=p(x+x_{2}),再结合T(-1,1)在两条切线上得弦AB的方程y=p(x-1),再根据弦AB过抛物线的焦点得F(1,0),进而抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x.直线AB的方程y=2(x-1),再联立方程计算即可得答案[详解]解:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),在抛物线C:y^{2}=2px,过切点A与抛物线相切的直线斜率为k.则以A(x_{1},y_{1})为切点的切线方程为y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1}).与抛物线C:y^{2}=2px联立方程\begin{cases}y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1})\\y2=2px\end{cases}得y_{2}-\frac{2p}{k}y+\frac{2py_{1}}{k}-2px_{1}=0所以_{A}=(-\frac{2p}{k})^{2}-4(\frac{2py_{1}}{k}-2px_{1})^{2}=0,整理得4p^{2}-8kpy_{1}+4k^{2}y_{1}^{2}=0,所以(2p-2ky_{1})^{2}=0,解得k=\frac{p}{y}.所以以A(x_{1},y_{1})为切点的切线方程为y-y=\frac{p}{y}(x-x_{1}),整理得yy_{1}=p(x+x_{1})同理,设B(x_{2},y_{2}),在抛物线C:y^{2}=2px,过切点B与抛物线相切的直线方程为yy_{2}=p(x+x_{2}),又因为T(-1,1)在切线yy_{2}=p(x+x_{2})和yy_{1}=p(x+x_{1}),所以y_{2}=p(-1+x_{2}),y_{1}=p(-1+x_{1})所以直线AB的方程y=p(x-1),又因为直线AB经过抛物线C的焦点F,所以令y=0得x=1,即F(1,0)所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x,直线AB的方程y=2(x-1)联立方程\begin{cases}y2=4x\\v=2(x-1)\end{cases}得x^{2}-3x+1=0或y2-2y-4=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=3,x_{1}x_{2}=1,y_{1}+y_{2}=2,y_{1}y_{2}=-4所以|TA|^{2}+|TB|^{2}=(x_{1}+1)^{2}+(y_{1}-1)^{2}+(x_{2}+1)^{2}+(y_{2}-1)^{2}=x^{2}+x_{2}^{2}+2(x_{1}+x_{2})+y^{2}+y_{2}^{2}-2(y_{1}+y_{2})+4=(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-2x_{1}x_{2}+2(x_{1}+x_{2})+(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}_{2}^{+4}^{2}-2y_{1}y_{2}-2(y_{1}+y_{2})+4效答客为:25

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{m} x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/m)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，$A$为该椭圆的上顶点，点$M$满足$\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}$，且$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=0$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;UpperVertex(G)=A;VectorOf(A, M) = VectorOf(M, F2);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F1), VectorOf(A, F2)) = 0

text: 以抛物线$y^{2}=8 \sqrt{3} x$的焦点$F$为右焦点，且两条渐近线是$x \pm \sqrt {3} y=0$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;F:Point;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*(sqrt(3)*x));Focus(H) = F;RightFocus(G)=F;Expression(Asymptote(G))=(x + pm*sqrt(3)*y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线方程为$2 x^{2}-y^{2}=k$，焦距为$6$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 - y^2 = k);FocalLength(G) = 6;k:Number
process: 由焦距为6,知:c=3,若焦点在m轴上,则方程可化为\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1,即\frac{k}{2}+k=9,解得k=6;若焦点在y轴上,则方程可化为\frac{y^{2}}{-k}-\frac{x2}{-k}=1,即-\frac{k}{2}-k=9,即k=6.综上所述,k值为6或6.均答家为:+6

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上一点$P$到左准线的距离为$10$, $F$是该椭圆的左焦点，若点$M$满足$\overrightarrow{O M}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F})$，则$|\overrightarrow{O M}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftDirectrix(G)) = 10;LeftFocus(G) = F;VectorOf(O, M) = (VectorOf(O, F) + VectorOf(O, P))/2
process: 解:由椭圆的方程可得a=5,b=4,c=3,e=\frac{3}{5},由椭圆的定义可得\frac{PF}{10}=e=\frac{3}{5}.即PF=6,设F_{1}是该椭圆的右焦点,由椭圆的定义可得PF_{1}+PF=2a=10,则PF_{1}=10-6=4,又因为\overrightarrow{OM}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{OP}+\overrightarrow{OF}),即点M为线段PF的中点,则OM/\!/PF_{1}且OM=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1},即OM=\frac{1}{2}\times4=2,即|\overrightarrow{OM}|=2,b终安为.2睛)本题考查了椭圆的定义及向量加法的几何意义,重点考查了运算能力,属中档题

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的弦被点$(1,1)$平分，则这条弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);IsChordOf(H,G);Coordinate(MidPoint(H))=(1,1)
process: 设过点A(1,1)的直线与椭圆相交于两点,E(x_{1},y_{1}),F(x_{2},y_{2}),由中点坐标公式可知:\begin{cases}\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=1\\\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=1\end{cases}则\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\\\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y}{2}=1\therefore\frac{y}{2}=-\frac{1}{2},\end{cases}两式相减得:\frac{(x_{1}+x)x_{1}-x_{2}}{4}+\frac{y_{+}y_{2}y_{2}-y_{2}}{2}=0\therefore直线EF的斜率k=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{0}}=\therefore直线EF的方程为:y,-1=.\frac{1}{3}(x-1),整理得:2y+x-3=0,

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的两个焦点，离心率为$\frac {\sqrt {5}}{2}$ , $P$是双曲线上一点，若$\angle F_{1} P  F_{2}=90^{\circ} $, $S\triangle{F_{1} P F_{2}}=1$，则双曲线的渐近线方程是?该双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Eccentricity(G)=sqrt(5)/2;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P,F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Area(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2))=1

text: 以抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为圆心，且过坐标原点的圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);H: Circle;Focus(G) =  Center(H);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, H)
process: 解:\because抛物线y^{2}=4x\therefore焦点(1,0)\therefore所求圆的圆心为(1,0)又\because所求圆过坐标原点\because所求圆的半径R=1所求圆的方程为(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1即x^{2}-2x+y^{2}=0

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$上一点$M$作直线$l$，与双曲线的两条渐近线分别交于$P$、$Q$，且$M$为线段$P Q$的中点，若$\triangle P O Q$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$2$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M,G) = True;l: Line;PointOnCurve(M,l)  =True;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1,l2};P: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(l,l1) = P;Intersection(l,l2) = Q;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,Q)) = M;Area(TriangleOf(P,O,Q)) = 2;O: Origin
process: 由题意知,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)的两条渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{a}x设P,Q的坐标为P(x_{1},\frac{1}{a}x_{1}),Q(x_{2},-\frac{1}{a}x_{2}),利用中点坐标公式表示出中点M的坐标,将点M的坐标代入双曲线方程,再利用三角形的面积公式表示出\trianglePOQ的面积,求出a的值,进而求出离心率由题意知,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)的两条渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{a}x设P(x_{1},\frac{1}{a}x_{1}),Q(x_{2},-\frac{1}{a}x_{2}),则M(\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2},\frac{1}{2a}(x_{1}-x_{2}),根据点M在双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1上,得\frac{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}}{4a2}-\frac{(x_{1}-x_{2})^{2}}{4a^{2}}=1^{,}得x_{1}x_{2}=a^{2}由双曲线的两条渐近线方程得\tan\frac{\anglePOQ}{2}=\frac{1}{a}\sin\anglePOQ=2\sin\frac{\anglePOQ}{2}\cos\frac{\anglePOQ}{2}=\frac{2\sin-}{cin^{2}\angle}所以S_{APOQ}=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{x_{1}^{2}+\frac{1}{a^{2}}x_{1}^{2}}\sqrt{x_{2}^{2}+\frac{1}{a^{2}}x_{2}^{2}}\sin\anglePOQ=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{a^{2}+1}{a^{2}}\timesx_{1}x_{2}\times\frac{\frac{2}{a}}{1+\frac{1}{a^{2}}}=a而S_{\trianglePOQ}=2,所以a=2,又b=1,所以c=\sqrt{5},离心率e=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的共同焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，则$\cos \angle F_{1} P F_{2}$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$交双曲线$C$的右支于$A$、$B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{A F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=0$，$3\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=\overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, l);Intersection(l, RightPart(C)) = {A, B};DotProduct(VectorOf(A, F1), VectorOf(A, F2)) = 0;3*VectorOf(A, F2) = VectorOf(F2, B)
process: 解:由题意,设|AF_{2}|=m,因为3\overrightarrow{AF}_{2}=\overrightarrow{F_{2}B},则|BF_{2}|=3m.\therefore|AF_{1}|=2a+m,|BF_{1}|=2a+3m,因为\overrightarrow{AF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}=0所以AF_{2}\botAF_{1}\therefore(2a+3m)^{2}=(2a+m)^{2}+(4m)^{2}\thereforem=a,\because(2c)^{2}=(2a+m)^{2}+(m)^{2},即(2c)^{2}=(3a)^{2}+a^{2},即4c^{2}=10a^{2}\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}.

text: $P$是以$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为焦点的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上的任意一点，若$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=\alpha$ , $\angle PF_{2} F_{1}=\beta$，且$\cos \alpha=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$ , $\sin (\alpha+\beta)=\frac{3}{5}$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = alpha;AngleOf(P, F2, F1) = beta;alpha: Number;beta: Number;Cos(alpha) = sqrt(5)/5;Sin(alpha + beta) = 3/5
process: 试题分析:\cos\alpha=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}\Rightarrow\sin\alpha=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5},所以\sin\beta=\sin[(\alpha+\beta)-\alpha]=\sin(\alpha+\beta)\cos\alpha-\cos(\alpha+\beta)\sin\alpha=\frac{3}{5}\cdot\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}\pm\frac{4}{5}\cdot\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}=\frac{11\sqrt{5}}{25}或-\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}(舍去).设PF_{1}=r_{1},PF_{2}=r_{2},由正弦定理得:\frac{r_{1}}{\frac{11\sqrt{5}}{25}}=\frac{r_{2}}{\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}}=\frac{2c}{5}\Rightarrow\frac{r_{1}+r_{2}}{\frac{21\sqrt{5}}{25}}=\frac{2c}{5}\Rightarrowe=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{7}

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+m y^{2}=1$的焦点在$y$轴上，长轴长是短轴长的两倍，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (m*y^2 + x^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 椭圆方程可化为:x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1\because椭圆焦点在y轴上\thereforea=\sqrt{\frac{1}{m}},b=1\therefore2a=2\times2b,即a=2b\therefore\sqrt{\frac{1}{m}}=2,解得:m=\frac{1}{4}本题正确结果:\frac{1}{4}睛】本题考查根据椭圆方程和几何性质求解参数值的问题,易错点是忽略焦点所在轴,造成求解错误,届干其科题

text: 动点$P$到两圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2=0$与$x^{2}+y^{2}-8 x+10=0$所引的切线长相等，则动点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 - 2 = 0);C:Circle;Expression(C)=(x^2+y^2-8*x+10=0);Length(TangentOfPoint(P,G))=Length(TangentOfPoint(P,C));P:Point

F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(E) = {F1, F2};E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, E) = True;AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F2))

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的内切圆面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B}
process: 解:直线AB的斜率不能为0,但可不存在.设直线AB的方程为x=ty-\sqrt{3},A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由\begin{cases}x=ty-\sqrt{3}\\\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1\end{cases},得(t^{2}+4)y^{2}-2\sqrt{3}ty-1=0,y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}t}{t^{2}+4},y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{1}{t^{2}+4}=2(当且仅当t=\pm\sqrt{2}时等号成立)设\triangleABF_{2}的内切圆半径为r,|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|+|AB|=4a=8则\frac{1}{2}(|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|+|AB|)\cdotr\leqslant2,r\leqslant\frac{1}{2},则\triangleABF_{2}的内切圆面积的最大值为\pi\times(\frac{1}{2})^{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}

text: 焦点在$x$轴上，虚轴长为$8$，且离心率$e=\frac{5}{3}$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))=8;Eccentricity(G)=e;e:Number;e=5/3
process: 由题意可设双曲线的方程为\frac{x2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1.由2b=8,\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{3}及c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},可得a^{2}=9,b^{2}=16,所以所求双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 已知过抛物线$T$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$且互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$分别交抛物线于点$A$、$B$和点$C$,$D$,线段$A B$,$C D$的中点分别为$P$，$Q$，则$|F P| \cdot|F Q|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: T: Parabola;Expression(T) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(T) = F;l1: Line;l2: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l1);PointOnCurve(F, l2);IsPerpendicular(l1, l2);A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;Intersection(l1, T) = {A, B};Intersection(l2, T) = {C, D};P: Point;Q: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(C, D)) = Q
process: 由题意知直线l_{1},l_{2}的斜率均存在且不为零,F(2,0),因此可设直线l_{1}的方程为x=ky+2,则直线l_{2}的方程为x=-\frac{1}{k}y+2由\begin{cases}y2=8x\\x=ky+2\end{cases},消去x,得y^{2}-8ky-16=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则y_{1}+y_{2}=8k,所以y_{P}=\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=4k',将其代入直线l_{1}的方程,很x_{P}=4k^{2}+2,故点P(4k^{2}+2,4k),所以|PF|=4\sqrt{k^{2}(1+k^{2})}同理可得|QF|=\frac{4\sqrt{1+k^{2}}}{k^{2}},所以|FP|\cdot|FQ|=4\sqrt{k^{2}(1+k^{2})}\cdot\frac{4\sqrt{1+k^{2}}}{k^{2}}=16\cdot\frac{1+k^{2}}{k}=16(|k|+\frac{1}{|k|})\geqslant16\times2\sqrt{|k|+\frac{1}{|k|}}=32,当且仅当|k|=\frac{1}{|k|},即k=\pm1时等号成立,所以|FP|\cdot|FQ|的最小值为32

text: 已知两定点$A(-2,0)$ , $B(1,0)$，如果动点$P$满足$|PA|=2|PB|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B))

text: 过椭圆$4 x^{2}+y^{2}=1$的一个焦点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$A$与$B$和椭圆的另一个焦点$F_{2}$构成的三角形的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;l: Line;F1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1,l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B}
process: 解:椭圆方程可化为y^{2+\frac{x^{2}}{1}}=1,显然焦点在y轴上,a=1,根据椭圆定义|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=2a,所以\triangleABF_{2}的周长为|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|+|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=4a=4.

text: 已知双曲线$S$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{34}=1$的焦点相同,如果$y=\frac{3}{4} x$是双曲线$S$的一条渐近线那么双曲线$S$的方程为?
fact_expressions: S: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/34 = 1);Focus(S)=Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(S)))=(y=(3/4)*x)
process: \because椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{34}=1,双曲线S与椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{34}=1的焦点相同\therefore双曲线S的焦点坐标为(0,\pm5)设双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),则c=5\becausey=\frac{3}{4}x是双曲线S的一条渐近线\therefore\frac{a}{b}=\frac{3}{4},\because_{c^{2}}=a^{2}-b^{2}\thereforea=3,b=4\therefore双曲线S的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a}-\frac{x^{2}}{-\frac{1}{2}}=1

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=1$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 1)
process: 把双曲线的方程化为标准方程,求出a,b代入双曲线的渐近线方程中即可.[详解]x^{2}-4y^{2}=1\Rightarrowx^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{1}{4}}=1\Rightarrowa=1,b=\frac{1}{2},因此双曲线x^{2}-4y^{2}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x\Rightarrowy=\pm\frac{1}{2}x\Rightarrow\pmx-2y=0

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);FocalLength(C) = 2*sqrt(5)

text: 抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$被直线$l$:$2 x-y-1=0$截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;l: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (2*x - y - 1 = 0)

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$的方程为$x-y+5=0$，在抛物线上有一动点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d_{1}$，到直线$l$的距离为$d_{2}$，求$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - y + 5 = 0);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;d1: Number;Distance(P, yAxis) = d1;d2: Number;Distance(P,l) = d2
process: 根据题意画出图形:根据抛物线的定义将问题转化为焦点到直线l的距离减去1,利用点到直线的距离公式即可求解.根据题意画出图形:\because抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x,直线l的方程为x-y+5=0,\thereforeF(1,0),准线为x=-1,\because在抛物线上有一动点P到y轴的距离为d_{1},到直线l的距离为d_{2}\therefore根据抛物线的定义可知:d_{1}+d_{2}的最小值为焦点到直线l的距离减去1,\therefore最小值为\frac{|1-0+5|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}-1=3\sqrt{2}-1.

text: 已知直线$y=-k x+k$与曲线$y=x^{2}-2 x$. 当直线被曲线截得的线段长为$\sqrt{10}$时，直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;k: Number;H: Curve;Expression(G) = (y = -k*x + k);Expression(H) = (y = x^2 - 2*x);Length(InterceptChord(G,H))=sqrt(10)
process: 将直线y=-kx+k代入曲线y=x^{2}-2x得x^{2}+(k-2)x-k=0_{2}=2-k,x_{1}x_{2}=-k,4\geqslant0线曲线截得的线段长为+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}=\sqrt{1+k^{2}},因为直线被曲线截得的线段长为\sqrt{10},所以\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\sqrt{4+k^{2}}=\sqrt{10}\thereforek^{4}+5k^{2}-6=0,\thereforek^{2}=1,(负值舍去)\thereforek=\pm1,满足4\geqslant0.从而直线方程是v=x-1或v=-x+1

text: 已知实数$x$, $y$满足$x|x|+\frac{y|y|}{3}=1$，则$|\sqrt{3} x+y-4|$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: x_: Real;y_: Real;x_*Abs(x_) + (y_*Abs(y_))/3 = 1
process: 当x>0,y>0,表示椭圆x+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1第一象限部分;当x>0,y<0,表示双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1第四象限部分;当x<0,y>0,表示双曲线-x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1第二象限部分;当x<0,y<0,-x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1不表示任何图形;以及(1,0),(0,\sqrt{3})两点,作出大致图象如图:曲线上的点到\sqrt{3}x+y-4=0的距离为_{d}=\frac{|\sqrt{3}x+y-4|}{2}根据双曲线方程可得第二四象限双曲线渐近线方程都是y=\pm\sqrt{3}x.与\sqrt{3}x+y-4=0距离为2,曲线二四象限上的点到\sqrt{3}x+y-4=0的距离为_{d}=\frac{|\sqrt{3}x+y-4|}{2}小于且无限接近2,考虑曲线第一象限的任意点设为P(\cos\theta,\sqrt{3}\sin\theta),\theta\in(0,\frac{\pi}{2}]到\sqrt{3}x+y-4=0的距离所以d\in\frac{|\sqrt{3}\cos\theta+\sqrt{3}\sin\theta-4|}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{6}si(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4})-4}{2}\geqslant\frac{4-\sqrt{6}}{2},当\theta=\frac{\pi}{4}时取等号,则|\sqrt{3}x+y-4|的取值范围是(4-\sqrt{6},4)

text: 一个顶点是$(0,2)$，且离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$的椭圆的标准方程是?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，与抛物线$C$的准线交于点$D$，若$F$是$A D$的中点，则$|F B |$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;D: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l, Directrix(C)) = D;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, D)) = F
process: 做出图像,根据焦准距为4,F是AD的中点,可求得AM的长度,利用抛物线定义,可得AF的长度,即可求出\angleMAD=\angleEFD=60^{\circ},在\triangleEFD中,利用定义可得FB=BN,即可求得答案如图所示:过点A,B,F分别向准线引垂线,交准线于点M,N,E由题意得FE=2,且F是AD的中点,则EF为\triangleADM的中位线所以AM=4,则AF=DF=4,所以\cosMAD=\frac{AM}{AD}=\frac{1}{2},即\angleMAD=\angleEFD=60^{\circ}又由抛物线定义可得:FB=BN,且BD=2BN所以3BF=DF=4,即BF=\frac{4}{\frac{4}{2}},数答字为:4

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线均和圆$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}-6 x+5=0$相切，且双曲线的右焦点为圆$C$的圆心，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;C: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(C) = (-6*x + x^2 + y^2 + 5 = 0);IsTangent(Asymptote(G),C);Center(C)=RightFocus(G)
process: 圆C:x^{2}+y^{2}-6x+5=0,是以(3,0)为圆心,2为半径的圆,可知双曲线中的c=3,双曲线的渐进性方程为:y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,根据题意点(3,0)到渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x的距离为2运用点到直线的距离公式可得b=2,a=\sqrt{5},故双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若$C$上一点$P$满足$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1}{F}_{2}}|$，且$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|=2|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,C);Abs(VectorOf(P,F1)+VectorOf(P,F2))=Abs(VectorOf(F1,F2));Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))
process: 由题意可得:|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=|2\overrightarrow{OP}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|,则\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}是以点P为直角顶点的直角三角形设|PF_{1}|=2m,|PF_{2}|=m,由双曲线的定义有:|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,\thereforea=\frac{m}{2}由勾股定理有:m^{2}+4m^{2}=4c^{2},\thereforem^{2}=\frac{4}{5}c^{2},综上有:4a^{2}=\frac{4}{5}c^{2},\therefore5a^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},\frac{a^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}则双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm2x

text: 已知经过点$(1,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，点$C(-1 ,-1)$，且$C A \perp C B$，则$\triangle A B C$的面积为?
fact_expressions: H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (-1, -1);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(C, A), LineSegmentOf(C, B))
process: 由题意可设直线l的方程为x=ky+1,A(\frac{y_{1}}{4},y_{1}),B(\frac{y_{2}}{4},y_{2}),联立抛物线方程有y_{1}+y_{2}=4k,y_{1}y_{2}=-4,结合CA\botCB结合向量垂直的坐标表示即可求k,应用点线距、焦点弦长公式即可求\triangleABC的面积.由题意,设直线/的方程为x=ky+1与抛物线y^{2}=4x相交于A(\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{4},y_{1}),B(\frac{y_{2}}{4},y_{2})\thereforey_{1}y_{2}为y_{2}-4ky-4=0的两个根,即有y_{1}+y_{2}=4k,y_{1}y_{2}=-4又\becauseCA\botCB,由向量垂直的坐标表示,有(\frac{y_{1}}{4}+1)(\frac{y_{2}}{4}+1)+(y_{1}+1)(y_{1}+1)=0,得k=-\frac{1}{2}若设C到AB的距离为h,则S_{\triangleABC}=\frac{1}{2}h\cdotAB,由h=\frac{|Ax_{0}+By_{0}+C|}{\sqrt{A^{2}+B^{2}}}=\frac{|\frac{1}{2}+1+1|}{\frac{1}{1}+1}=\sqrt{5},AB=\sqrt{1+k^{2}}\cdot|y_{1}-y_{2}|=5,所以_{S_{\triangleABC}}=\frac{5\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴交于点$M$，点$N$在抛物线$C$上，记$|\overrightarrow{M N}|=\lambda|\overrightarrow{N F}|$. 当$\lambda$取最大值时，直线$O N$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;N: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;PointOnCurve(N, C);lambda:Number;Abs(VectorOf(M,N))=lambda*Abs(VectorOf(N,F));WhenMax(lambda)
process: 解:依题意,F(1,0),M(-1,0).设N(4t^{2},4t),则|\overrightarrow{NF}|^{2}=(1-4t^{2})^{2}+16t^{2}=16t^{4}+8t^{2}+1|\overrightarrow{MN}|^{2}=(4t^{2}+1)^{2}+16t^{2}=16t^{4}+24t^{2}+1故\lambda^{2}=\frac{|\overrightarrow{MN}|^{2}}{|\overrightarrow{NF}|^{2}}=\frac{16t^{4}+24t^{2}+1}{16t^{4}+8t^{2}+1}=1+\frac{-}{1}当t=0时,2^{2}=1,当t\neq0时,\lambda^{2}=1当且仅当\frac{1}{12}=16t^{2},即t=\pm\frac{1}{2}时,等号成立所以当\lambda取最大值时,N(1,2)或N(1,-2)故直线ON的方程为y=\pm2x.

process: 试题分析:\begin{cases}y=k(x+1)\\y^{2}=x\end{cases}消去x整理可得ky^{2}-y+k=0.由题意可得k=0或\begin{cases}k\neq0\\\end{cases}

text: 已知直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x-2$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点，且在双曲线的右支上存在点$C$，使$\overrightarrow{O A}+\overrightarrow{O B}=t \overrightarrow{O C}$，则$t$的值?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 - y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x*(sqrt(3)/3) - 2);Intersection(H, RightPart(G)) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(C, RightPart(G));VectorOf(O, A) + VectorOf(O, B) = t*VectorOf(O, C);t:Number
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),C(x_{0},y_{0})由\overrightarrow{OA}+\overrightarrow{OB}=t\overrightarrow{OC}则x_{1}+x_{2}=tx_{0},y_{1}+y_{2}=ty_{0},由直线y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x-2^{与}又曲线\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1方程联立可得x^{2}-16\sqrt{3}x+84=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=16\sqrt{3},\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\times16\sqrt{3}-4=12\frac{x_{0}}{y_{0}}==\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}\begin{matrix}x&2\\\frac{x_{0}}{12}&\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{3}=1解得x_{0}=4\sqrt{3},y_{0}=3\thereforet=4,

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$的值为?

process: 由题意,双曲线\frac{x2}{3}-y^{2}=1的右焦点为(2,0),因为抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1的右焦点重合,所以抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点为(2,0),即\frac{p}{2}=2,解答p=4.不睛】本题主要考查了双曲线和抛物线的标准方程及几何性质的应用,其中解答中熟记双曲线和抛物线的几何性质是解答的关键,属于基础题.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\Delta A F_{1} B$的周长为$4$，则$C$的方程为?

text: 已知抛物线方程为$x^{2}=12 y$，过抛物线的焦点作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

process: 抛物线的焦点坐标为(0,3),所以直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}x+3,由\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}x+3\\x^{2}=12y\end{cases},消去y并化简的x^{2}-12\sqrt{3}x-36=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=12\sqrt{3},x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=-36所以|AB|

text: 已知定点$B(3,0)$，点$A$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$上运动，$M$是线段$A B$上的中点，则点$M$的轨迹方程为?

process: 由题意,设A(x_{0},y_{0}),M(x,y),\becauseM是线段AB的中点\therefore\begin{cases}\frac{x_{0}+3}{2}=x\\\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{2}=y\end{cases},即\therefore\begin{cases}x_{0}=2x-3\\y_{0}=2y\end{cases}-\textcircled{1}又知点A(x_{0},y_{0})不在圆x^{2}+y^{2}=1上,将\textcircled{1}代入可得:(2x-3)^{2}+(2y)^{2}=1.所以化简得点M的轨迹方程为:(x-\frac{3}{2})^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{4}

text: 若中心在原点的双曲线$C$的一个焦点是$F_{1}(0,-2)$，一条渐近线的方程是$x-y=0$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?

process: 试题分析:由于双曲线的焦点在y轴上,所以双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x,所以\frac{a}{b}=1\Rightarrowa=b,又因为c=2,a^{2}+b^{2}=4,\thereforea^{2}=b^{2}=2,因此双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{2}-\frac{x^{2}}{2}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点为$F$，过$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点到抛物线$C$的准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/4);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Inclination(l)=pi/4;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B}
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立直线和抛物线的方程得到韦达定理,再利用韦达定理求出\frac{y_{1}+1+y_{2}+1}{2}即得解.解】解:由题得x^{2}=4y,所以抛物线的焦点F(0,1)所以直线l的方程为y=x+1,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立方程得\begin{cases}x^{2}=4y\\y=x+1\end{cases},所以x^{2}-4x-4=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=4,x_{1}x_{2}=-4.由题得线段AB的中点到抛物线C的准线的距离是|MN|,|MN|=\frac{|AC|+|BD|}{2}=\frac{y_{1}+1+y_{2}+1}{2}=1+\frac{x_{1}2+x_{2}2}{2}=1+\frac{-2x_{1}x_{2}}{=1+\frac{16+8}{8}=4}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m-3}=1$的右焦点$F$到其一条渐近线距离为$3$，则实数$m$的值是?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$A$、$B$在抛物线上，且$\angle A F B=120^{\circ}$，过弦$A B$中点$M$作准线$l$的垂线，垂足为$M_{1}$，则$\frac{|M M_{1}|}{|A B|}$的最大值为?

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上一点，$C$的焦点为$F(1 , 0)$，点$A$的坐标为$(4 , 2)$，则$|P F|+|P A|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;F: Point;P: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = (4, 2);Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = F
process: 由题知,抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x,准线l:x=-1,过点P作PM\botl,垂足为M,AC\botl,垂足为点C如图,则|PM|=|PF|.因为|PF|+|PA|=|PM|+|PA|\geqslant|AC|,此时,所求最小值为|AC|=4-(-1)=5,|PF|+|PA|取得最小值5.

text: 过点$(0,3 b)$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条斜率为正的渐近线平行，若双曲线$C$的右支上的点到直线$l$的距离恒大于$b$，则双曲线$C$的离心率的最大值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;P0: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (0, 3*b);PointOnCurve(P, l);L1: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L1;Slope(L1) > 0;IsParallel(l, L1);PointOnCurve(P0, RightPart(C));Distance(P0, l) > b
process: 由题意得双曲线的斜率为正的渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x,即bx-ay=0.则直线l的方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x+3b^{,}即bx-ay+3ab=0因为双曲线的右支上的点到直线l的距离恒大于b,所以渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x与直线l的距离不小于b,即\overline{\sqrt{b^{2}+(-a)^{2}}}\geqslantb结合c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}化简得9a^{2}\geqslantc^{2}所以1<e=\frac{c}{a}\leqslant3,即双曲线的离心率的最大值为.

text: 倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$，且与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Inclination(l)=ApplyUnit(45,degree);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B}
process: 直线l的方程为y=x-1,与抛物线方程联立可得x^{2}-6:|x_{A}+x_{B}=6,再根据抛物线的定义即可求出AB的长抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点F的坐标为(1,0),所以直线l的方程为y-0=\tan45^{\circ}(x-1),即y=x-1由\begin{cases}y=x-1\\y2=4x\end{cases},得x^{2}-6x+1=0,所以x_{A}+x_{B}=6,由抛物线的定义可知AB=x_{A}+x_{B}+p=6+2=8,所以AB的长为8

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 ( a>b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，两条准线与$x$轴的交点分别为$M$、$N$，若$M N \leq 2 F_{1} F_{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Z1: Line;Z2: Line;Directrix(G) = {Z1, Z2};M: Point;N: Point;Intersection(Z1, xAxis) = M;Intersection(Z2, xAxis) = N;LineSegmentOf(M, N) <= 2*LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)

text: 已知抛物线$C$的方程为$y^{2}=4 x$ ,经过点$(4,0)$的直线与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，分别过点$A$、$B$作抛物线的切线，则两条切线的交点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(H, G) = True;G: Line;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point
process: 设直线/的方程为x=my+4,设点A(x_{1}y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})将直线l的方程代入抛物线C的方程并化简得y^{2}-4my-16=0,由韦达定理可得y_{1}+yy_{1}y_{2}=-16,抛物线C在点A处的切线方程为y_{1}y=2(x+x_{1}),即y_{1}y=2x+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{2}抛物线C在点B处的切线方程为y_{2}y=2(x+x_{2}),即y_{2}y=2x+\frac{y_{2}}{2}联立这两条切线方程得\begin{cases}y_{1}y=2x+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{2}\\y_{2}y=2x+\frac{y^{2}}{2}\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}x=\frac{y_{1}}{4}\\y=\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=m\end{cases}因此,点P的轨迹方程为x=-4.

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9 k^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4 k^{2}}=1$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$没有公共点，则实数$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (-1/(4*k^2)*y^2 + x^2/((9*k^2)) = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);NumIntersection(G, H)=0

C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;N: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, C) = {M, N};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));7*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))
process: 如图所示,作F_{2}E\botMN,垂足为E,利用椭圆的定义以及7|MF_{1}|=4|MN|计算出|F_{2}M|.|ME|,|NF_{2}|,|NE|,结合勾股定理得到关于a,c的齐次式,进而可得结果如图所示,作F_{2}E\botMN,垂足为E\because|F_{2}M|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,\thereforeE点为F_{1}M的中点\therefore|MF_{1}|=2a-2c,|ME|=a-c又\because7|MF_{1}|=4|MN|,\therefore|MN|=\frac{7}{2}(a-c)\therefore|NE|=\frac{7}{2}(a-c)-(a-c)=\frac{5}{2}(a-c),|NF_{1}|=\frac{3}{2}(a-c)|NF_{2}|=2a-\frac{3}{2}(a-c)=\frac{1}{2}a+\frac{3}{2}c.由勾股定理可得:(\frac{1}{2}a+\frac{3}{2}c)^{2}-\frac{25}{4}(a-c)^{2}=4c^{2}-(a-c)^{2}化简得:7c^{2}-12ac+5a^{2}=0,即7e^{2}-12e+5=0,解得:e=1(舍去),e=\frac{5}{7}

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 32

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在双曲线的右支上，且$|P F_{1}|=4|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率$e$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 设\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\theta,由\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|=4|PF_{2}|\\|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a\end{cases},得\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|=\frac{8a}{3}\\|PF_{2}|=\frac{2a}{3}\end{cases},由余弦定理得\cos\theta=\frac{17a^{2}-9c^{2}}{8a^{2}}=\frac{17}{8}-\frac{9}{8}e^{2},因为\theta\in(0,\pi],所以\cos\theta\in[-1,1),即-1\leqslant\frac{17}{8}-\frac{9}{8}e^{2}<1又e>1,所以1<e\leqslant\frac{5}{3},所以离心率e的最大值为\frac{5}{3}.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 ax(a>0)$上的一点到焦点的距离为$2 a$，则该点的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(a*x));H:Point;PointOnCurve(H,G);Distance(H,Focus(G))=2*a

text: 若直线$l$: $y=k x+1$与曲线$C$: $x^{2}+y|y|=1$有两个公共点，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;k: Real;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y*Abs(y) = 1);Expression(l) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(l, C) = 2
process: 由曲线C:x^{2}+y|y|=1得,当y\geqslant0时x^{2}+y^{2}=1;当y<0时x^{2}-y^{2}=1;直线l:y=kx+1恒过(0,1)点,所以直线与曲线的图象为当直线y=kx+1与x^{2}+y2=1(y\geqslant0)相切时,此时k=0,直线l与曲线C只有一个公共点;当直线y=kx+1中k=\pm1时,直线与曲线有两个交点;当直线y=kx+1(k\neq\pm1)与x^{2}-y^{2}=1(y<0)相切时,联立方程\begin{cases}y=kx+1(k\neq\pm1)\\x^{2}-y2=1(y<0)\end{cases}x^{2}-(kx-1)^{2}-1=0,整理的(1-k^{2})x^{2}+2kx-2=0,\Delta=4k^{2}+8(1-k^{2})=8-4k^{2}=0解得k=\pm\sqrt{2},此时直线l与曲线C恰有两个公共点;直线y=kx+1与曲线x^{2}+y|y|=1要恰有2个公共点,可得k=\pm\sqrt{2},或-1\leqslantk<0或0<k\leqslant1,

text: 设$O$、$F$分别是抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的顶点和焦点，$M$是抛物线上的动点，则$\frac{|M O|}{|M F|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;F: Point;Vertex(G) = O;Focus(G) = F;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G)
process: 试题分析:设点M的坐标为M(x,y),由抛物线的定义可知,|MF|=x+\frac{1}{2}则\frac{|MO|}{|MF|}=\frac{\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}}}{x+\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{x^{2}+2x}{x+\frac{1}{2}}=|\frac{x^{2}+2x}{2}=|1+\frac{x-\frac{1}{4}}{x^{2}+x+\frac{1}{4}},令t=x-\frac{1}{4},则t>--\frac{1}{16t}+\frac{3}{2}\leqslant\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3},当且仅当t=\frac{3}{4}时等号成立若-\frac{1}{4}<t<0,yt+\frac{\frac{9}{16}}{t}+\frac{3}{2}单调递减,故y<-1,\frac{1}{y}\in(-1,0),所以\frac{|MO|}{|MF|}的最大值为\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (2*x + x^2 + y^2 - 3 = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H)
x: Real;y:Real;3*x^2 + 2*y^2 = 6*x
process: \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}}表示曲线3x^{2}+2y^{2}=6x上的点到坐标原点的距离,故可用消元法化为关于y的函数,再求最值.由题意得y^{2}=3x-\frac{3}{2}x^{2}\geqslant0,\therefore0\leqslantx\leqslant2,因此x^{2}+y^{2}=3x-\frac{1}{2}x^{2}=-\frac{1}{2}(x-3)^{2}+\frac{9}{2}所以当x=2时,x^{2}+y2取得最大值4,故\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}}的最大值为2【点评】本题考查了消元法及函数的最值的求法,要掌握本类试题中一些式子的几何意义,如(x-a)^{2}+(y-b)^{2}表示曲线上点(x,y)与点(a,b)之间距离的平方;\frac{y-b}{x-a}表示曲线上点(x,y)与点(a,b)连线的斜率;z=Ax+By注意将直线z=Ax+By在坐标轴上的截距与z联系起来解题综上所述,解决与圆相关的最值问题的关键是要善于利用数形结合思想,利用几何知识求最值,要善于利用转化与化归思想将最值问题转化为函数的最值进行求解.一般是根据条件列出关于所求目标的式子\_函数关系式,然后根据函数关系式的特征选用参数法、配方法、判别式法等.应用不等式的性质求出最值.特别地,要利用圆的几何性质,根据式子的几何意义求解,这正是数形结合思想的应用.

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上的一点，当$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$时，$\triangle F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 根据椭圆定义有PF_{1}+PF_{2}=2a=12,再由勾股定理得PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}^{2}=F_{1}F_{2}^{2}=4c^{2}=108,进而可得PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}=18,即可得到\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}面积.根据椭圆的定义,PF_{1}+PF_{2}=2a=12\textcircled{1},\becausePF_{1}\botPF_{2},由勾股定理得PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}^{2}=F_{1}F_{2}^{2}=4c^{2}=4\times(36-9)=108\textcircled{2}\textcircled{1}^{2}\textcircled{2}得:2PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}=144-108=36,\thereforeS_{AF_{1}PF_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}=\frac{1}{2}\times18=9.

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线与圆$(x-\sqrt{3})^{2}+y^{2}=2$相交，则此双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - sqrt(3))^2 = 2);IsIntersect(Asymptote(G), H)
process: 分析:由题意首先求得双曲线的渐近线,利用渐近线到直线的距离小于半径得到关于a,b的不等式,结合双曲线离心率的定义和性质即可求得最终结果.详解:双曲线的渐近线bx\pmay=0与圆(x-\sqrt{3})^{2}+y^{2}=2相交则圆心到渐近线的距离小于半径,即\frac{\sqrt{3}b}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}<\sqrt{2},整理可得:b^{2}<2a^{2},\thereforec^{2}<3a^{2}则双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}<\sqrt{3},又双曲线的离心率e>1,据此可得此双曲线的离心率的取值范围是(1,\sqrt{3})

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若以$A B$为直径的圆过点$(-\frac{p}{2}, 2)$，则该抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Inclination(l) = pi/4;Intersection(l,G) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H) = True;H: Circle;PointOnCurve(I,H) = True;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (-p/2, 2)
process: 分析:求出直线l的方程,利用抛物线的性质,求出AB中点的纵坐标,联立直线与抛物线方程,利用韦达定理求解p即可得到抛物线方程.详解:抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为F.过F点且倾斜角为\frac{\pi}{4}的直线l与抛物线相交于A,B两点以AB为直径的圆与抛物线的准线相切,以AB为直径的圆过点(-\frac{p}{2},2)可知AB的中点的纵坐标为2,直线l的方程为:y=x\cdot\frac{p}{2},则\begin{cases}y=x-\frac{p}{2}\\y2=2px\end{cases},可得y^{2}\cdot2py\cdotp^{2}=0则AB中点的纵坐标为\frac{2p}{2}=2,解得p=2该抛物线的方程为:y^{2}=4x

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的渐近线且过点$A(2 \sqrt{3},-3)$的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (2*sqrt(3), -3);PointOnCurve(A, C);Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(G)

text: 已知对称轴为坐标轴的双曲线有一条渐近线为$2 x-y=0$, 则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (2*x-y=0)
process: 试题分析:当双曲线焦点在x轴上时,可设标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),此时渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,与已知条件中的渐近线方程比较可得b=2a,最后用平方关系可得c=\sqrt{5}a,用公式可得离心率e=\frac{c}{a}\sqrt{5};当双曲线焦点在y轴上时,用类似的方法可得双曲线的离心率为\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}.由此可得正确答案.解:(1)当双曲线焦点在x轴上时,设它的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)\because双曲线的一条渐近线方程是2x-y=0,\therefore双曲线渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,即y=\pm2x\frac{b}{a}=2\Rightarrowb=2a设它的标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0采用类似(1)的方法,可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{e}=\frac{1}{2}a所以双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}综上所述,该双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{5}或\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{1}{2} x$，那么该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x/2)
process: 由渐近线方程可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{2},即可得出离心率.\because一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{1}{2}x,\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a}}2^{2}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 双曲线的中心在坐标原点，离心率等于$2$ , 一个焦点的坐标为$(2 , 0)$，则此双曲线的方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;Eccentricity(G) = 2;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (2, 0)

text: 若抛物线$y=x^{2} + 2 m x+m^{2}-m$焦点坐标为$(2001 , 2002)$，则它的顶点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (y = -m + m^2 + 2*(m*x) + x^2);Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (2001, 2002)

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的一个焦点是$(3,0)$，则实数$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/k = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (3, 0)
process: 因为双曲线的一个焦点是(3,0),所以双曲线的焦点在x轴上,a^{2}=1,b^{2}=k^{,}\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=1+k=9,\thereforek=8

text: 双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若双曲线上存在点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=-2 a^{2}$，则双曲线离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;F2: Point;F1: Point;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;P: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F1),VectorOf(P,F2)) = -2*a^2

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的顶点和焦点分别作焦点和两个顶点的椭圆标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);Vertex(G) = Focus(H);Focus(G) = Vertex(H);H: Ellipse

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左焦点为$F$，点$M$是椭圆$C$上一点，点$N$是$M F$的中点，$O$是椭圆的中心，$O N=4$，则点$M$到椭圆$C$的左准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;M: Point;F: Point;O: Point;N: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(M, C);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = N;Center(C) = O;LineSegmentOf(O, N) = 4
process: 试题分析:设右焦点为F',则由椭圆的定义MF+MF'=10,依据题设可得ON=\frac{1}{2}MF'=4,即,MF'=8,所以MF=2,由椭圆的第二定义可得\frac{2}{d}=e=\frac{4}{5},故d=\frac{10}{4}=\frac{5}{2},应填答案\frac{5}{2}

text: 已知椭圆的标准方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$，并且焦距为$6$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;m>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/m^2 = 1);FocalLength(G)=6
process: 因为2c=6,所以c=3,(1)当焦点在x轴上时,由椭圆的标准方程知25-m^{2}=9解得m=4(2)当焦点在y轴上时,由椭圆的标准方程知m^{2}-25=9解得m=\sqrt{34}综上,解得m=4或\sqrt{34}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 px$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x^2/12 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)

text: 已知椭圆$M$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$,过其左焦点$F(-c, 0)$的直线交椭圆$M$于$A$、$B$两点, 若弦$A B$的中点为$D(-4,2)$,则椭圆$M$的方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;D: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(D) = (-4, 2);Eccentricity(M) = sqrt(2)/2;LeftFocus(M)=F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, M) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B),M);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = D;c:Number

text: 已知点$A(4,0)$，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x  (0<p<4)$的准线为$l$，点$P$在$C$上，作$P H \perp l$于$H$，且$|P H|=|P A|$，$\angle A P H=120^{\circ}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (4, 0);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;0 < p;p < 4;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, H), l) = True;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, H), l) = H;H: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A));AngleOf(A, P, H) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 已知双曲线$C_{1}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，渐近线方程为$\sqrt{7} x \pm 3 y=0$，点$A$在圆$C_{2}$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=16$上，若$\overrightarrow{F_{1} A}=\overrightarrow{A B}$且点$B$是双曲线$C_{1}$右支上的点，则$\angle B F_{2} F_{1}$的正切值为?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;C2: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;m: Number;m > 0;Expression(C1) = (x^2/9 - y^2/m = 1);LeftFocus(C1) = F1;RightFocus(C1) = F2;Expression(Asymptote(C1)) = (sqrt(7)*x + pm*3*y = 0);PointOnCurve(A, C2);Expression(C2) = (x^2 + y^2 = 16);VectorOf(F1, A) = VectorOf(A, B);PointOnCurve(B, RightPart(C1))
process: 由题中条件知双曲线的渐近线方程为\sqrt{7}x\pm3y=0,即y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{7}}{3}x'又因为双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0),所以m=7,则c^{2}=9+7=16,故焦点为F_{1}(-4,0),F_{2}(4,0),圆的方故\angleF_{1}AF_{2}=90^{\circ},而\overrightarrow{F_{1}A}=\overrightarrow{AB}故点A为线段F_{1}B的中点,\triangleF_{1}F_{2}B是等腰三角形,则F_{2}B=F_{1}F_{2}=8,点B在双曲线的右支上,由双曲线定义知BF_{1}-BF_{2}=6,所以BF_{1}=14F_{1}A=\frac{1}{2}BF_{1}=7,在Rt\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中由勾股定理得AF_{2}=\sqrt{8^{2}-7^{2}}=\sqrt{15},\tan\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{7\sqrt{15}}{15}则_{\tan\angleBF_{2}F_{1}=\tan2\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{2\times\frac{7\sqrt{15}}{15}}{1-\frac{49}{15}}=-\frac{7\sqrt{15}}{17}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在$C$上,$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$, 则点$P$到$x$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 【分.斤】设出点P的坐标,根据平面向量的数量积的坐标表示公式可得等式,再根据点P在C上,又可以得到一个等式,通过解方程组,求出点P的纵坐标即可求出点P到x轴的距离由题意可知:F_{1}(-\sqrt{2},0),F_{2}(-\sqrt{2},0)设点P的坐标为(x_{0},y_{0}),所以有\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}=(x_{0}+\sqrt{2},y_{0}),\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=(x_{0}-\sqrt{2},y_{0}),因为\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},所以有\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=0\Rightarrow(x_{0}+\sqrt{2})(x_{0}-\sqrt{2})+y_{0}^{2}=0\Rightarrowx_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=2而点P在C上,所以有x_{0}^{2}-y_{0}^{2}=1,解得y_{0}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},所以点P到x轴的距离为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的弦$A B$过焦点$F$，若$|A B|=8$，且$A B$中点的横坐标为$3$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8;XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 3
process: 由抛物线定义得|AB|=x_{A}+x_{B}+p=2x_{中}+p=6+p=8\thereforep=2,抛物线的方程为y^{2}=4x.

fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;sqrt(y1^2 + (x1 - 1)^2)/Abs(x1 - 4) = 1/2

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$左右焦点分别是$F_{1}(-1,0)$, $F_{2}(1,0)$，点$A$是直线$x+y-2=0$上的动点，若点$A$在椭圆$C$上，则椭圆$C$的离心率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (1, 0);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;Expression(G) = (x + y - 2 = 0);A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(A, C)
process: 由题意易知:直线x+y-2=0与椭圆C有公共点,联立方程可得:(a^{2}+b^{2})x^{2}-4a^{2}x+4a^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}=0\therefore\Delta=(-4a^{2})^{2}-4(a^{2}+b^{2})(4a^{2}-a^{2}b^{2})\geqslant0\thereforea^{2}\geqslant\frac{5}{2},即a\geqslant\sqrt{\frac{5}{2}}\therefore椭圆C的离心率e\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}\therefore椭圆C的离心率的最大值为\frac{\sqrt{10}}{6}1求离心率的常用方法有以下两种:(1)求得a,c的值,直接代入公式e=\frac{c}{a}求解(2)列出关于a,b,c的齐次方程(或不等式),然后根据b^{2}=a2-c,消去b后转化成关于e的方程(或不等式)求解

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M(x_{0}, 2 \sqrt{3})$，则点$M$到抛物线焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;x0:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (x0, 2*sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(M,G)
process: 分析:把点M(x_{0},2\sqrt{3})代入抛物线方程,解得x_{0}.利用抛物线的定义可得:点M到抛物线焦点的距离x_{0}+1.详解:把点M(x_{0},2\sqrt{3})代入抛物线方程可得:(2\sqrt{3})^{2}=4x_{0},解得x_{0}=3\therefore点M到抛物线焦点的距离=x_{0}+1=4

text: 若点$P$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上一点，满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则此双曲线的离心率为?

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，过$F$且与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线平行的直线$l$与另一条渐近线相交于$P$，若$P$恰好在以$A_{1} A_{2}$为直径的圆上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A1: Point;A2: Point;F: Point;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;LeftVertex(C) = A1;RightVertex(C) = A2;PointOnCurve(F, l);L1: Line;L2: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L2;Negation(L1=L2);IsParallel(l, L1);Intersection(l, L2) = P;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A1, A2), G);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$的中心在坐标原点，一个焦点与抛物线$y=\frac{x^{2}}{12}$的焦点相同，且它的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5} x$,则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/12);OneOf(Focus(C)) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = x*(2*sqrt(5)/5))
process: 由题意可设双曲线C的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)因为双曲线的一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}x'则\frac{a}{b}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}\textcircled{1};又因为抛物线y=\frac{x^{2}}{12}的焦点是(0,3),所以双曲线的半焦距c=3,则a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2}=9\textcircled{2}.由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}解得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=5'则C的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{5}=1.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的右顶点，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线方程为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点.若$\overrightarrow{A F}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点为F(\frac{p}{2},0)由题意可知直线AB的斜率存在,设直线方程为y=k(x-\frac{p}{2})联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=2px\\y=k(x-\frac{p}{2})\end{cases},得ky^{2}-2py-kp^{2}=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})则y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{2p}{k},y_{1}y_{2}=-p^{2}由\overrightarrow{AF}=3\overrightarrow{FB},得\frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}=-3.\therefore\frac{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}}{y_{1}y_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}}{y_{2}}+\frac{y}{3}2+2=-3-\frac{1}{3}+2=\frac{4p^{2}}{-p^{2}}=-\frac{4}{k^{2}}解得:k=\pm\sqrt{3}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点和上顶点分别为$A$、$B$，左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，在线段$A B$上有且只有一个点$P$满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则椭圆的离心率的平方是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A;UpperVertex(C) = B;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,LineSegmentOf(A,B));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F1),LineSegmentOf(P,F2))
process: 由题可得A(-a,0),B(0,b),则直线AB方程为\frac{x}{-a}+\frac{y}{b}=1,即bx-ay+ab=0因为PF_{1}\botPF_{2},可得点P的轨迹为以原点为圆心,c为半径的圆,方程为x^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2}因为线段AB上有且只有一个点P满足PF_{1}\botPF_{2}所以直线AB与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2}相切,则\frac{ab}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=c,化简得b^{2}=ac则a^{2}-c^{2}=ac,即e^{2}+e-1=0,又0<e<1,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{5}-1}{2},则e^{2}=\frac{3-\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 已知$P(4,-1)$, $F$为抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，$M$为此抛物线上的点，且使$|M P|+|M F|$的值最小，则$M$点的坐标为?

process: \therefore抛物线为y^{2}=8x,\therefore2p=8,得\frac{p}{2}=2,可得焦点为F(2,0),准线l的方程为:x=-2.过点M作MN\botl,垂足为N,则根据抛物线的定义,可得|MN|=|MF|.由平面几何知识,当且仅当点M,N,P共线时,|MP|+|MF|取得最小值,此时M(\frac{1}{2},-1)

text: 已知点$M(m, 0)  (m>0)$和抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$，过$C$的焦点$F$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，且$|\overrightarrow{M F}|=|\overrightarrow{M A}|$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;M: Point;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;m>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (m, 0);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B);Abs(VectorOf(M, F)) = Abs(VectorOf(M, A));m:Number
process: 画出图形,利用已知条件求出A,B的坐标,通过向量关系求出m值即可.由题意可知:F(1,0),由抛物线定义可知A(x_{1},y_{1}),可知B(x_{2},y_{2})\because\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{FB},可得:2((x_{2}-1,y_{2}))=(1-x_{1},-y_{1}),可得y_{2}=-\frac{y_{1}}{2}x_{2}=\frac{3-x_{1}}{2}\begin{cases}y_{1}=4x_{1}\\(-\frac{y_{1}}{2})^{2}=4\times\frac{3-x_{1}}{2}\end{cases},解得x_{1}=2,y_{1}=|\overrightarrow{MF}|=|\overrightarrow{MA}|,可得|m-1|=\sqrt{(m-2)^{2}+=\pm2\sqrt{2}.1|=\sqrt{(m-2)^{2}+(0\pm2\sqrt{2})^{2}},解得m=\frac{11}{2}.

text: 已知$F_{1}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左焦点，$P$是此椭圆上的动点，$A(-1,3)$是一定点，则$|P A|+|P F_{1}|$的最大值是?

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上动点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，点$A$的坐标为$(4,1)$，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最小值为?

process: (1)直线2x-3y-6=0与x轴的交点坐标为(3,0),与y轴的交点坐标为(0,-2).当焦点坐标为(3,0)时,\frac{p}{2}=3,即p=6,此时抛物线方程为y^{2}=12x;当焦点坐标为(0,-2)时,\frac{p}{2}=2,即p=4,此时抛物线方程为x^{2}=-8y.故所求抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=12x或x^{2}=-8y的一本题考查抛物线标准方程的确定,在解题中要对抛物线性质熟练掌握,利用分类讨论思想对开口向右、向下分别计算求解.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左顶点、上顶点，右焦点分别为$A$、$B$、$F$，则$\overrightarrow{A B} \cdot \overrightarrow{A F}$=?

process: 由椭圆方程知A(-2,0),B(0,\sqrt{3}),C(1,0),\overrightarrow{AB}=(2,\sqrt{3}),\overrightarrow{AF}=(3,0),所以\overrightarrow{AB}\cdot\overrightarrow{AF}=6,故填6.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右顶点为$A$，以点$A$为圆心，$b$为半径作圆，且圆$A0$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线交于$M$、$N$两点，若$\overrightarrow{O M}=\frac{3}{2} \overrightarrow{O N}$（$O$为坐标原点），则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;A: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;b>0;A0: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 - y^2/b^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;Center(A0) = A;Radius(A0) = b;Intersection(A0, OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = {M, N};VectorOf(O, M) = (3/2)*VectorOf(O, N)
process: 如图,不妨设圆A与双曲线的一条渐近线y=\frac{b}{\sqrt{5}}x,交于M,N两点,过点A作AB垂直于该渐近线于点B,连接AN,先求出|OA|=\sqrt{5},AB=\frac{\sqrt{5}b}{c},|OB|=\frac{5b^{2}}{c},再由题得到\frac{25b^{4}}{c^{2}}+\frac{5b^{2}}{c^{2}}=5求出b=1,即得双曲线C的标准方程.由双曲线的方程C:\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0),知a=\sqrt{5}不妨设圆A与双曲线的一条渐近线y=\frac{b}{\sqrt{5}}x,交于M,N两点,过点A作AB垂直于该渐近线于点B连接AN,如图.点A(\sqrt{5},0)到渐近线bx-\sqrt{5}y=0的距离|AB|=\frac{|ab|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}b}{c}\because|AN|=r=b,\therefore|a|\cdot\overrightarrow{OM}=\frac{3}{2}\overrightarrow{ON}=\overrightarrow{ON}+2\overrightarrow{NB},\therefore\overrightarrow{ON}=4\overrightarrow{NB},\therefore\overrightarrow{OB}=5\overrightarrow{NB},在Rt\triangleABO中,|OA|=\sqrt{5},B=\frac{\sqrt{5}b}{c},|OB|=\frac{5b^{2}}{c},|OB^{2}+|AB^{2}|=|OA|^{2}.即\frac{25b^{4}}{c^{2}}+\frac{5b^{2}}{c^{2}}=5^{,}25b^{4}+5b^{2}=5c^{2},\therefore25b^{4}=5c^{2}-5b^{2}=5(c^{2}-b^{2})=5a^{2}=25\thereforeb^{2}=1,\therefore双曲线C的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{5}-y^{2}=1.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F(-\sqrt{5}, 0)$，点$A$的坐标为$(0,2)$，点$P$为双曲线右支上的动点，且$\triangle P A F$周长的最小值为$8$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;P: Point;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);Coordinate(F) = (-sqrt(5), 0);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Min(Perimeter(TriangleOf(P, A, F))) = 8
process: 由|AF|=\sqrt{5+4}=3,三角形APF的周长的最小值为8,可得|PA|+|PF|的最小值为5,又F为双曲线的右焦点,可得|PF|=|PF|+2a.当A,P,F三点共线时,|PA|+|PF|取得最小值,且为|AF|=3即有3+2a=5,即a=1,c=\sqrt{5},可得e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5}.青】本题考查双曲线的定义、方程和性质,主要是离心率的求法,考查三点共线取得最小值的性质,考查方程思想和运算能力,属于中档题

text: 过点$(0,3)$的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的垂直平分线经过点$(4,0)$,$F$为抛物线的焦点，则$|A F|+|B F|$的值为?
