text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4+m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$有共同的焦点，且双曲线的离心率为$2$，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/(m^2 + 4) + y^2/m^2 = 1);Focus(H) = Focus(G);Eccentricity(G) = 2
process: 因为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4+m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1有共同的焦点由(14+m^{2})-m^{2}=4,可得a2+b^{2}=4,即c=2,因为双曲线的离心率为\frac{c}{a}=2=\frac{2}{a}.\thereforea=1,则b=\sqrt{3},所以双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,

text: 已知双曲线$C$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有共同的渐近线，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G:Hyperbola;Expression(G)=(x^2/9-y^2/4=1);Asymptote(C)=Asymptote(G)
process: 易知双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的渐进线方程为y=\pm\frac{2}{3}x,所以若双曲线C的焦点在x轴上,则\frac{b}{a}=\frac{2}{3},所以离心率为e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{4}{9}}=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{3}

text: 对任意的实数$k$，直线$y=k x+1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1$恒有两个交点，则$n$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;n: Number;H: Line;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/n = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$x+y=1$与椭圆$\Gamma$交于$M$、$N$两点，以线段$M N$为直径的圆经过原点. 若椭圆$\Gamma$的离心率不大于$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则$a$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;H: Circle;I: Line;N: Point;M: Point;O:Origin;Expression(I) = (x + y = 1);Expression(Gamma) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Intersection(I, Gamma) = {M, N};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(M,N),H);PointOnCurve(O,H);Negation(Eccentricity(Gamma)>sqrt(3)/2);a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0
process: 设M(x_{1},y_{1}),N(x_{2},y_{2}),联立直线MN与椭圆方程\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\x+y=1\end{cases}消去y得(a^{2}+b^{2})x^{2}-2a^{2}x+a^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}=0,x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=\frac{a2-a2b^{2}}{a^{2}+b^{2}},且a>0化简得a^{2}+b^{2}>1联立直线MN与椭圆方程\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\x+y=1\end{cases},消去x得(a^{2}+b^{2})y^{2}-2b^{2}y+b^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}=0,故y_{1}\cdoty_{2}=\frac{b^{2}-a2b^{2}}{a2+b^{2}},又线段MN为直径的圆经过原点则\overrightarrow{OM}\cdot\overrightarrow{ON}=0,故x_{1}\cdotx_{2}+y_{1}\cdoty_{2}=0,即\frac{a2-a2b^{2}}{a2+b^{2}}+\frac{b^{2}-a2b^{2}}{a2+b^{2}}=0,化简得b^{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{2a^{2}-1}.又椭圆离心率e=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}不大于\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},故\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},即a^{2}>b^{2}\geqslant\frac{1}{4}a^{2},所以a_{2}>\frac{a_{2}}{2a2-1}\geqslant\frac{1}{4}a^{2}\Rightarrow1<2a^{2}-1\leqslant4\Rightarrow1<a\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Circle;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(M) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 3);IsTangent(Asymptote(C),M);Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 由题可知双曲线其中一条渐近线方程y=\frac{b}{a}x因为其与圆M:(x-2)^{2}+y2=3相切,故可得:\sqrt{3}=\frac{|2b|}{\sqrt{a2+b^{2}}}解得\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},则离心率e=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=2

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (3*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 12)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}+m y^{2}=1$的离心率为$2$，则实数$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (m*y^2 + x^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的右焦点为$F$，则点$F$到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2/9 + y^2/16 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F
process: 双曲线C:\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1的焦点在y轴上,所以右焦点为F(0,5)渐近线为:3y\pm4x=0.点F到渐近线的距离为\frac{15}{5}=3.答案为:3.

text: 已知椭圆长轴$A B$的长为$4$ , $N$为椭圆上一点，满足$|N A|=1$ ,$\angle N A B=60^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;MajorAxis(G) = LineSegmentOf(A, B);Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;A: Point;B: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(N, G) ;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, A)) = 1;TriangleOf(N, A, B) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的点$M$到右焦点的距离为$2$，则点$M$到左准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);Distance(M, RightFocus(C)) = 2
process: 因为椭圆C:\frac{x2}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1上的点M到右焦点的距离为2,所以M到左焦点的距离为4-2=2,即M的横坐标为0,即点M到左准线l:x=-4的距离为4

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点作两条互相垂直的弦$A B$, $C D$，则$\frac{1}{|A B|}+\frac{1}{|C D|}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), LineSegmentOf(A, B));PointOnCurve(Focus(G), LineSegmentOf(C, D));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(C, D));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(C, D), G)

text: 已知点$A$、$B$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左右顶点，点$M$为$x$轴上一点，过$M$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆$C$于$P$、$Q$两点，过$M$作$A P$的垂线交$B Q$于点$N$，则$\frac{S_\Delta{ B M N}}{S_\Delta { B  M Q}}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;Q: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;PointOnCurve(M, xAxis);l:Line;PointOnCurve(M,l);Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};l1:Line;PointOnCurve(M, l1);IsPerpendicular(l1,LineSegmentOf(A, P));Intersection(l1, LineSegmentOf(B, Q)) = N;IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis)
process: 设P(m,n).则M(m,0),Q(m,-n),由题设知m\neq\pm2,且n\neq0,直线AP的斜率k_{AP}=\frac{n}{m+2},直线MN的斜率k_{MN}=-\frac{m+2}{n}\therefore直线MN的方程为y=-\frac{m+2}{n}(x-m),直线BQ的方程为y=\frac{n}{2-m}(x-2)联立\begin{cases}y=-\frac{m+2}{n}(x-m)\\y=-\frac{n}{2-m}(x-2)\end{cases},解得y_{N}=-\frac{n(4-m^{2})}{4-m^{2}+n^{2}}又点P在椭圆C上,得4-m^{2}=4n^{2},\thereforey_{N}=-\frac{4}{5}n.又S_{\DeltaBMN}=\frac{1}{2}|BM|\cdot|y_{N}|=\frac{2}{5}|BM|\cdot|n|,S_{\DeltaBMQ}=\frac{1}{2}|BM|\cdot|n|\frac{S_{\DeltaBMN}}{S_{ABMO}}=\frac{4}{5}S_{\DeltaBMQ}

text: 焦点为$(0,-3)$的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P:Point;Coordinate(P)=(0,-3);Focus(G)=P
process: 由于抛物线的焦点为(0,-3),故抛物线开口向下,且\frac{p}{2}=3,故2p=12,抛物线的方程为x^{2}=-12y.青】本小题主要考查抛物线的几何性质以及抛物线的标准方程的求法.属于基础题

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则$m$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)
process: 双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{m}x,又已知一条渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x,\therefore\sqrt{m}=\sqrt{3},m=3,

text: 设斜率为$2$的直线过抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a>0)$的焦点$F$，且和$y$轴交于点$A$，若$\triangle OAF$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$4$，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Slope(H) = 2;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);a: Number;a>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H) = True;Intersection(H, yAxis) = A;O: Origin;A: Point;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, F)) = 4

text: 若中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的椭圆的一个焦点为$(2,0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$\sqrt{3}$倍，则标准方程为?
fact_expressions: Center(G) = O;O: Origin;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;G: Ellipse;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = Length(MinorAxis(G))*sqrt(3);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(2,0)
process: 由已知\begin{cases}c=2\\2a=2\sqrt{3}b\\a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}\end{cases},解得b^{2}=2,a^{2}=6故标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 直线$l$: $y=2 x+m$与抛物线$y=x^{2}$切于点$A$ , $l$与$y$轴的交点为$B$，且$O$为原点，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{A B}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Expression(l) = (y=2*x+m);TangentPoint(l,G)=A;Intersection(l, yAxis) = B;m: Number
process: 对直线求导,设切点为(x,y),y=2x=2\Rightarrowx=1,y=1,将切点代入直线得到m=-1,L:y=2x-1,B(0,-1),A(1,1),\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{AB}=(1,1)\cdot(-1,-2)=-3.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1)
process: 试题分析:根据事务性的方程可得a,b,c的数值,进而求出双曲线的离心率.解:因为双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1,所以a^{2}=4,a=2,b^{2}=5,所以c^{2}=9,c=3,所以离心率e=\frac{3}{2}.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$，则实数$x$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;x: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1)
process: 试题分析:由方程可知0\leqslant\frac{x^{2}}{5}\leqslant1\therefore0\leqslantx^{2}\leqslant5\therefore-\sqrt{5}\leqslantx\leqslant\sqrt{5}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线上两点$A$、$B$的中点坐标为$(2 , 2)$，则直线$A B$的斜率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,Asymptote(G));PointOnCurve(B,Asymptote(G));Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)))=(2,2)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1,a=2,b=1,渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{2}x.设直线AB的方程为y-2=k(x-2),k\neq\pm\frac{1}{2}由\begin{cases}y-2=k(x-2)\\y=\frac{1}{2}x\\y-2=k(x-2)\\y=-\frac{1}{1+2k}\end{cases}所以\frac{4-4k}{1-2k}+\frac{4k-4}{1+2k}=2\times2=4\Rightarrowk=\frac{1}{4}所以直线AB的斜率是\frac{1}{4}

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点为焦点的抛物线标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=Focus(H)
process: 设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=-2px,其焦点为(-\frac{p}{2},0).因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1的左焦点为(-3,0),所以-\frac{p}{2}=-3,所以p=6,所以抛物线方程为v2=-12x

text: $P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右支上一点,$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为左、右焦点,则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$内切圆圆心的横坐标为?

text: 斜率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$的直线与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$交于不同的两点$P$、$Q$. 若点$P$、$Q$在$x$轴上的投影恰好为椭圆的两焦点，则该椭圆的焦距为?
fact_expressions: L: Line;Slope(L) = sqrt(2)/2;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);P: Point;Q: Point;Negation(P=Q);Intersection(L, G) = {P, Q};F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Projection(P, xAxis) = F1;Projection(Q, xAxis) = F2
process: 试题分析:由题意P,Q两点关于原点对称,设P(-c,-n),则有Q(c,n),于是有\frac{n-(-n)}{c-(-c)}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},即n=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{c}c'把Q点坐标代入椭圆方程有_{c}2+\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1'又b^{2}=1-c^{2}代入上式解得c^{2}=\frac{1}{2}(c^{2}=2舍去),c=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},焦距为2c=\sqrt{2}

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>3;F2: Point;F1: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2)) = 8;PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 \sqrt{5} x$上的点$A$的横坐标是$\frac{3}{2}\sqrt{5}$则$A$到其焦点$F$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*sqrt(5)*x);XCoordinate(A) = 3*sqrt(5)/2;PointOnCurve(A,G);Focus(G)=F
process: 解:抛物线y^{2}=2\sqrt{5}x的准线方程为:x=-\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}抛物线y^{2}=2\sqrt{5}x上的点A的横坐标是\frac{3}{2}\sqrt{5}则A到其焦点F距离为:\frac{3}{3}\sqrt{5}+\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}=2\sqrt{5}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$\frac{5}{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 5/3
process: 由题可知,双曲线焦点在x轴上,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{5}{3},又因为在双曲线中,c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{25}{9},故\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3},所以双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm\frac{4}{3}x

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9-k}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$x+2 y=0$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/(9 - k) = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (x + 2*y = 0)
process: 由题知:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9-k}=1,a=2,b=\sqrt{9-k},焦点在x轴.因为一条渐近线方程为x+2y=0,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{9-k}}{2}=\frac{1}{2},解得k=8

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$，过点$P(-2,1)$作直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$点，若点$P$恰好为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/8 + y^2/6 = 1);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-2, 1);l: Line;PointOnCurve(P, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$, $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是椭圆$C$的两个焦点，若点$P$是椭圆上一点，满足那么$|PF_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，且$F_{2}$到直线$PF_{1}$的距离等于椭圆的短轴长，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Distance(F2, LineOf(P, F1)) = Length(MinorAxis(C))

text: 经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，$F_{2}$是右焦点，则$\triangle A F_{2} B$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G)={A,B};RightFocus(G) = F2
process: 因为椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y2}{16}=1所以a=5,根据椭圆的定义:AF_{1}+AF_{2}=2a,BF_{1}+BF_{2}=2aAAF_{2}B的周长为4a=20.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$作一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$P$ , $\triangle O P F$的面积为$\sqrt{2}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;F: Point;L:Line;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,L);IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),L);FootPoint(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),L)=P;Area(TriangleOf(O, P, F)) = sqrt(2)
process: 设过右焦点F(c,0),且与一条渐近线x-ay=0垂直的直线为l.则l的方程可写为:y=-a(x-c)由\begin{cases}y=\frac{1}{a}x\\y=-a(x-c)\end{cases}得:\begin{cases}x=\frac{a2c}{1+a^{2}}\\y=\frac{ac}{1+a2}\end{cases},即点P坐标为(\frac{a_{2}}{1+a^{2}},\frac{ac}{1+a^{2}})由双曲线的方程知:c^{2}=1+a^{2},\thereforeP(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{a}{c}),\thereforeS_{\DeltaOPF}=\frac{1}{2}OF\cdot|y_{P}|=\frac{1}{2}c\cdot\frac{a}{c}=\sqrt{2}\frac{1}{2}|OF|\timesy_{P}=\frac{1}{2}c\times\frac{a}{c}=\sqrt{2}\thereforea=2\sqrt{2}.\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}+1=8+1=9,\thereforee=\frac{3}{2},=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$是椭圆上的一点，若$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$\triangle F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 根据椭圆方程可知a=3,c=2,设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,依题意有\begin{cases}m+n=2a=6\\m^{2}+n^{2}=(2c)^{2}=16\end{cases},所以(m+n)^{2}-2mn=16,6^{2}-2mn=16,mn=10,所以三角形F_{1}PF_{2}的面积为\frac{1}{2}mn=5

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$的左, 右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆$C$上，$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为$16$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (y^2/16 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Perimeter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 16
process: 设焦距为2c,因为\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的周长为16,所以2a+2c=16,化简得a+c=8\textcircled{1}.又a^{2}-c^{2}=16,所以(a+c)(a-c)=16.可得a-c=2\textcircled{2},由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2},解得a=5.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$M$，若$P$为抛物线上任意一点，$P F$的中点为$Q$，则直线$Q M$的斜率的最大值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;M: Point;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = M;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Q: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = Q
process: 依题意F(1,0),M(-1,0).设P(x_{0},y_{0}),则Q(\frac{x_{0}+1}{2},\frac{y_{0}}{2}),y_{0}^{2}=4x_{0},所以直线QM的斜率k\frac{y_{0}}{\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{4}+3}\leqslant\frac{y_{0}}{2\cdot\frac{y_{0}}{2}}0\_=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}.\sqrt{3}当且仅当\frac{y_{0}}{2}=\sqrt{3},即y_{0}=2\sqrt{3}时取等号故直线QM的斜率的最大值等于\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{3} x$的准线过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点，椭圆的长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍, 则该椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*(sqrt(3)*x));a>0;b>0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(H)), Directrix(G));Length(MajorAxis(H)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(H))
process: 试题分析:抛物线的准线方程是x=-\sqrt{3},那么椭圆的半焦距c=\sqrt{3},a=2b,结合a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2},解得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=1,所以方程是\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1

text: 已知椭圆$C$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点若$|A F_{1}|=2|F_{1} B|$ ,$|A B|=|B F_{2}|$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;A: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) ={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, B));Intersection(G,C) = {B, A};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2))
process: 根据题意,作图如下:设|BF_{1}|=x,则|AF_{1}|=2x,|BF_{2}|=|AB|=3x,由椭圆的定义知|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=x+3x=4x=2a因为|AF_{1}|=2x,所以|AF_{2}|=2x,在\triangleABF_{2}中,由余弦定理可得\cos\angleABF_{2}=\frac{|AB|^{2}+|BF_{2}|^{2}-|AF_{2}|^{2}}{2|AB|\cdot|BF_{2}|}=\frac{(3x)^{2}+(3x)^{2}-(2x)^{2}}{2\cdot3x\cdot3x}=\frac{7}{9}在\triangleBF_{1}F_{2}中,由余弦定理可得,|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=|BF_{1}|^{2}+|BF_{2}|^{2}-2|BF_{1}|\cdot|BF_{2}|\cdot\cos\angleABF_{2}即|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=x^{2}+(3x)^{2}-2\cdotx\cdot3x\cdot\frac{7}{9},解得|F_{1}F_{2}|=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}x'所以2a=4x,2c=\frac{4\sqrt{3}}{3}x'所以椭圆离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}x}{2x}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，斜率为$1$的直线过$M(b , 0)$且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=\frac{32}{5 \tan \angle A O B}$，则椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2;H: Line;Slope(H) = 1;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (b, 0);PointOnCurve(M, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};O: Origin;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 32/(5*Tan(AngleOf(A, O, B)))
process: 由题意e=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{c}{a},b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2},可得a^{2}=4b^{2},所以椭圆的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4b^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1由题意可得直线AB的方程为:y=x-联立\begin{cases}y=x-b\\\frac{x^{2}}{4b^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1'\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}x=0\\y=-b\end{cases}或a=\frac{8}{5}b\overset-a-y=\frac{3}{\frac{3}{5}}b所以设\overrightarrow{OA}=(0,-b),\overrightarrow{OL}(\frac{8}{5}b,\frac{3}{5}b),\frac{5}{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=-\frac{3}{5}=\frac{-\frac{3}{5}b^{2}}{b\sqrt{\frac{64}{25}+\frac{9}{25}b}}=-\frac{3}{\sqrt{73}}\frac{-\sqrt{73-9}}{3}=-\frac{8}{3}所以b^{2}=4,所以椭圆的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,

fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = ((x + 2)^2 + y^2 = 81);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = ((x - 2)^2 + y^2 = 9);M: Circle;IsInTangent(M, C1);IsOutTangent(M, C2);M1: Point;Center(M) = M1
process: 析】根据题意可得|MC_{1}|+|MC_{2}|=12>|C_{1}C_{2}|,可判断圆心M点的轨迹是以C_{1},C_{2}为焦点的椭圆.即可求出.由题可得圆C_{1}的圆心为C_{1}(-2,0),半径为r_{1}=9,圆C_{2}的圆心为C_{2}(2,0),半径为r_{2}=3,设动圆M的半径为r.因为动圆M与圆C_{1}内切,则由题可知圆M在圆C_{1}内部,所以|MC_{1}|=9因为动圆M与圆C_{2}外切,所以|MC_{2}|=3+r则|MC_{1}|+|MC_{2}|=12>|C_{1}C_{2}|.所以圆心M点的轨迹是以C_{1},C_{2}为焦点的椭圆,即a=6,c=2,则b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=32所以圆心M点的轨迹方程是\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{32}=1

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;p > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (-6*x + x^2 + y^2 - 7 = 0);IsTangent(H, Directrix(G))

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$且斜率大于$0$的直线$l$交抛物线于点$A$、$B$（点$A$于第一象限），交其准线于点$C$，若$|B C|=3|B F|$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) > 0;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Intersection(l,Directrix(G)) = C;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 过B作BD\botl于D(l是准线),可得|BC|=3|BD|,\angleCBD与直线AB倾斜角相等,求出\tan\angleCBD即可得结论.如图,作BD\botl于D(l是准线),则|BD|=|BF|,由题意|BC|=3|BD|,\therefore|CD|=2\sqrt{2}|BD|\tan\angleCBD=\frac{|CD|}{|BD|}=2\sqrt{2},由BD\botl知BD//x轴,\angleCBD与直线AB倾斜角相等\thereforeAB的斜率为2\sqrt{2}.

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$且斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线$l$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$A B=8$，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;k: Number;k > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) = k;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};LineSegmentOf(A, B) = 8

text: 若抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M(a, b)$到焦点$F$的距离为$5$， 以$M$为圆心且过点$F$的圆与$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Circle;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a: Number;b: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (a, b);PointOnCurve(M, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(M, F) = 5;Center(G) = M;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, yAxis) = {A, B}
process: 由题意,a+1=5,得a=4,b=\pm4,则|AB|=2\times3=6.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{16 y^{2}}{p^{2}}=1$的左焦点在抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的准线上，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + (16*y^2)/p^2 = 1);p: Number;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(LeftFocus(H), Directrix(G)) = True

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$满足$b \geq 9$，则该双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b >= 9

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=6 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$A$在抛物线$C$上，且点$A$到准线$l$的距离为$6$，$A F$的垂直平分线与准线$l$交于点$N$，点$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O F N$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;N: Point;l: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 6*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(A, C);Distance(A, l) = 6;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, F)), l) = N
process: 由题意得F(\frac{3}{2},0),l:x=-\frac{3}{2}设点A的坐标为(m,n),由A到准线l的距离为6得m+\frac{3}{2}=6,得m=\frac{9}{2},代入抛物线的方程,得n=\pm3\sqrt{3}由抛物线的对称性,可设A(\frac{9}{2},3\sqrt{3}),则直线AF的斜率为k_{AF}=\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}-\frac{3}{2}=\sqrt{3}又线段AF的中点坐标为(3,\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2})所以AF的垂直平分线的方程为y-\frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2}=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-3)令x=-\frac{3}{2},得y=3\sqrt{3},即N(-\frac{3}{2},3\sqrt{3})所以\triangleOFN的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{3}{2}\times3\sqrt{3}=\frac{9\sqrt{3}}{4}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1$，过椭圆$C$的右焦点$F$作直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，交$y$轴于$M$点，且点$B$在线段$F M$上，则$\frac{|M B|}{|B F|}-\frac{|M A|}{|A F|}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;F: Point;M: Point;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 + y^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l, yAxis) =M;PointOnCurve(B, LineSegmentOf(F,M))
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))

text: 已知直线$y=k(x-4)$与圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=36$交于$M$、$N$两点，则线段$M N$的中点$G$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: L: Line;O: Circle;M: Point;N: Point;G: Point;Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 36);Expression(L) = (y = k*(x - 4));Intersection(L, O) = {M, N};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = G
process: 解:设线段MN的中点坐标为(x,y),由于直线y=k(x-4)与圆O:x^{2}+y^{2}=36交于M、N两点,则k_{MN}\cdotk_{OM}=-1,即\frac{y}{x}\cdot\frac{y}{x-4}=-1,整理得y^{2}+x^{2}-4x=0,转换为(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4,当x=4时,直线的斜率不存在,由于直线的斜率存在,故舍去故线段MN的中点G的轨迹方程为(x-2)^{2}+y2=4(x\neq4)

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);0<x0^2/2+y0^2;x0^2/2+y0^2<1

G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;E: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/48 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x + 7)^2 = 9);Expression(E) = ((x - 7)^2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));PointOnCurve(M, H);PointOnCurve(N, E)
process: 解:双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{48}=1中,\becausea=1,b=4\sqrt{3},c=7,\thereforeF_{1}(-7,0),F_{2}(7,0),因为M,N分别是圆(x+7)^{2}+y^{2}=9和(x-7)^{2}+y^{2}=1上的点,所以|MF_{1}|=3,|NF_{2}|=1\because|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a=2,\therefore|MP|\leqslant|PF_{1}|+|MF_{1}|,|PN|\geqslant|PF_{2}|-|NF_{2}|,\therefore-|PN|\leqslant-|PF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|,所以|PM|-|PN|\leqslant|PF_{1}|+|MF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|+|NF_{2}|=2+|+3=6

text: 已知直线$a x+y+2=0$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的一条渐近线平行，则这两条平行直线之间的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;a: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (a*x + y + 2 = 0);l1: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(G)) = l1;IsParallel(H,l1)
process: 因为直线ax+y+2=0与双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的一条渐近线y=2x平行,所以-a=2,(或者-a=2),则a=-2(a=2,)假设a=2,则利用平行线间距离公式解得为d=\frac{b}{\frac{1}{5}}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{100}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上一点$P$到它的右准线的距离是$10$，那么$P$点到左焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/100 + y^2/36 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P,RightDirectrix(G)) = 10

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，过$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|-|B F|=4$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;Focus(C) = F;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 4

text: 若抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点在直线$x+2 y-2=0$上，则直线截抛物线的弦长为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(G) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G)
process: 分析:求出已知直线与x轴的交点坐标,得抛物线的焦点,然后求出抛物线方程中的参数p,联立直线方程与抛物线方程求出两交点坐标,最后由两点间距离公式求得弦长.详解:在x+2y-2:=0中,令y=0得x=2,\therefore\frac{p}{2}=2,p=4,即抛物线方程为y^{2}=8x,由0,解得\begin{cases}x_{1}=10-8\sqrt{5}\\y_{1}=-4+4\sqrt{5}\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x_{2}=10+8\sqrt{5}\\y_{2}=-4-4\sqrt{5}\end{cases},x_{2}^{2}+(y_{-}-y)^{2}=\sqrt{(-16\sqrt{5})^{2}+(8\sqrt{5})^{2}}=40\therefore弦长为\sqrt{(x})

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在此双曲线上，$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，如果此双曲线的离心率等于$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，那么点$P$到$x$轴的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F2),VectorOf(P, F1)) = 0;Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)/2

text: 双曲线$2 x^{2}-3 y^{2}=k(k<0)$的焦点坐标是 (用$k$表示)?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;k<0;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 - 3*y^2 = k)
process: 双曲线2x^{2}-3y^{2}=k(k<0),化为\frac{y^{2}}{-\frac{k}{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{-\frac{k}{2}}=1根据双曲线方程的几何意义可知c=\sqrt{-\frac{k}{3}-\frac{k}{2}}=\sqrt{-\frac{5k}{6}}\therefore双曲线焦点坐标为(0,\pm\sqrt{-\frac{5k}{6}})

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$中过点$P(1,1)$的弦恰好被$P$点平分，则此弦所在直线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);IsChordOf(H, G);PointOnCurve(P, H);MidPoint(H) = P
process: 设直线与椭圆的两个交点坐标为(x_{1},y_{1});(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\\\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1\end{cases}导\underline{(x_{1}+x_{2})}+\frac{(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})}{=}\becauseP(1为中点,2(y_{1}-y_{2})k=\frac{y_{2}^{2}-y_{1}}{x_{2}-x_{1}}=-\frac{1}{2}\therefore此弦所在直线的方程是y-1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1),即x+2v-3=0b答字为:x+2v-3=0

text: 若$(k^{2}+k-2) x^{2}+(k+3) y^{2}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线,则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2*(k^2 + k - 2) + y^2*(k + 3) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);k: Number

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线与直线$l$: $x-2 y-\sqrt{5}=0$平行，且双曲线的一个焦点在直线$l$上，则双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - 2*y - sqrt(5) = 0);IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), l) = True;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), l)

text: 过点$M(1,1)$作斜率为$\frac{1}{2}$的直线与双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$M$是线段$A B$的中点，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;Expression(Gamma) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);H: Line;Slope(H) = 1/2;PointOnCurve(M, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, Gamma) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 解:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\frac{x_{1}2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\textcircled{1},\frac{x_{2}2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y_{2}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\textcircled{2},\becauseM是线段AB的中点,\therefore\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=1,\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=1\because直线AB的方程是y=\frac{1}{2}(x-1)+1,\thereforey_{1}-y_{2}=\frac{1}{2}(x_{1}-x_{2}),\because过点M(1,1)作斜率为\frac{1}{2}的直线与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)相交于A,B两点,M是线段AB的中点,\therefore\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}两式相减可得\frac{x_{1}2-x_{2}2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y_{1}2-y_{2}}{b^{2}}=0,即\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}^{2}-x_{2}^{2}}=\frac{(y_{1}-y_{2})(y_{1}+y_{2})}{(x_{1}-x_{2})(x_{1}+x_{2})}=\frac{1}{2},\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$O$为坐标原点，若$E$上存在点$A$，使得$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，且$|O A|=b$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;O: Origin;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, E);AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = b
process: 如下图所示:不妨设A为第一象限内的点,因为在\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中,由余弦定理可知|AF_{1}|^{2}+|AF_{2}|^{2}+|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=4c^{2}.又因为\overrightarrow{AF}_{1}+\overrightarrow{AF_{2}}=2\overrightarrow{AO},所以(\overrightarrow{AF}_{1}+\overrightarrow{AF}_{2})^{2}=(2\overrightarrow{AO})^{2}所以|AF_{1}|^{2}+|AF_{2}|^{2}-|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}=4b^{2}所以2|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=4c^{2}-4b^{2}=4a^{2},所以|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=2a^{2},又因为|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|=2a,所以|AF_{1}|^{2}+|AF_{2}|^{2}+|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=(|AF_{1}|-|AF_{2}|)^{2}+3|AF_{1}|\cdot|AF_{2}|=10a^{2}所以10a^{2}=4c^{2},所以\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{2},所以e=\frac{a}{c}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{2}

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{2-m^{2}}=1$的两条渐近线互相垂直，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(2 - m^2) + x^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};IsPerpendicular(L1,L2)
process: 解:\because双曲线\frac{x2}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{2-m^{2}}=1的焦点在x轴上.\begin{cases}m>0\\2-m2>0\end{cases},即0<m<\sqrt{2}\because双曲线的两条渐近线互相垂直-\frac{\sqrt{2-m^{2}}}{\sqrt{m}}\times\frac{\sqrt{2-m^{2}}}{\sqrt{m}}=-1,即(m-1)(m+2)=0,解得m=1(负值舍去)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$，焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $P$为抛物线上一点，$P A \perp l$ , $A$为垂足, 如果直线$A F$的斜率为$-\sqrt{3}$，那么$P F$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;A: Point;P: Point;l: Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, A), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, A), l) = A;Slope(LineOf(A, F)) = -sqrt(3)

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$y=k x$与曲线$C$交于$A$，$B$两点，$|A F_{1}|=3|B F_{1}|$，且$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;k: Number;A: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = k*x);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F1));AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 如图所示:根据双曲线和直线y=kx的对称性可知,|BF_{1}|=|AF_{2}|,设|AF_{2}|=m(m>0),则|AF_{1}|=3|BF_{1}|=3m,在\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中,(2c)^{2}=m^{2}+9m^{2}-2\timesm\times3m\times\frac{1}{2},解得m=\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}}c所以由双曲线定义可得3m-m=2a,即a=\frac{2}{\sqrt{7}}c,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}

text: 焦点在直线$3 x-4 y-12=0$上，并且是标准的抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x - 4*y - 12 = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H)

text: 已知$A$、$B$、$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上不同的三点，且$A$、$B$连线经过坐标原点$O$，若直线$P A$ ,$P B$的斜率乘积$k_{P A} \cdot k_{P B}=3$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A = B);Negation(A = P);Negation(B = P);PointOnCurve(O, LineSegmentOf(A, B));kPA: Number;kPB: Number;Slope(LineOf(P, A)) = kPA;Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = kPB;kPA*kPB = 3

text: 已知点$M(\frac{3}{2},-1)$，直线$l$过抛物线$C$:$ x^{2}=4 y$的焦点交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，且$A M$恰与抛物线$C$相切，那么线段$A B$的中点坐标为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (3/2, -1);l:Line;C:Parabola;Expression(C)=(x^2=4*y);A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),l);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};IsTangent(LineSegmentOf(A,M),C)
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}^{2}=4y_{1},\textcircled{1}抛物线C:y=\frac{1}{4}x^{2},其导数为:y=\frac{x}{2},所以有\frac{x_{1}}{2}=\frac{y_{1}+1}{x_{1}-\frac{3}{2}},\textcircled{2}联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}得:x_{1}=4或x_{1}=-1,\thereforey_{1}=4或y_{1}=\frac{1}{4},\thereforeA(4,4)或A(-1,\frac{1}{4}),抛物线焦点F(0,1)\thereforek=\frac{4-1}{4-0}=\frac{3}{4},或_{k}=\frac{\frac{1}{4}-1}{-1-0}=\frac{3}{4}所以直线l的方程为:y=\frac{3}{4}x+1联立直线l与抛物线C的方程\begin{cases}y=\frac{3}{4}x+\\x2=4v\end{cases}消去y得:x2-3x-4=0,所以x_{1}+x_{2}=3,v_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{3}{4}(x_{1}+x_{2})+2=\frac{17}{4}所以\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2}=\frac{3}{2},\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}=\frac{17}{8}所以AB的中点坐标为(\frac{3}{2},\frac{17}{8})

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2=4*x);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 0);L: Line;PointOnCurve(H,L) = True;Intersection(L,G) = {P,Q};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (x2,y2);x2: Number;y2: Number

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，点$Q$是圆$C$:$(x+3)^{2}+(y-3)^{2}=1$上的动点，点$R$是点$P$在$y$轴上的射影，则$|P Q|+|P R|$的最小值是?

process: 根据抛物线的定义,可知|PR|=|PF|-1,而|PQ|的最小值是|PC|-1,所以|PQ|+|PR|的最小值就是|PF|+|PC|-2的最小值,当C,P,F三点共线时,此时|PF|+|FC|最小,最小值是

text: 已知椭圆$E$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}(-1,0)$, $F_{2}(1,0)$，点$C(1, \frac{3}{2})$在椭圆$E$上，若点$P$在椭圆$E$上，且$t=\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$，则实数$t$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(E) = {F1, F2};Coordinate(F1) = (-1, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (1, 0);C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (1, 3/2);PointOnCurve(C, E);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);t: Real;t = DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2))
process: 首先利用待定系数法求出椭圆方程,设P(x_{0},y_{0}),由\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=t,推出x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}=t+1.点P在曲线C上,\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{3}=1'得y_{0}^{2}=t+1-x_{0}^{2},然后求出0\leqslantx_{0}^{2}\leqslant4,解出2\leqslantt\leqslant3.得到实数t的取值范围.羊解】解:依题意,设椭圆E的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),由题知半焦距c=1,所以a^{2}-b^{2}=1因为点C(1,\frac{3}{2})在椭圆E上,则\frac{1}{a^{2}}+\frac{9}{4b^{2}}=1,解得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=3,则椭圆E的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1.设P(x_{0},y_{0}),由\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=t,得(-1-x_{0},-y_{0})\cdot(1-x_{0},-y_{0})=t,即t=x_{0}^{2}+y_{0}^{2}-1,由于点P在E上,所以\frac{x_{0}^{2}}{4}+\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{3}=1'因此t=\frac{1}{4}x_{0}^{2}+2,由于-2\leqslantx_{0}\leqslant2,所以0\leqslantx_{0}^{2}\leqslant4,故2\leqslantt\leqslant3,即实数的取值范围为[2,3].

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与圆$M$: $x^{2}+y^{2}+2 \sqrt{2} x-4 \sqrt{2} y+10-r^{2}=0(0<r<\sqrt{2})$，过椭圆$C$的上顶点$P$作圆$M$的两条切线，分别与椭圆$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点 (不同于$P$点)，则直线$P A$与直线$P B$的斜率之积等于?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;M: Circle;r: Number;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/8 + y^2/2 = 1);0 < r;r < sqrt(2);Expression(M) = (-r^2 - 4*sqrt(2)*y + 2*(sqrt(2)*x) + x^2 + y^2 + 10 = 0);UpperVertex(C)=P;L1:Line;L2:Line;TangentOfPoint(P,M)={L1,L2};Intersection(L1,C)=A;Intersection(L2,C)=B;Negation(A=P);Negation(B=P)

text: 若$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}+12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4-m^{2}}=1$表示双曲线方程，则该双曲线的离心率的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G)=(x^2/(m^2+12)-y^2/(4-m^2)=1);m:Number

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=4$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 4)
process: 由x^{2}-y^{2}=4得\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1\thereforea^{2}=4,b^{2}=4\Rightarrowa=2,b=2所以渐近线方程为y=\pmx

text: 点$P(4,1)$平分双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$的一条弦，则这条弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 4);Coordinate(P) = (4, 1);MidPoint(H) = P;IsChordOf(H, G)

text: 中心在坐标原点的椭圆，其离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，两个焦点$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$在$x$轴上，$P$为该椭圆上的任意一点，若$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|=4$，则椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;O:Origin;Center(G)=O;PointOnCurve(P, G);Eccentricity(G)=1/2;Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1,xAxis);PointOnCurve(F2,xAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 4
process: 由题得\begin{cases}2a=4\\\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}\end{cases}\thereforea=2,c=1,\thereforeb=\sqrt{2^{2}-1^{2}}=\sqrt{3}因为两个焦点F_{1}和F_{2}在x轴上,所以椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = (x^2 + y^2 = 9);NumIntersection(C,C1) = 2;C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = (x^2 + y^2 = 8);NumIntersection(C,C2) = 2
process: 根据圆和椭圆的对称性可知,圆C_{1}与椭圆C交于长轴的两端点,圆C_{2}与椭圆C交于短轴的两端点,即可求出a,b的值,进而求出椭圆C的标准方程.根据圆和椭圆的对称性可知,圆C_{1}与椭圆C交于长轴的两端点,圆C_{2}与椭圆C交于短轴的两端点,所以a=3,b=2\sqrt{2},故椭圆C的标准方程是\frac{x^{2}}{0}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1.

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=-2 p x(p>0)$上有一点$M$，其横坐标为$-9$，它到焦点的距离为$10$，则点$M$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);PointOnCurve(M, G);XCoordinate(M) = -9;Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 10
process: 由抛物线方程y^{2}=-2px(p>0),得其焦点坐标为F(-\frac{p}{2},0),准线方程为x=\frac{p}{2}设点M到准线的距离为d,则d=|MF|=10,即\frac{p}{2}-(-9)=10,得p=2,故抛物线方程为y^{2}=-4x.由点M(-9,y)在抛物线上,得y=\pm6故点M的坐标为(-9,6)或(-9,-6)

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(M) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 8);Intersection(OneOf(Asymptote(C)),M) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 设双曲线的渐近线方程为y=kx,其中k=\pm\frac{b}{a},圆(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=8的圆心为C(3,0),半径为r=2\sqrt{2}圆心C到直线y=kx的距离为d=\frac{|3k|}{\sqrt{k^{2}+1}}\because|AB|=2\sqrt{2},由勾股定理可得r_{2}=(\frac{|AB|}{2})^{2}+d^{2},即2+(\frac{|3k|}{\sqrt{k^{2}+1}})^{2}=8解得k=\pm\sqrt{2},\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{2},因此,该双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a2}}=\sqrt{\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知点$P$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$右支上一动点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线的左、右焦点，动点$Q$满足下列条件：($1$)$\overrightarrow{Q F_{2}} \cdot(\frac{\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}}{|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}}{|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|})=0$，($2$)$\overrightarrow{Q P}+\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}}{|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}}{|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|})=0$，则点$Q$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Q: Point;lambda: Number;DotProduct(VectorOf(Q, F2), (VectorOf(P, F1)/Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) + VectorOf(P, F2)/Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)))) = 0;VectorOf(Q, P) + lambda*(VectorOf(P, F1)/Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) + VectorOf(P, F2)/Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))) = 0
process: 设动点Q的坐标为(x,y),延长F_{2}Q交PF于点A,根据向量的加法法则及数量积为0,可得QF_{2}\botPQ,利用双曲线的定义可得|OQ|=\frac{1}{2}|AF_{1}|=1,即可得答案设动点Q的坐标为(x,y),延长F_{2}Q交PF_{1}于点A,由条件\textcircled{2}知点Q在\angleF_{1}PF_{2}的角平分线上,结合条件\textcircled{1}知QF_{2}\botPQ,所以在\trianglePF_{2}A中,PQ\botF_{2}A.又PQ平分\angleAPF_{2}所以\trianglePF_{2}A为等腰三角形,即|PA|=|PF_{2}|,|AQ|=|QF_{2}|因为点P为双曲线上的点,所以|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2,即|PA|+|AF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2所以|AF_{1}|=2.又在\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中,Q为AF_{2}的中点,O为F_{1}F_{2}的中点所以|OQ|=\frac{1}{2}|AF_{1}|=1,所以点Q的轨迹是以O为圆心,半径为1的圆,所以点Q的轨迹方程为x^{2}+y^{2}=1(y\neq0)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的左、右焦点，若点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/7 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0
process: 由椭圆的方程\frac{x2}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1,得a=4,则c^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=9,又\overrightarrow{PF}_{1}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,所以|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}=4c^{2},即(\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}})^{2}-2\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=36所以4\times16-2|\overrightarrow{PF}|.|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=36,即|\overrightarrow{PF}|.|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=14,所以|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}+2\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|)^{2}-2|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}||\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|4a^{2}-2\times14=36,所以|\overrightarrow{PF}|+\overrightarrow{PF}|=6.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$P$是抛物线$C$上一点，过点$P$作$l$的垂线，垂足为$A$，准线$l$与$x$轴的交点设为$B$，若$\angle B A F=30^{\circ}$，且$\triangle A P F$的面积为$12 \sqrt{3}$，则以$P F$为直径的圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Z: Line;PointOnCurve(P, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, l);A: Point;FootPoint(Z, l) = A;B: Point;Intersection(l, xAxis) = B;AngleOf(B, A, F) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);Area(TriangleOf(A, P, F)) = 12*sqrt(3);G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(P, F), G)
process: 由题意作出图形如图所示:因为\angleBAF=30^{\circ},故\angleAFB=60^{\circ}=\anglePAF,由抛物线的定义可知|PA|=|PF|,故\triangleAPF为等边三角形因为\triangleAPF的面积为12\sqrt{3},故|PF|=|PA|=|AF|=4\sqrt{3}所以|BF|=\frac{1}{2}|AF|=2\sqrt{3}=p,所以抛物线方程为y^{2}=4\sqrt{3}x,点F(\sqrt{3},0)所以点P的横坐标为|PA|-\frac{|BF|}{2}=3\sqrt{3},代入y^{2}=4\sqrt{3}x中,解得y=\pm6,所以点P(3\sqrt{3},\pm6),所以所求圆的圆心为(2\sqrt{3},\pm3),半径为\frac{|PF|}{2}=2\sqrt{3}故所求圆的标准方程为(x-2\sqrt{3})^{2}+(y\pm3)^{2}=12.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;c: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = b^2*(sqrt(2)/2)
process: 试题分析:记|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\alpha,由已知\frac{1}{2}mn\sin\alpha=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}b^{2},mn=\frac{\sqrt{2}b^{2}}{\sin\alpha},又m+n=2a,(2c)^{2}=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos\alpha=(m+n)^{2}-2mn-2mn\cos\alpha,即2mn(1+\cos\alpha)=4a^{2}-4c^{2}=4b^{2},所以\frac{2\sqrt{2}b^{2}}{\sin\alpha}\cdot(1+\cos\alpha)=4b^{2},1+\cos\alpha=\sqrt{2}\sin\alpha,(1+\cos\alpha)^{2}=2\sin^{2}\alpha=2(1-\cos^{2}\alpha)3\cos^{2}\alpha+2\cos\alpha-1=0,所以\cos\alpha=\frac{1}{3}(\cos\alpha=-1舍去)

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的一个焦点且与$x$轴垂直的直线，交该双曲线的两条渐近线于$P$、$Q$两点，则$|P Q |$=?

process: 由已知可得p=2.如图过A作AA_{1}\botl,垂足为A_{1},\thereforex_{A}+\frac{p}{2}=5,x_{A}=4,代入y^{2}=4x得y_{4}=\pm4,\thereforeA(4,4)或A(4,-4).不妨设A(4,4),又F(1,0),直线AB方程为\frac{y-0}{4-0}=\frac{x-1}{4-1},即x=\frac{3}{4}y+1,代入y^{2}=4x得y^{2}=3y+4,y_{B}=-1\thereforeS_{\DeltaAOB}=\frac{1}{2}|OF|(|y_{A}|+|y_{B}|)=\frac{1}{2}\times1\times(4+1)=\frac{5}{2}

text: 过点$P(1,1)$的直线$l$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$交于点$A$和$B$，且$\overrightarrow{A P}=\lambda \overrightarrow{P B}$点$Q$满足$\overrightarrow{A Q}=-\lambda \overrightarrow{Q B}$，若$O$为坐标原点，且$Q(m, n)$，则$\frac{m}{4}+\frac{n}{3}$的值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;P: Point;Q: Point;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);Coordinate(Q) = (m, n);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};lambda: Number;VectorOf(A, P) = lambda*VectorOf(P, B);VectorOf(A, Q) = -lambda*VectorOf(Q, B)
process: 由题意,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),点P(1,1),点Q(m,n)由\overrightarrow{AP}=\lambda\overrightarrow{PB},\overrightarrow{AQ}=-\lambda\overrightarrow{QB},则1-x_{1}=\lambda(x_{2}-1),m-x_{1}=-\lambda(x_{2}-m)即x_{1}+\lambdax_{2}=1+\lambda,x_{1}-\lambdax_{2}=m(1-\lambda)两式相乘可得:x_{1}^{2}-\lambda^{2}x_{2}^{2}=m(1-\lambda^{2}),即\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{4}-\frac{\lambda^{2}x_{2}^{2}}{4}=\frac{m}{4}(1-\lambda^{2})\cdots\cdots\textcircled{1}同理可得:\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{3}-\frac{\lambda^{2}y_{2}^{2}}{3}=\frac{n}{3}(1-\lambda^{2})\cdots\cdots\textcircled{2},又点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})在椭圆上,即\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1'\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1由\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}相加可得:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{\lambda^{2}x_{2}^{2}}{4}+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{3}-\frac{\lambda^{2}y_{2}^{2}}{3}=\frac{m}{4}(1-\lambda^{2})+\frac{n}{3}(1-\lambda^{2})即\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{4}+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{3}-\lambda^{2}(\frac{x_{2}^{2}}{4}+-\frac{y^{2}}{3})=(1-\lambda^{2})(\frac{m}{4}+\frac{n}{3}),故1-\lambda^{2}=(1-\lambda^{2})(\frac{m}{4}+\frac{n}{3})所以\frac{m}{4}+\frac{n}{3}=|

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$P$到$x$轴的距离是$8$，则点$P$到该抛物线焦点的距离是?

text: 已知椭圆和双曲线有相同的焦点$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$，设椭圆和双曲线的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$, $P$为两曲线的一个公共点，且$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}-\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=2|\overrightarrow{P O}|$ ( $O$为坐标原点) . 若$e_{1} \in(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2})$，则$e_{2}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = {F1, F2};e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(H) = e1;Eccentricity(G) = e2;P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1) - VectorOf(P, F2)) = 2*Abs(VectorOf(P, O));O: Origin;In(e1, (sqrt(2)/2, sqrt(3)/2))
process: 设椭圆的长半轴长为a,双曲线的实半轴长为a,它们的半焦距为c,于是得a=\frac{c}{e_{1}},a=\frac{c}{e_{2}}由椭圆及双曲线的对称性知,不妨令焦点F_{1}和F_{2}在x轴上,点P在y轴右侧,由椭圆及双曲线定义得:\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a\\|PF_{1}-|PF_{1}=2a\end{cases},解得|PF_{1}|=a+a,|PF_{2}|=a-a因|\overrightarrow{PF}|-\overrightarrow{PF}_{2}|=2|\overrightarrow{PO}|,即|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|=2|\overrightarrow{PO}|,而O是线段F_{1}F_{2}的中点,因此有\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}则有|PF|^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|,即(a+a)^{2}+(a-a)^{2}=4c^{2},整理得:a^{2}+a^{2}=2c^{2},从而有(\frac{c}{e_{1}})^{2}+(\frac{c}{e_{2}})^{2}=2c^{2},即有\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}=2-\frac{1}{e_{1}^{2}},又\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}<e_{1}\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},则有0<2-\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}\leqslant\frac{2}{3},即e_{2}^{2}\geqslant\frac{3}{2},解得e_{2}\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},所以e_{2}的取值范围是-\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3},+\infty

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 1)
process: 解:由2x^{2}+4y^{2}=1,化为标准方程得:\frac{x^{2}}{\frac{1}{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{1}{4}}=1\therefore椭圆是焦点在x轴上的椭圆,且a^{2}=\frac{1}{2},b^{2}=\frac{1}{4},\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}-b^{2}=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{4},则c=\frac{1}{2}\therefore焦点坐标为(\frac{1}{2},0)和(-\frac{1}{2},0)

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2

process: 设弦的两个端点为A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})且减得y-y.)又\becauseM(-1,1)为AB的中点,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=-2,y_{1}+y_{2}=2代入\textcircled{1}式得\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{3}{4},即k_{AB}=\frac{3}{4}\therefore直线AB方程为y-1=\frac{3}{4}(x+1),即3x-4y+7=0.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$是双曲线右支上的一点，若直线$A F_{2}$与直线$y=-\frac{b}{a} x$平行,且$\Delta A F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为$9 a$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F2: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = -(b/a)*x);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));IsParallel(LineOf(A,F2),H);Perimeter(TriangleOf(A, F1, F2)) = 9*a
process: 如图,设AF_{1}=r_{1},AF_{2}=r_{2},则\begin{cases}r_{1}-r_{2}=2a\\r_{1}+r_{2}=9a-2c\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}r_{1}=\frac{11}{2}a-c\\r_{2}=\frac{7}{2}a-c\end{cases},因为直线AF_{2}与直线y=-\frac{b}{a}x平行,所以\tan\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{b}{a},所以\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}A=\frac{a}{c}=\frac{4c^{2}+r_{2}^{2}-r_{1}^{2}}{2\times2c\timesr_{2}},所以4c^{2}+r_{2}^{2}-r_{1}^{2}=4ar_{2},把r_{1},r_{2}代入上式得8a^{2}-2ac-c^{2}=0,所以(2a-c)(4a+c)=0,得e=2故填:2.

process: 试题分析:依题意,直线AB方程为y=x+a,又点B在x轴上的射影恰为双曲线的右焦点F,得x_{B}=c,则代入直线方程得y_{B}=c+a,点(x_{B},y_{B})代入双曲线方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1得\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(c+a)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,又b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}代入得c^{3}-3a^{2}c-2a^{3}=0,即e^{3}-3e-2=0,得(e+1)^{2}(e-2)=0,故e=2,故填2.

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆$C$上的一点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/12 + y^2/9 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: a=2\sqrt{3},b=3,c=\sqrt{3},设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,则\begin{cases}m+n=2a=4\sqrt{3}\\(2c)^{2}=m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos60\end{cases}\begin{cases}m+n=4\sqrt{3}\\12=(m+n)^{2}-3mn\end{cases},12=(4\sqrt{3})^{2}-3mn,mn=12'所以三角形\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}面积为\frac{1}{2}mn\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}\times12\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=3\sqrt{3}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，由$F$向其渐近线引垂线，垂足为$P$，若线段$PF$的中点在此双曲线上，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F,L)=True;IsPerpendicular(Asymptote(G),L)=True;FootPoint(Asymptote(G),L) = P;P: Point;PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F)),G) = True
process: 试题分析:F(c,0),双曲线一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x^{,}则过F与该渐近线垂直的直线方程为y=-\frac{a}{b}(x-c),联立解得P(\frac{a^{2}}{c},\frac{ab}{c}),所以PF的中点(\frac{a2+c^{2}}{2c},\frac{ab}{2c}),代入双曲线方程求得\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2},所以双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{2}

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$，直线$y=x+1$与$x$轴交于$P$点，与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{P A}+2 \overrightarrow{P B}=\overrightarrow{0}$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;H: Line;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;a:Number;a>1;Expression(Gamma)=(x^2/a^2+y^2=1);Expression(H) = (y = x + 1);Intersection(H, xAxis) = P;Intersection(H,Gamma)={A,B};VectorOf(P, A) + 2*VectorOf(P, B) = 0
process: 由\begin{cases}y=x+1\\\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}x=0\\y=1\end{cases}或\begin{cases}x=-\frac{2a2}{1+a^{2}}\\y=\frac{1-a^{2}}{1+a^{2}}\end{cases},而|\overrightarrow{PA}|>|\overrightarrow{PB}|,则点A(0,1)B(-\frac{2a^{2}}{1+a^{2}},\frac{1-a^{2}}{1+a^{2}}),而P(-1,0),\overrightarrow{PA}=(1,1),\overrightarrow{PB}=(\frac{1-a^{2}}{1+a^{2}},\frac{1-a^{2}}{1+a^{2}}),又\overrightarrow{PA}+2\overrightarrow{PB}=\overrightarrow{0},则有1+2\cdot\frac{1-a^{2}}{1+a^{2}}=0,解得a2=3,即a=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$，斜率为$\frac{1}{3}$的直线$l$与$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点若以点$E(1,1)$为圆心的圆是$\triangle O A B$的内切圆，则圆$E$的半径为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;E:Circle;E1: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(E1) = (1, 1);Slope(l)=1/3;Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Center(E)=E1;InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(O,A,B))=E
process: 设直线l的方程为y=\frac{1}{3}x+m,即x-3y+3m=0,直线与圆相切,则r=\frac{|1-3+3m|}{\sqrt{10}}=\frac{|3m-2|}{\sqrt{10}}设直线OA,OB的方程分别为y=k_{1}x,y=k_{2}x,\because直线OA,OB与圆E相切,\frac{|k_{1}-1|}{\sqrt{k_{1}^{2}+1}}=r\frac{|k_{2}-1|}{\sqrt{k_{2}^{2}+1}}=r,即k_{1}与k_{2}是方程(1-r)x^{2}-2x+1-r^{2}=0的两个不同实根,则k_{1}k_{2}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}}\cdot\frac{y_{2}}{x_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}y_{2}}{x_{1}x_{2}}=1,即x_{1}x_{2}=y_{1}y_{2},然后由直线l与抛物线相交,通过韦达定理求解.设直线l的方程为y=\frac{1}{3}x+m,即x-3y+3m=0,内切圆的半径为r,则r=\frac{|1-3+3m|}{\sqrt{10}}=\frac{|3m-2|}{\sqrt{10}}.设直线OA,OB的方程分别为y=k_{1}x,y=k_{2}x,即k_{1}x-y=0,k_{2}x-y=0,\because直线OA与圆E相切,\therefore\frac{|k_{1}-1|}{\sqrt{k_{1}^{2}+1}}=r,整理得(1-r2)k_{1}^{2}-2k_{1}+1-r^{2}=0.同理得(1-r^{2})k_{2}^{2}-2k_{2}+1-r^{2}=0.\thereforek_{1}与k_{2}是方程(1-r^{2})x^{2}-2x+1-r^{2}=0的两个不同实数根\therefore\begin{cases}r\neq1\\A=4-4(1-r)^{2}\\k_{1}+k_{2}=\frac{2}{1-r^{2}}\\k_{k_{2}}}\end{cases}设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则k_{1}k_{2}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}}\cdot\frac{y_{2}}{x_{2}}=\frac{y_{1}y_{2}}{x_{1}x_{2}}=1'即x_{1}x_{2}=y_{1}y_{2}由\begin{cases}y=\\y=\end{cases}\frac{1}{3}x+m,得y^{2}-12y+12m=0,\therefore\begin{cases}y_{1}+y_{2}=12\\y_{1}y_{2}=12m\end{cases}\begin{cases}y2=4x\\4=144-48m>0\\y_{1}+y_{2}=12\end{cases},\thereforem<3.x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{2}{16}(y_{1}y_{2})^{2}=9m^{2},\therefore9m^{2}=12m,依题m\neq0,\thereforem=\frac{4}{3},满足条件.\thereforer=\frac{|3m-2|}{\sqrt{10}}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{10}}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$,点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为其两个焦点，点$P$为双曲线上一点，若$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$,则$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 试题分析:由条件知:c=\sqrt{2},而a=b=1,\begin{cases}PF'+|PF_{2}^{2}=8\\|PF|-|PF_{2}=2\end{cases}.|PF|PF_{2}=2,\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|^{2}=|PF|^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}+2|PF_{1}|PF_{2}|=8+4=12,\therefore|PF|+|PF_{2}|=2\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线$C$上一点$P$满足$(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=0$，且$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=2 a^{2}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,C);DotProduct((VectorOf(O,P)+VectorOf(O,F2)),VectorOf(F2,P))=0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1))*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) = 2*a^2
process: 根据(\overrightarrow{OP}+\overrightarrow{OF}_{2})\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=0,可知|OP|=|OF_{2}|=|OF_{1}|,即APF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形.设|PF_{1}|=m,|PF_{2}|=n,依题意有\begin{cases}mn=2a^{2}\\m-n=2a\end{cases},解得m=(\sqrt{3}+1)a,n=(\sqrt{3}-1)a,根据勾股定理得m^{2}+n^{2}=4c^{2},解得c=\sqrt{2}a=\sqrt{2}b,a=b,故双曲线为等轴双曲线,渐近线为y=\pmx.青】本小题主要考查双曲线的定义和准线方程的求解.考查直角三角形的几何性质以及运算求解能力尾干中档题

text: 方程$k x^{2}+y^{2}=9 k+4$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (k*x^2 + y^2 = 9*k + 4);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);k:Number
process: 由于方程kx^{2}+y^{2}=9k+4表示焦点在x轴上的椭圆,则9k+4\neq0,将椭圆方程化为标准方程得\frac{x^{2}}{\frac{9k+4}{k}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9k+4}=由已知条件可得\begin{cases}9k+4>0\\\frac{9k+4}{k}>9k+4\end{cases}解得0<k<1.因此,实数k的取值范围是(0,1).

fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;Q: Point;F: Point;P: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = P;Intersection(l, Directrix(C)) = Q;VectorOf(Q, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, P)

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=k(x-2)(k>0)$与抛物线$C$交于不同的$A$、$B$两点，且$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}=\frac{2}{5}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;k:Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);k>0;Expression(G) = (y = k*(x - 2));Focus(C) = F;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 2/5;Negation(A=B)
process: 联立直线y=k(x-2)(k>0)的方程和抛物线方程,结合抛物线的定义求得B点的坐标,由此求得k的值.依题意F(1,0),p=2,\frac{p}{2}=1.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由于k>0,所以x_{1}>0,x_{2}>0由\begin{cases}y=k(x\\y2=4x\end{cases}-2),消去y并化简得k^{2}x^{2}-(4k^{2}+4)x+4k^{2}=0,所以x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=4根据抛物线的定义有\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}=\frac{x_{1}+1}{x_{2}+1}=\frac{2}{5},化简得x_{1}=\frac{2}{5}x_{2}-\frac{3}{5},代入x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=4得(\frac{2}{5}x_{2}-\frac{3}{5})\cdotx_{2}=4,解得x_{2}=4(负根舍去).由于\frac{|AF|}{|BF|}=\frac{2}{5}\Rightarrow|BF|>|AF|,而k>0,所以B在第一象限.所以y_{2}^{2}=4x_{2}=16\Rightarrowy_{2}=4即B(4,4),代入y=k(x-2)得4=k(4-2)\Rightarrowk=2

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过点$F$的直线与双曲线$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$Q$、$P$，且$2 \overrightarrow{F Q}=\overrightarrow{F P}$，以原点$O$为圆心的圆与直线$F P$相切，且切点恰为$Q$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);Z1: Line;Z2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {Z1, Z2};Q: Point;Intersection(H, Z1) = Q;P: Point;Intersection(H, Z2) = P;2*VectorOf(F, Q) = VectorOf(F, P);O: Origin;G: Circle;Center(G) = O;IsTangent(G, LineOf(F, P));TangentPoint(G, LineOf(F, P)) = Q
process: \because\overrightarrow{FP}=2\overrightarrow{FQ}.\thereforeQ为PF的中点,又由已知OQ\botPF.\thereforeOQ为线段PF的垂直平分线,\therefore\angleFOQ=\anglePOQ=\anglePOx=60^{\circ}\thereforek_{OP}=\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3},即\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},\thereforee=2,

text: 抛物线$y=ax^{2}$与直线$l$: $y=kx+b(k \neq 0)$交于$A$ , $B$两点，且此两点的横坐标分别为$x_{1}$ , $x_{2}$，则直线$l$与$x$轴交点的横坐标等于（用$x_{1}$，$x_{2}$表示，不能出现$a$, $b$, $k$)?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;a: Number;b: Number;k: Number;Negation(k = 0);A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);Expression(l) = (y = b + k*x);Intersection(G, l) = {A, B};x1: Number;x2: Number;XCoordinate(A) = x1;XCoordinate(B) = x2
process: y=ax^{2}k\neq0,整理得ax^{2}-kx-b=0,由题设条件知x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{k}{a},x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{b}{a},x_{3}=-\frac{b}{k}.由此可知x_{1}x_{3}+x_{2}x_{3}=(x_{1}+x_{2})x_{3}=\frac{k}{a}\times(-\frac{b}{k})=-\frac{b}{a}=x_{1}x_{2}.解y=kx+b,k\neq0\thereforeax^{2}=kx+b,整理得ax^{2}-kx-b=0,由题设条件知x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{k}{a},x_{1}x_{2}=-\frac{b}{a}设直线l与x轴交点的横坐标x_{3},则x_{3}=-\frac{b}{k}.x_{1}x_{3}+x_{2}x_{3}=(x_{1}+x_{2})x_{3}=\frac{k}{a}\times(-\frac{b}{k})=-\frac{b}{a}=x_{1}x_{2}.\thereforex_{3}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{x_{1}+x_{2}}

process: 作直线l的平行线x+y+t=0,使得该直线与椭圆C相切,联立\begin{cases}x+y+t=0\\\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1\end{cases},消去y得4x^{2}+6tx+3(t^{2}-1)=0,A=36t^{2}-4\times4\times3(t^{2}-1)=48-12t^{2}=0,解得t=\pm2.因此,点P到直线l的距离的最大值等于直线x+y-2=0与直线l之间的距离d=\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{2},

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点为$A$，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 a x$的焦点为$F$. 若在$E$的渐近线上存在点$P$，使得$\overrightarrow{A P} \perp \overrightarrow{F P}$，则双曲线$E$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;C: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*(a*x));RightVertex(E) = A;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, Asymptote(E));IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(A,P),VectorOf(F,P))
process: 双曲线E:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的右顶点为A(a,0)抛物线C:y^{2}=8ax的焦点为F(2a,0),双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x可设P(m,\frac{b}{a}m),即有\overrightarrow{AP}=(m-a,\frac{b}{a}m),FP=(m-2a,\frac{b}{a}m)^{n}可得\overrightarrow{AP}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=0,即为(m-a)(m-2a)+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}m^{2}=0,化为(1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}})m^{2}-3ma+2a^{2}=0,由题意可得\triangle=9a^{2}-4(1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}})\cdot2a^{2}\geqslant0,即有a^{2}\geqslant8b^{2}=8(c^{2}-a^{2}),即8c^{2}\leqslant9a^{2},则e=\frac{c}{a}\leqslant\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}由e>1,可得1<e\leqslant\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$ , $B$，点$P$在椭圆上且异于$A$ , $B$两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若直线$PA$与$PB$的斜率之积为$-\frac{1}{2}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;LeftVertex(G)=A;RightVertex(G)=B;P:Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);Slope(LineOf(P, A)) *Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = -1/2

text: 已知$\triangle A B C$的周长为$26$且点$A$、$B$的坐标分别是$(-6,0)$,$(6,0)$，则点$C$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Perimeter(TriangleOf(A, B, C)) = 26;Coordinate(A) = (-6, 0);Coordinate(B) = (6, 0)
process: 试题分析:\because\triangleABC的周长为26,顶点B(-6,0),C(6,0),\thereforeBC=12,AB+AC=26-12=14,\because14>12,\therefore点A到两个定点的距离之和等于定值,\therefore点A的轨迹是椭圆,\becausea=7,c=6.b^{2}=13,\therefore椭圆的方程是\frac{x2}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{13}=1(x\neq0),

text: 点$M(8,0)$到抛物线$y^{2}=10 x$上的点的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;P0: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 10*x);Coordinate(M) = (8, 0);PointOnCurve(P0, G)
process: 设抛物线y^{2}=10x上的点坐标A(\frac{n2}{10},n),则最小值,且最小值为,55.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 m x(m>0)$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的一条渐近线的距离为$3$, 则此抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*m*x);m: Number;m>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Distance(Focus(H),OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 3
process: 由题意得抛物线的焦点为(\frac{m}{2},0),双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1的渐进线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{4}x,取其中一条为y=\frac{3}{4}x,即3x-4y=0.由题意得\frac{|3\times\frac{m}{2}|}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}}=\frac{|3m|}{10}=3,解得m=10所以抛物线的方程为y2=20x答案:v2=20x.

text: 已知点$M(-2,2)$和抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$，过$C$的焦点且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点. 若$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$. 则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;k:Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(M) = (-2, 2);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);Slope(G) = k;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}y_{1}^{2}=8x_{1},\\y_{2}^{2}=8x_{2},\end{cases}所以y_{1}^{2}-y_{2}^{2}=8x_{1}-8x_{2}所以k=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}}=\frac{8}{y_{1}+y_{2}}.取AB的中点M(x_{0},y_{0}),分别过点A,B作准线x=-2的垂线,垂足分别为A,B'.因为\overrightarrow{MA}\cdot\overrightarrow{MB}=0,\angleAMB=90^{\circ},所以|MM|=\frac{1}{2}|AB|=\frac{1}{2}(|AF|+|BF|)=\frac{1}{2}(|AA|+|BB|)因为M为AB的中点,所以MM平行于x轴因为M(-2,2)故答客为:2

text: 已知抛物线$C$的顶点在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，且经过点$(-1 , 4)$，则抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(G) = (-1, 4);Vertex(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), yAxis);PointOnCurve(G,C)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上一点$P$、$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为其左右焦点，圆$M$是$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$内切圆，且$P F_{1}$与圆$M$相切于点$A$,$|P A|=\frac{c^{2}}{2 a}$($c$为半焦距)，若$\frac{| P F_{1} |}{|PF_{2}|}>2$，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C)) = True;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;M: Circle;IsInscribedCircle(M,TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)) = True;A: Point;TangentPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), M) = A;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A)) = c^2/2*a;c: Number;HalfFocalLength(C) = c;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) > 2
process: 首先利用双曲线的定义和内切圆的性质证明内切圆与x轴切于顶点,再分别表示|PF_{1}|,|PF_{2}|,列出关于a,c的齐次不等式求双曲线的离心率的取值范围.设圆心M(x,y),设内切圆与PF_{1},PF_{2},F_{1}F_{2}相切于点A,B,C,如图:根据内切圆性质可知|PA|=|PB|,|F_{1}A|=|F_{1}C|,|F_{2}B|=|F_{2}C|\therefore|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=|PA|+|AF_{1}|-|PB|-|BF_{2}|=|CF_{1}|-|CF_{2}|=2a,\therefore点C是双曲线的顶点,即|F_{1}A|=|F_{1}C|=c+a,|F_{2}B|=|F_{2}C|=c-a,|PA|=|PB|=\frac{c^{2}}{2a},\because\frac{|PF_{1}|}{|PF_{2}|}=\frac{c+a+\frac{c^{2}}{2a}}{c-a+\frac{c^{2}}{2a}}>2,整理为:c^{2}+2ac-6a^{2}<0,两边同时除以a^{2}得e^{2}+2e-6<0,解得:-1-\sqrt{7}<e<-1+\sqrt{7},且e>1,所以离心率的取值范围是(1,\sqrt{7}-1).

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，以线段$A B$为直径的圆与抛物线$C$的准线切于$M(-\frac{p}{2}, 3)$, 且$\triangle A O B$的面积为$\sqrt{13}$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-p/2, 3);TangentPoint(Directrix(C), G) = M;O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = sqrt(13)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点$F$的直线与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的一条渐近线平行，并交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|>|B F|$，且$|A F|=2$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Focus(H)=F;l:Line;PointOnCurve(F,l);IsParallel(l,OneOf(Asymptote(G)));Intersection(l,H)={A,B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) > Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2
process: 根据抛物线的定义和双曲线的定义,不妨设直线AB为y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2}),设A(x_{0},y_{0})得到|AF|=x_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=2,从而得出点A坐标,最后再代入到抛物线的解析式,即可求出p的值羊解】解:抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F的坐标为(\frac{p}{2},0),准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1的渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x,而过抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F的直线与渐近线y=\sqrt{3}x平行且交抛物线于A,B两点,不妨设直线AB为y=\sqrt{3}(x-\frac{p}{2}),设A(x_{0},y_{0})\therefore|AF|=x_{0}+\frac{p}{2},\because|AF|>|BF|,且|AF|=2,\thereforex_{0}=2-\frac{p}{2},x_{0}>\frac{p}{2},\therefore0<p<2,\thereforey_{0}=\sqrt{3}(2-p)则A(2-\frac{p}{2},\sqrt{3}(2-p)),而点A在抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)上\therefore3(2-p)^{2}=2p(2-\frac{p}{2})整理得p^{2}-4p+3=0,解得:p=1或p=3(舍去)

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，过$F$作与$x$轴垂直的直线交双曲线于$A$、$B$两点，若以$A B$为直径的圆过坐标原点，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;L: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;O:Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);Intersection(L, G) = {A, B};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H);PointOnCurve(O,H)
process: 设F(c,0),把x=c代入\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1得\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}-1=\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}y=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a},即点A(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),B(c,-\frac{b^{2}}{a})^{\circ},AB=\frac{2b^{2}}{a},而以AB为直径的圆过原点,则有_{c}=\frac{b^{2}}{a},又b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}\thereforec^{2}-ac-a^{2}=0\Rightarrowe^{2}-e-1=0,而e>1,解得e=\frac{\sqrt{5}+1}{2}

text: $A B$是抛物线$y^{2}=x$的一条弦，若$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为$1$，则弦$A B$的长度的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G) = True;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), yAxis) = 1

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, y_{0})$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线$C$的一条渐近线垂直于直线$A M$，则其离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;G: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;A: Point;b>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (1, y0);y0:Number;PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5;LeftVertex(C) = A;IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(C)),LineOf(A,M))
process: \because抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)上一点M(1,m)到其焦点的距离为5,\therefore1+\frac{p}{2}=5,p=8,抛物线方程为y^{2}=16x,m=\pm4.取M(1,4),双曲线的左顶点为A(a,0),直线AM的斜率为\frac{4}{1+a}\because该双曲线的一条渐近线与直线AM垂直\frac{4}{1+a}\timesb=-1,且a=1,解得:b=\frac{1}{2},则:e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{5}{4},e=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 曲线$C$上的点到$F_{1}(0,-1)$, $F_{2}(0,1)$的距离之和为$4$,则曲线$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;F1: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (0, -1);F2: Point;Coordinate(F2) = (0, 1);Distance(P,F1) + Distance(P,F2) = 4

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点$F(5,0)$到渐近线的距离为$4$，则实轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (5, 0);RightFocus(C)=F;Distance(F,Asymptote(C))=4
process: 解:双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,所以焦点F(5,0)到渐近线bx\pmay=0的距离d=\frac{|5b|}{\sqrt{b^{2}+a^{2}}}=4所以\frac{5b}{c}=4,即b=\frac{4c}{5}=\frac{4\times5}{5}=4所以a^{2}=c^{2}-b^{2}=25-16=9所以a=3,所以实轴长为2a=6,

text: 已知圆$C$的圆心是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，直线$4 x-3 y-2=0$与圆$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A B |=6$，则圆$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Center(C) = Focus(G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (4*x - 3*y - 2 = 0);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6
process: 解:由题意可知,圆心C(0,1)\therefore圆心C(0,1)到直线4x-3y-2=0的距离d=\frac{|-3-2|}{\sqrt{4^{2}+(-3)^{2}}}=又\because直线4x-3y-2=0与圆C相交于A、B两点,且|AB|=6,\therefore圆C的半径r=\sqrt{(\frac{1}{2}|AB|)^{2}+d^{2}}=\sqrt{9+1}=\sqrt{10},.圆C的标准方程为:x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=10

text: 已知双曲线$C$的一条渐近线方程为$l$: $y=2 x$，且其实轴长小于$4$，则$C$的一个标准方程可以为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;l: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l;Expression(l) = (y = 2*x);Length(RealAxis(C)) < 4
process: 解:可设双曲线的方程为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=2(\lambda\neq0)即\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4\lambda}=1(\lambda\neq0),当\lambda>0时,双曲线的实轴为2\sqrt{\lambda}则2\sqrt{2}<4,所以0<\lambda<4,可取\lambda=1,则C的一个标准方程可以为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$上一点，以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与双曲线的渐近线交于点$Q$,$P$、$Q$均位于第一象限，且$P$为$Q F_{2}$的中点，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2), G) = True;G: Circle;Intersection(G, Asymptote(C)) = Q;Q: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;Quadrant(Q) = 1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(Q, F2)) = P

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为焦点的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 - y^2/4 = 1);RightFocus(G) = Focus(H);H: Parabola
process: 双曲线中,c=\sqrt{5+4}=3,所以,右焦点为F(3,0)抛物线的焦点也为(3,0),所以\frac{p}{2}=3,p=6抛物线的标准方程为:y^{2}=12x

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$虚轴的一个顶点为$D$，直线$x=2 a$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\triangle A B D$的垂心在$C$的一条渐近线上，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;D: Point;OneOf(Vertex(ImageinaryAxis(C))) = D;G: Line;Expression(G) = (x = 2*a);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(Orthocenter(TriangleOf(A, B, D)), OneOf(Asymptote(C)))
process: 解:设\triangleABD的垂心为H,则DH\botAB,不妨设D(0,b),则H(x,b),代入渐近线方程y=\frac{b}{a}x^{,}解得x=a,则H(a,b),因为直线x=2a与双曲线交于点A,B,则A,B两点的坐标分别为:A(2a,\sqrt{3}b),B(2a,-\sqrt{3}b)因为_{k_{AD}\cdotk_{BH}}=\frac{(\sqrt{3}-1)b}{2a}\times\frac{(\sqrt{3}+1)b}{-a}=-1'化简可得a^{2}=b^{2},所以双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{2},

fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;Expression(C1) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;l: Line;LeftDirectrix(C1) = l;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C1) = F1;RightFocus(C1) = F2;C2: Parabola;Directrix(C2) = l;Focus(C2) = F2;M: Point;Intersection(C1, C2) = M
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2))

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{36}-\frac{y^{2}}{45}=1$的渐近线方程为?离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 - y^2/45 = 1)

C: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F1));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2))
process: 连接AF_{2},设|BF_{1}|=k,利用椭圆性质|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,得到AF_{2}长度,分别在\triangleABF_{2}和\triangleF_{1}AF_{2}中利用余弦定理,得到c的长度,根据离心率的定义计算得到答案.设|BF_{1}|=k,则|AF_{1}|=3k,|BF_{2}|=4k.由|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,得2a=5k,|AF_{2}|=2k,在\triangleABF_{2}中,\cos\angleBAF_{2}=\frac{1}{4},故离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{5}

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且被圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2 y=0$截得弦最长的直线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);L: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), L);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (2*y - 4*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);WhenMax(Length(InterceptChord(L, H)))

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{64}-\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上一点$P$到它的右焦点的距离是$8$，则点$P$到它的右准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/64 - y^2/36 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P,RightFocus(G)) = 8
G: Curve;Expression(G) = (x^2/(25 - k) + y^2/(9 - k) = 1);k: Number;9 < k;k < 25
process: 试题分析:\frac{x^{2}}{25-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{9-k}=1转化为标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{25-k}-\frac{y^{2}}{k-9}=1,曲线为双曲线\thereforea^{2}=25-k,b^{2}=k-9\thereforec^{2}=16\thereforec=4,2c=8,焦距为8

text: 已知直线$L$: $y=x-t$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两个不同点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=-3$，则$t$的值为?
fact_expressions: L: Line;Expression(L) = (y = -t + x);t: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(L, C) = {A, B};Negation(A=B);O: Origin;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = -3
process: 联立直线方程和抛物线方程,由丰内需有丙丙个交点需满足判别式大于零,求出一个参数的限制条件,将x,y的是两个乘积关系,代入已知\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}中解得答案设交点A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立方程组\begin{cases}y=x-t\\y2=4x\end{cases},得x^{2}-(2t+4)x+t^{2}=0因为\triangle=(2t+4)^{2}-4t^{2}>0,即t>-1则\begin{cases}x_{1}+x_{2}=2t+4\\x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=t^{2}\end{cases}所以y_{1}\cdoty_{2}=(x_{1}-t)(x_{2}-t)=x_{1}\cdotx_{2}-t(x_{1}+x_{2})+t^{2}=-4t所以\overrightarrow{OA}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=x_{1}.\cdotx_{2}+y\cdoty_{2}=t^{2}-4t=-3,即t=1或3,符合\triangle>0

text: 已知抛物线方程为$2 x^{2}=y$，则其焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 = y)

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有相同离心率且经过点$(2,-\sqrt{3})$的椭圆标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G1: Ellipse;Expression(G1) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);G2: Ellipse;Eccentricity(G1) = Eccentricity(G2);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (2, -sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H,G2) = True
process: 方法一\becausee=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{3}{4}}=\frac{1}{2},若焦点在x轴上,设所求椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{n^{2}}=1(m>n>0),则1-(\frac{n}{m})^{2}=\frac{1}{4},从而(\frac{n}{m})^{2}=\frac{3}{4}'\frac{n}{m}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}又\frac{4}{m^{2}}+\frac{3}{n^{2}}=1,\thereforem^{2}=8,n^{2}=6.\therefore所求椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1.若焦点在y轴上,设椭圆的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}=1(m>n>0)则\frac{3}{m^{2}}+\frac{4}{n^{2}}=1,且\frac{n}{m}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},解得m^{2}=\frac{25}{3},n^{2}=\frac{25}{4}故所求椭圆的标准方程为\underline{\frac{y^{2}}{25}}+\frac{x^{2}}{\frac{25}{2}}=1

text: 若方程$x^{2}+(k-1) y^{2}=k+1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2*(k - 1) = k + 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)
process: 试题分析:将x^{2}+(k-1)y^{2}=k+1变形可得\frac{x2}{k+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{k+1}{k-1}}=由题意可得\begin{cases}k+1>0\\\frac{k+1}{k-1}<0\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}k+1>0\\k-1<0\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}k>-1\\k<1\end{cases}\Rightarrow-1<k<1.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的顶点为$O$，点$A$的坐标为$(2,0)$，倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$与线段$O A$相交 (经过点$O$和点$A$) 且交抛物线于$P$，$Q$两点，则$|P Q|$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;O: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);Vertex(G)=O;Inclination(l)=pi/4;PointOnCurve(O,l);PointOnCurve(A,l);IsIntersect(LineSegmentOf(O,A),l);Intersection(l,LineSegmentOf(O,A))={P,Q}
process: 设直线l的方程为y=x-m,有0<m<2,由方程组\begin{cases}y=x-m\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases}消去y,得x^{2}-(2m+4)x+m^{2}=0设P(x_{1},y_{1}),Q(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=2m+4,x_{1}\cdotx_{2}=m^{2},所以|PQ|=4\sqrt{2}\times\sqrt{m+1},所以4\sqrt{2}<|PQ|<4\sqrt{6}

text: 设$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的右焦点，$P$是$C$左支上的点，已知$A(1,3)$，则$\Delta P A F$周长的最小值是?
fact_expressions: F: Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C)) = True;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 3)
process: 设左焦点为F_{1}(-5,0),根据双曲线的定义可知|PF|=2a+|PF_{1}|,所以三角形PAF的周长为|PF|+|PA|+|AF|=|PF_{1}|+|PA|+13,当APF_{1}三点共线时,|PF_{1}|+|PA|取得最小值,三角形PAF的周长取得最小值.|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{(1+5)^{2}+3^{2}}=3\sqrt{5},故三角形周长的最小值为3\sqrt{5}+13睛】本小题主要考查双曲线的定义,考查三角形周长最小值的求法,属于中档题

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=x$交于$A$、$B$两点.且线段$A B$的中点在直线$y=1$上，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=2$（$O$为坐标原点），则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$是双曲线第一象限上一点，在点$P$处作双曲线$C$的切线$l$，若点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$到切线$l$的距离之积为$3$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 12*y)
process: \becausex^{2}=2py=12y,\therefore\frac{p}{2}=3,\therefore抛物线x^{2}=12y的准线方程为y=-\frac{p}{2}=-3,

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，若双曲线左支上存在一点$P$使得$\frac{|P F_{2}|^{2}}{|P F_{1}|}=8 a$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
