text: 已知椭圆两个焦点坐标分别是$(5,0)$ ,$(-5 , 0)$，椭圆上一点$P$到两个焦点的距离之和为$26$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (5, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (-5, 0);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, F1)+Distance(P,F2) = 26
process: 试题分析:由椭圆定义可知2a=26\thereforea=13\becausec=5\thereforeb=12,椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{169}+\frac{y^{2}}{144}=1

text: 已知双曲线$C$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，写出双曲线$C$的一个标准方程?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)
process: 由题意双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{5},即c=\sqrt{5}a,可令a=1,则c=\sqrt{5},b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=2,则可写答案为x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(答案不唯一)

text: 抛物线$C$的顶点在坐标原点，焦点在$x$轴上，且$C$过点$(-2,3)$，则$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(G) = (-2, 3);Vertex(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), xAxis);PointOnCurve(G, C)
process: 由题:抛物线C的顶点在坐标原点,焦点在x轴上,经过点(-2,3)设抛物线方程y^{2}=-2px,经过点(-2,3),所以3^{2}=-2p\times(-2),解得:p=\frac{9}{4}所以抛物线方程:y^{2}=-\frac{9}{2}x

text: 设$F$为抛物线$y=-\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点，与抛物线相切于点$P(-4 ,-4)$的直线$l$与$x$轴的交点为$Q$，则$\angle P Q F$的值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;P: Point;Q: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y = -x^2/4);Coordinate(P) = (-4, -4);Focus(G) = F;TangentPoint(l, G) = P;Intersection(l, xAxis) = Q

text: 若双曲线$C$的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$，记双曲线$C$的左、右顶点为$A$、$B$. 弦$P Q \perp x$轴，记直线$P A$与直线$Q B$交点为$M$，其轨迹为曲线$T$，则曲线$T$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;B: Point;T: Curve;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), xAxis);Intersection(LineOf(P, A), LineOf(Q, B)) = M;Locus(M)=T
process: 设P(x_{0},y_{0})、M(x,y),根据直线的点斜式方程表示出直线PA、QB的方程,整理两直线方程可得\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}-4}=-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{x_{0}^{2}-4},结合点P(x_{0},y_{0})在双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1上可得\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{x_{0}^{2}-4}=\frac{5}{4},进而得出曲线T的方程,即可求出离心率.羊解】设P(x_{0},y_{0}),则Q(x_{0},-y_{0})设点M(x,y),又A(-2,0),B(2,0)所以直线PA的方程为y=\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}+2}(x+2)\textcircled{1},直线QB的方程为y=\frac{-y_{0}}{x_{0}-2}(x-2)\textcircled{2}.由\textcircled{1}得\frac{y}{x+2}=\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}+2},由\textcircled{2}得\frac{y}{x-2}=-\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}-2}上述两个等式相乘可得\frac{y^{2}}{x^{2}-4}=-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{x_{0}^{2}-4}P(x_{0},y_{0})在双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1上,\therefore\frac{x_{0}}{4}-\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{y_{2}-4}=1,可得\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{5}=\frac{x_{0}^{2}-4}{4},\therefore\frac{y_{0}^{2}}{x_{0}^{2}-4}=\frac{5}{4}即曲线T的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1,其离心率为\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 抛物线$C$的顶点在原点，焦点$F$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的右焦点重合，过点$P(2,0)$且斜率为$1$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则弦$A B$的中点到抛物线准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;C: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;F:Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/6 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (2, 0);Vertex(C) = O;Focus(C) =F;RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P, l);Slope(l) = 1;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C)
process: 试题分析:因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1的右焦点坐标是(3,0).所以\frac{p}{2}=3,\thereforep=6.即抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=12x.设过点P(2,0)且切斜率为1的直线l方程为y=x-2,A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}).联立y^{2}=12x消去y可得x^{2}-16x+4=0x_{1}+x_{2}=16,又因为线段AB的中点到抛物线的准线的距离为\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+p}{2}=\frac{16+6}{2}=11.故填11

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, G);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, F1), LineSegmentOf(A, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1))
process: 因为|AF_{2}|=2|AF_{1}|,|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a,所以|AF_{1}|=\frac{2a}{3},|AF_{2}|=\frac{4a}{3}.设|BF_{1}|=m>0,根据椭圆定义可得|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|=2a,所以|BF_{2}|=2a-m.因为AF_{1}\botAF_{2},所以\angleBAF_{2}=\frac{\pi}{2},所以|AB|^{2}+|AF_{2}|^{2}=|BF_{2}|^{2},即(\frac{2a}{3}+m)^{2}+(\frac{4a}{3})^{2}=(2a-m)^{2},解得a=3m所以|BF_{1}|=\frac{a}{3},则\tan\angleAF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{|AF_{2}|}{|AF_{1}|}=2,\tan\angleABF_{2}=\frac{|AF_{2}|}{|AB|}=\frac{\frac{4a}{3}}{\frac{2a}{2}+\frac{a}{2}}=\frac{4}{3},所以\tan\angleBF_{2}F_{1}=\tan(\angleAF_{1}F_{2}-\angleABF_{2})=\frac{\tan\angleAF_{1}F_{2}-\tan\angleABF_{2}}{1+\tan\angleAF_{1}F_{2}\tan\angleABF_{2}}=\frac{2-\frac{4}{3}}{1+2\times\frac{4}{11}}

text: 已知圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，与抛物线的准线交于$C$，$D$两点，且坐标原点$O$是$A C$的中点，则$p$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;A: Point;C: Point;D:Point;B: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(H,Directrix(G))={C,D};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = O
process: 因为抛物线的准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2},所以由对称性得点A(\frac{p}{2},\pmp)代入圆的方程得(\frac{p}{2})^{2}+(\pmp)^{2}=1,解得p=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 已知直线$l$: $4 x-3 y+6=0$，抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上一动点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$到直线$l$的距离为$d$，则$d+|x_{0}|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (4*x - 3*y + 6 = 0);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);x0: Number;y0: Number;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, l) = d;d: Number
process: 如下图示:若PC\bot直线l,PB\bot抛物线准线且交y轴于A点,则d=|PC|,|x_{0}|=|PA|由抛物线定义知:|PF|=|PB|=|PA|+\frac{p}{2},则|PA|=|PF|-\frac{p}{2}=|PF|-2.所以d+|x_{0}|=|PC|+|PI|-2,要使目标式最小,即|PC|+|PF|最小,当F,P,C共线时,又F(2,0),此时(d+|x_{0}|)_{\min}=\frac{|8-0+6|}{5}-2=\frac{4}{5}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=m x$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{6}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点重合，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 - y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = m*x);Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作倾斜角为$120^{\circ}$的直线与椭圆的一个交点为$M$,若$MF_{1}$垂直于$x$轴，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;H: Line;M: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F2,H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(120,degree);OneOf(Intersection(H,G))=M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,F1),xAxis)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的弦$AB$垂直$x$轴，若$|AB|=4 \sqrt{3}$，则焦点到$AB$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,B),xAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4*sqrt(3)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=2$的右焦点，$P$是$C$的左支上一点，$A(0 , 2)$. 当$\triangle APF$周长最小时，该三角形的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2 = 2);Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));WhenMin(Perimeter(TriangleOf(A, P, F)))
process: 试题分析:利用双曲线的定义,确定\triangleAPF周长最小时,P的坐标,即可求出\triangleAPF周长最小时,该三角形的面积解:设左焦点为F_{1}(-2,0),右焦点为F(2,0)\triangleAPF周长为|AF|+|AP|+|PF|=|AF|+|AP|+(|PF_{1}|+2a)=|AF|+|AP|+|PF_{1}|+2a\geqslant|AF|+|AF_{1}|+2a.当且仅当A,P,F_{1}三点共线,即P位于P_{0}时,三角形周长最小此时直线AF_{1}的方程为y=x+2,代入x^{2}\cdoty^{2}=2中,可求得P_{0}(-\frac{3}{2},\frac{1}{2})故S_{\triangleAP_{0}F}=S_{\triangleAF_{1}F}-S_{\triangleP_{0}F_{1}F^{-\frac{1}{2}}\times4\times2-\frac{1}{2}\times4\times\frac{1}{2}=3}

text: 斜率为$\frac{4}{3}$的直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F(1,0)$且与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Slope(l)=4/3;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 先根据抛物线的焦点坐标得出抛物线的标准方程,设点A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2}),将直线l的方程与抛物线的方程联立,利用韦达定理结合抛物线的焦点弦长公式可计算出线段AB的长由于抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为F(1,0),则\frac{p}{2}=1\Rightarrowp=2,所以,抛物线的方程为y^{2}=4x,设点A(x_{1},y_{1})、B(x_{2},y_{2})直线l的方程为y=\frac{4}{3}(x-1),联立\begin{cases}y=\frac{4}{3}(x-\\v2=4x\end{cases}1),消去y得4x^{2}-17x+4=0\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{17}{4},|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=2+\frac{17}{4}=\frac{25}{4}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点$F$恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点，且双曲线过点$(\frac{3 a^{2}}{p} , \frac{2 b^{2}}{p})$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(H) = F;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;RightFocus(G) = F;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = ((3*a^2)/p, (2*b^2)/p);PointOnCurve(I, G)

text: 已知方程$(m+1) x^{2}+m y^{2}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (m*y^2 + x^2*(m + 1) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)

text: 已知点$P(0 , 1)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=m(m>1)$上两点$A$、$B$满足$\overrightarrow{A P}=2\overrightarrow{P B}$，则当$m$=?时，点$B$横坐标的绝对值最大
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;m>1;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = m);Coordinate(P) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);VectorOf(A,P)=2*VectorOf(P,B);WhenMax(Abs(XCoordinate(B)))
process: 分析:先根据条件得到A,B坐标间的关系,代入椭圆方程解得B的纵坐标,即得B的横坐标关于m的函数关系,最后根据二次函数性质确定最值取法.详解:设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),由\overrightarrow{AP}=2\overrightarrow{PB}得-x_{1}=2x_{2},1-y_{1}=2(y_{2}-1)y_{1}=2y_{2}-3.因为A,B在椭圆上,所以\frac{x_{1}2}{4}+y_{1}^{2}=m,\frac{x_{2}2}{4}+y_{2}^{2}=m,-3)^{2}=m,\therefore\frac{x_{2}^{2}}{4}+(y_{2}-\frac{3}{2})^{2}=\frac{m}{4}=m对应相减得y_{2}=\frac{3+m}{4},x_{2}^{2}=-\frac{1}{4}(m^{2}-10m+9)\leqslant4,当且仅当m=5时取最大值

text: 抛物线$y=a x^{2}$经过点$M(2,1)$，则$M$到焦点$F$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F
process: 抛物线y=ax^{2}经过点M(2,1),故1=4a,解得a=\frac{1}{4}\because抛物线y=\frac{x^{2}}{4}\therefore标准方程为:x^{2}=4y.准线方程为:y=-1.点M(2,1)到焦点F的距离即为M到准线的距离:1+1=2

text: 曲线$C$是平面内到定点$A(1,0)$的距离与到定直线$x=-1$之和为$3$的动点$P$的轨迹，则曲线$C$与$y$轴的交点的坐标是?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 0);G: Line;Expression(G) = (x = -1);P: Point;Distance(P, A) + Distance(P, G) = 3;C = Locus(P)
process: 设P(x,y),由题意可得:\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}}+|x+1|=3当x<-4或x>2时,3-|x+1|<0,所以无轨迹;当-4\leqslantx\leqslant-1时,\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}}+|x+1|=3\Rightarrowy^{2}=10x+15,与y轴无交点当-1<x\leqslant2时,\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}}+|x+1|=3\Rightarrowy^{2}=-2x+3,(-1<x\leqslant\frac{3}{2}),令x=0,得y=\pm\sqrt{3},所以曲线C与y轴的交点的坐标是(0,\pm\sqrt{3})

text: 设$m$为常数，若点$F(0 , 5)$是双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的一个焦点，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: m: Number;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, 5);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/9 + y^2/m = 1);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F

text: 动圆$M$过定点$A(-3,0)$，且内切于定圆$B$:$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=100$，动圆圆心$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Circle;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-3, 0);PointOnCurve(A, M);Expression(B)=((x-3)^2+y^2=100);M1:Point;Center(M)=M1;IsInTangent(M,B);B:Circle
process: 由圆B方程知其圆心为B(3,0),半径r_{1}=10,\because(-3-3)^{2}+0^{2}=81<100,即点A在圆B内部,\therefore动圆M在圆B内部,设圆M半径为r_{2},则|MA|=r_{2},\therefore|MB|=r_{1}-r_{2}=10-r_{2}=10-|MA|即|MA|+|MB|=10,又|AB|=9,\therefore|MA|+|MB|>|AB|.\therefore动圆圆心M的轨迹满足以A,B为焦点的椭圆,此时a=5,c=3,\thereforeb^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=16\therefore动圆圆心M的轨迹方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的点$M(4, y_{0})$到其焦点$F$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (4, y0);y0:Number;PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G)=F;F: Point

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一动点，$A(2,2)$是平面内的一定点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，当$P$点坐标是?时$P A+P F$最小
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (2, 2);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F;WhenMin(LineSegmentOf(P,A)+LineSegmentOf(P,F))
process: 由P向抛物线的准线作垂线,设垂足为M,则|PM|=|PF|,|PA|+|PF|=|PA|+|PM|.当P,A,M三点共线,|PA|+|PM|最小,即|PA|+|PF|最小.此时P的纵坐标y=2,代入抛物线方程y^{2}=4x,得横坐标选x=1,所以P(1,2)

text: 已知双曲线过点$A(3,-2)$，且与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有相同的焦点，则该双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;A: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (3,-2);PointOnCurve(A, G);Focus(G)=Focus(H)
process: 易得椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的焦点为(\pm\sqrt{5},0),故设双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a,b>0)故\begin{cases}\frac{3^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{(-2)^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\\\a^{2}+12-\leqslant\end{cases},解得a^{2}=3,b^{2}=2.故双曲线的方程\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点重合，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 结合抛物线y^{2}=8x,则焦点坐标为(2,0),对于双曲线而言,c=2,结合a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},代入,得到a^{2}+3=4,得到a=1.

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左焦点，点$A(1,6)$ , $P$是该双曲线右支上的一个动点，则$|P F|+|P A|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 6);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G))
process: 由题意可得:a=2,b=2\sqrt{3},c=4,记双曲线右焦点F,作示意图如下\therefore由双曲线的定义得:|PF|-|PF|=2a=4-\textcircled{1}又\because在APAF中,\therefore|PA|+|PF|\geqslant|AF|=\sqrt{(4-1)^{2}+(0-6)^{2}}=3\sqrt{5}-\textcircled{2}由\textcircled{1}加\textcircled{2}得:|PF|+|PA|\geqslant4+3\sqrt{5}当且仅当点A、P、F三点共线时等号成立.所以|PF|+|PA|的最小值为4+3\sqrt{5}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/16 = 1)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1,可得a=2,b=4,则该双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pm2x.

text: 已知点$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$右支上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线的左，右焦点，$I$为$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，若$S_{\Delta I P F_{1}}=\frac{1}{2} S_{\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}}+S_{\Delta I P F_{2}}$成立，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;I: Point;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;TriangleOf(I, P, F1) = (1/2)*TriangleOf(I, F1, F2) + TriangleOf(I, P, F2)
process: 利用内切圆半径,S_{\triangleIPF_{1}}=\frac{1}{2}S_{AIF_{1}F_{2}}+S_{\triangleAPF_{2}}化为|PF_{1}|=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|+|PF_{2}|=c+|PF_{2}|根据双曲线的定义,有2a=c,所以双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=2

text: 点$M$与点$F(0 , 4)$的距离比它到直线$L$:$y+5=0$的距离小$1$，则$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: L: Line;F: Point;M: Point;Expression(L) = (y + 5 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (0, 4);Distance(M, F) = Distance(M, L) - 1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m n \neq 0)$的离心率为$2$，有一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点重合，则$m \cdot n$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;n: Number;H: Parabola;Negation(m*n=0);Expression(G) = (-y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);Eccentricity(G) = 2;OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)
process: 由题可得:抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点坐标为(1,0)所以双曲线中c=1方程\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(mn\neq0)表示双曲线所以m,n同号.当m,n同正时,a^{2}=m,b^{2}=n,则e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{m}}=2,解得:m=\frac{1}{4}则n=b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=1-m=\frac{3}{4},此时m\cdotn=\frac{1}{4}\times\frac{3}{4}=\frac{3}{16}.则-m=b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2}=1+n=\frac{3}{4},此时m\cdotn=(-\frac{1}{4})\times(-\frac{3}{4})=\frac{3}{16}综上所述:m\cdotn=\frac{3}{16}与睛)本题主要考查了抛物线的简单性质,还考查了双曲线的简单性质及分类思想,考查双曲线标准方程的a,b,c的识别,考查计算能力,属于中档题.

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}+64=0$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$1$，那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 + 64 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 1
process: 将双曲线4x^{2}\cdoty^{2}+64=0化成标准形式:\frac{y^{2}}{64}-\frac{x}{16}=1\thereforea^{2}=64,b^{2}=16P到它的一个焦点的距离等于1,设PF_{1}=1\because|PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}|=2a=16\thereforePF_{2}=PF_{1}\pm16=17(舍负)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$y=k x-1$与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，当$\Delta F A B$的周长最大时，$\Delta F A B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;k: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x - 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F,A,B)))
process: 首先利用椭圆的定义得\triangleFAB的周长为|AF|+|BF|+|AB|=2a-|AF|+2a-|BF|+|AB|=8+|AB|-(|AF|+|BF|)\leqslant8+|AB|-|AB|=8,得出直线AB经过椭圆的右焦点时周长最大,进而得出直线AB的方程为:y=x-1,与椭圆方程联立,求出|y_{1}-y_{2}|的值,利用S_{\triangleFAB}=\frac{1}{2}|FF|\times|y_{1}-y_{2}|即可求解.由椭圆的标准方程得:a=2,c=1如图所示,设椭圆的右焦点为F,则\triangleFAB的周长为|AF|+|BF|+|AB|=2a-|AF|+2a-|BF|+|AB|=8+|AB|-(|AF|+|BF|)\leqslant8+|AB|-|AB|=8,当且仅当直线AB经过椭圆的右焦点F时取等号,将(1,0)代入y=kx-1得k=1,\therefore直线AB的方程为:y=x-1,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立()2-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1'消x得:7y^{2}+6y-9=0,-\frac{6}{7},3\thereforey_{1}+y_{2}=-\frac{7}{7},y_{1}y_{2}=-\frac{7}{7},|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\sqrt{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}}=\sqrt{(-\frac{6}{7})^{2}-4}\therefore\DeltaFAB的面积=\frac{1}{2}|FF|\times|y_{1}-y_{1}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times\frac{12\sqrt{2}}{7}=\frac{1}{2\sqrt{2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{3}=1$，则焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/3 + y^2/4 = 1)
process: 由双曲线方程知:双曲线焦点在y轴上,a=2,b=\sqrt{3},c=\sqrt{7},则其焦点坐标为(0,\pm\sqrt{7}),渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}x'即2x\pm\sqrt{3}y=0\therefore焦点到其渐近线的距离d=\frac{|2\times0\pm\sqrt{3}\times\sqrt{7}|}{\sqrt{4+3}}=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$3 x^{2}-y^{2}=3 a^{2}(a>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=8 a x$与双曲线的一个交点，若$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|=12$，则抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Parabola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (3*x^2 - y^2 = 3*a^2);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*(a*x));LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(G, H)) = P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 12
process: 将双曲线方程化为标准方程得\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3a^{2}}=1,抛物线的准线为x=-2a,联立\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3a^{2}}=1\\y2=8ax\end{cases},解得x=3a,即点P的横坐标为3a,而由\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=12\\|PF_{1}-|PF_{2}|=2a\end{cases}解得|PF_{2}|=6-a,|PF_{2}|=3a+2a=6-a,解得a=1,\therefore抛物线的准线方程为x=-2,

fact_expressions: G: Circle;IsOutTangent(G,Q1) = True;Q1: Circle;Expression(Q1) = ((x+3)^2+y^2=1);Q2: Circle;Expression(Q2) = ((x-3)^2+y^2=81);IsInTangent(G,Q2) = True

text: 已知双曲线$C$过点$(3, \sqrt{2})$且渐近线为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x$，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (3, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(G, C);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*x*(sqrt(3)/3))
process:
根据双曲线的渐近线方程可设双曲线方程为x^{2}-3y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda
eq0),将点(3,\sqrt{2})代入方程求出\lambda,即可得出双曲线方程为.羊解】解:根据题意,双曲线的渐近线方程为_{y}=\pm rac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x'可化为:x\pm\sqrt{3}y=0,则可设双曲线方程为x^{2}-3y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda
eq0)将点(3,\sqrt{2})代入x^{2}-3y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda
eq0),得3^{2}-3\sqrt{2}^{2}=\lambda(\lambda
eq0),即\lambda=3,故双曲线方程为: rac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1.

text: 过抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$,$B$，若$|AF|=4|BF|$，则直线$l$的斜率是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))
process: 抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=4x,焦点F的坐标为(1,0)\therefore设直线l的方程为y=k(x-1),由\begin{cases}y=k(k-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases}消去得\frac{k}{4}y^{2}-y-k=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则\begin{cases}y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{k}\\y_{1}y_{2}=-4\end{cases}\textcircled{1}\because|AF|=4|BF|,\thereforey_{1}+4y_{2}=0,可得y_{1}=-4y_{2},代入\textcircled{1}得-3y_{2}=\frac{4}{k},且-4y_{2}^{2}=-4,\becausey_{2}^{2}=1,即y_{2}=\pm1,\thereforek=\pm\frac{4}{3}.

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(P,C)

text: 设焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右准线与两条渐近线交于$A$、$B$两点，右焦点为$F$，且$\overrightarrow{F A} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}=0$，则双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;e: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1, L2};Intersection(RightDirectrix(G), L1) = A;Intersection(RightDirectrix(G), L2) = B;RightFocus(G) = F;DotProduct(VectorOf(F, A), VectorOf(F, B)) = 0;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$右焦点$F$作斜率为正的直线交渐近线于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle O A B$的面积为$16 \sqrt{3}$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H)>0;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, Asymptote(G)) = {A, B};O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, B)) = 16*sqrt(3)
process: 双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\sqrt{3}x和y=-\sqrt{3}x,设直线AB的方程为y=kx-2k,(k\neq\pm\sqrt{3})由\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}x\\y=kx-2k\end{cases}和\begin{cases}y=-\sqrt{3}x\\y=kx-2k\end{cases}解得y_{A}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}k}{k-\sqrt{3}},y_{B}=\frac{-2\sqrt{3}k}{k+\sqrt{3}}因为\triangleOAB的面积为16\sqrt{3},所以\frac{1}{2}\times2|y_{A}-y_{B}|=16\sqrt{3}即|y_{A}-y_{B}|=|\frac{4\sqrt{3}k^{2}}{k^{2}-3}|=16\sqrt{3},解得k=2或k=\frac{2\sqrt{15}}{5}

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F(c, 0)$，点$P$、$Q$在椭圆$C$上，点$M(-\frac{c}{2}, 0)$到直线$F P$的距离为$\frac{c}{2}$，且$\Delta P Q F$的内心恰好是点$M$，则椭圆$C$的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;c: Number;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);P: Point;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);PointOnCurve(Q, C);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-c/2, 0);Distance(M, LineOf(F, P)) = c/2;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, Q, F)) = M;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 设PQ交x轴于点F,分析得到点F是椭圆的左焦点,再求出|PF|=\frac{b^{2}}{a}|PF|=a+\frac{c^{2}}{a},再根据\frac{|ME|}{|MF|}=\frac{|PF|}{|PF|}即得解如图所示,\trianglePQF的内心恰好是点,由对称性可知,区,所以P,Q关于x轴对称,所以已轴.设PQ交x轴于点F,则\overrightarrow{BC},所以点F是椭圆的左焦点,将代入椭圆的方程得\otimes所以过点M作ME\botPF,垂足为E,则B,所以区

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 若椭圆$C$上存在点$P$, 使得$P F_{1}=2 e P F_{2}$, ($e$为椭圆的离心率), 则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e;LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = (2*e)*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)
process: 椭圆C上存在点P,使得PF_{1}=2ePF_{2},又\thereforePF_{1}+PF_{2}=2a\thereforePF_{2}=\frac{2a}{2c+1}=\frac{2a^{2}}{2c+a}\cdotPF_{2}\in[a-c,a+c]

text: 经过两点$A(3, \frac{\sqrt{5}}{2})$ , $B(-4, \sqrt{3})$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (3, sqrt(5)/2);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (-4, sqrt(3));G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G)
process: 设双曲线的方程为mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1(mn<0),因为所求双曲线经过点_{A}(3,\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}),B(-4,\sqrt{3})所以\begin{cases}9m+\frac{5}{4}n=1,\\16m+3n=1,\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}m=\frac{1}{4},\\n=-1.\end{cases},故所求双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作垂直于$x$轴的直线，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则以$F$为圆心、$A B$为直径的圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;L: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F,L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);Intersection(L,G)={A,B};Center(H)=F;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$e$，若双曲线上点$P$，使$\frac{\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}}{\sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}}=e$，则$\overrightarrow{F_{2} P} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} F_{1}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);Sin(AngleOf(P, F2, F1))/Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = e;e:Number;Eccentricity(G)=e
process: 由双曲线方程x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1得a=1,c=2,由双曲线的定义得|\overrightarrow{PF}|-|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}||=2因为\frac{\sin\anglePF_{2}F_{1}}{\sin\anglePF_{1}F_{2}}=e=2,所以由正弦定理得\frac{|\overrightarrow{PF}|}{|\overrightarrow{PF}|}=2,可解得|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=4,|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=2.又|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|=4,根据余弦定理可得\cos\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=\frac{1}{4}所以\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{2}F_{1}}=|\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}|\cdot|\overrightarrow{F_{2}F_{1}}|\cdot\cos\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=2\times4\times\frac{1}{4}=2

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;a: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (-a + x)^2 = 1);IsTangent(H,Asymptote(G))

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过焦点$F_{1}$的直线交椭圆于$A$，$B$两点，则$\Delta ABF_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B}

text: 到$A(2,-3)$和$B(4,-1)$的距离相等的点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, -3);Coordinate(B) = (4, -1);H:Point;Distance(H,A)=Distance(H,B)
process: 由点P满足|PA|=|PB|,可知点P的轨迹为点A(2,-3)和B(4,-1)的垂直平分线\becauseA(2,-3)和B(4,-1)由中点坐标公式得AB的中点为(3,-2),k_{AB}=\frac{1+3}{4-2}=1,\therefore其垂直平分线的斜率为-1.\therefore点P的轨迹方程是y+2=-(x-3),即x+y-1=0.

text: 斜率为$1$的直线经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);H: Line;Slope(H) = 1;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 点$P$是抛物线${y}^{2}=4 x$上的一动点，则点$P$到点$A(0,-1)$的距离与点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离的和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x = -1);Coordinate(A) = (0, -1);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知圆$C$的圆心在抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上且与$x$轴和该抛物线的准线都相切，则圆$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;C: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Center(C),G);IsTangent(C,xAxis);IsTangent(C,Directrix(G))
process: 由题意可设圆的圆心为(\frac{b^{2}}{4},b),半径为r=|b|,抛物线的焦点F(1,0),准线方程为x=-1,则\frac{b^{2}}{4}+1=|b解得:b=2或b=-2,则半径为r=|b|=2

text: $A B$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$左支上过焦点$F_{1}$的弦，$|A B|=m$ , $F_{2}$为右焦点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长 是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F1:Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;Focus(G)={F1,F2};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = m;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B),LeftPart(G));PointOnCurve(F1,LineSegmentOf(A, B));m:Number

text: 直线$x+2 y-2=0$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点和一个顶点，则该椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), H);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)), H)
process: 对直线x+2y-2=0,令x=0,解得y=1;令y=0,解得x=2.故椭圆的右焦点坐标为(2,0),上顶点坐标为(0,1).则c=2,b=1,则a=\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}}=\sqrt{5}故椭圆离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}.

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 8

text: 斜率为$2$的直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$, 且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点,则线段$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Slope(l) = 2;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
process: 】联立直线与抛物线方程,根据抛物线焦点弦的计算公式:x_{A}+x_{B}+p,即可求解出过焦点的弦长因为焦点F(2,0),所以l:y=2(x-2),联立直线与抛物线可得:\begin{cases}y^{2}=8x\\y=2x-4\end{cases},所以4x^{2}-24x+16=0即x^{2}-6x+4=0,所以x_{A}+x_{B}=6,所以AB=x_{A}+x_{B}+p=6+4=10.

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$, 点$P$在双曲线上，若$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则点$P$到$x$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/2 = 1)
process: 由题意a=\sqrt{3},b=\sqrt{2},所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{5},焦点为(\pm\sqrt{5},0)

text: 若直线$l$: $y=x+\frac{3}{2}$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$只有1个公共点，则抛物线$C$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;P: Number;P>0;Expression(l)=(y = x + 3/2);Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(P*x));NumIntersection(l,C)=1
process: 由y=x+\frac{3}{2}可得x=y-\frac{3}{2},将x=y-\frac{3}{2}代入y^{2}=2px,消去x可得y^{2}-2py+3p=0因为直线l与抛物线C只有1个公共点,所以A=(-2p)^{2}-12p=0,即p^{2}-3p=0,解得p=0(舍去)或p=3,所以抛物线C的准线方程为x=-\frac{3}{2}

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/9 = 1)
process: 由题意得,根据椭圆的方程可知a=3,b=2,c=\sqrt{9-4}=\sqrt{5},所以离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0) $的焦点及短轴端点都在同一圆上，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);PointOnCurve(Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)),H)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左顶点与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的距离为$4$，且双曲线的一条渐近线与拋物线准线的交点坐标为$(-2,-1)$，则双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;p: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Distance(LeftVertex(G), Focus(H)) = 4;Coordinate(Intersection(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),Directrix(H)))=(-2,-1)

text: 抛物线$y=16 x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 16*x^2)
process: 由题可得抛物线的标准方程为x^{2}=\frac{1}{16}y,开口向上,焦点在y轴上且2p=\frac{1}{16}所以焦点坐标为(0,\frac{1}{64})

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点为$F_{2}$，设$P$、$Q$是椭圆$C$上的两个动点，且$P Q=2 \sqrt{2}$，则当$P F_{2}+Q F_{2}$取得最大值时，$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);PointOnCurve(Q, C);LineSegmentOf(P, Q) = 2*sqrt(2);WhenMax(LineSegmentOf(P,F2)+LineSegmentOf(Q,F2))

text: 点$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$的直线与抛物线交$A$、$B$两点，则弦长$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = pi/3;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G)
process: 由题意可得,抛物线的焦点F(1,0),由直线的斜角为\frac{\pi}{3}可知直线AB的斜率为\sqrt{3}\therefore直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)联立方程\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)\\y^{2}=4x\end{cases}可得,3x^{2}-10x+3=0解可得,x_{1}=3或x_{2}=\frac{1}{3}由抛物线的定义可知,|AB|=|AF|+|BF|=x_{1}+1+x_{2}+1=\frac{16}{3}

text: 过点$M(-1,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点（$A$在$M$、$B$之间)，$F$是$C$的焦点，点$N$满足$\overrightarrow{N F}=6 \overrightarrow{A F}$，则$\Delta A B F$与$\Delta A M N$的面积之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;N: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (-1, 0);PointOnCurve(M, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Between(A, M, B);Focus(C) = F;VectorOf(N, F) = 6*VectorOf(A, F)
query_expressions: Min(Area(TriangleOf(A, B, F)) + Area(TriangleOf(A, M, N)))
process: 根据直线l过点M(-1,0),设出直线l的方程联立抛物线后可表示出A,B两点的纵坐标,利用\overrightarrow{NF}=6\overrightarrow{AF}可表示出点N纵坐标,由三角形面积公式可表示\triangleABF与\triangleAMN的面积之和,对表达式求导,根据导数即可求面积和的最小值.设直线方程为x=ty-1,联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=4x\\x=ty-1\end{cases},化简可得y^{2}-4ty+4=0,则_{A}=16t^{2}-16>0,解得t>1或t<-1,不妨设t>1,则y_{A}=2t-2\sqrt{t^{2}-1},y_{B}=2t+2\sqrt{t^{2}-1},因为\overrightarrow{NF}=6\overrightarrow{AF},所以y_{N}=6y_{A}=12t-12\sqrt{t^{2}-1},所以S_{\DeltaABF}=S_{\DeltaMBF}-S_{\DeltaAMF}=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times(y_{B}-y_{A})=y_{B}-y_{A}S_{\DeltaAMN}=S_{\DeltaMNF}-S_{\DeltaAMF}-=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times(y_{N}-y_{A})=y_{N}-y_{A}则S_{\DeltaABF}+S_{\DeltaAMN}=y_{B}-y_{A}+y_{N}-y_{A}=2t+2\sqrt{t^{2}-1}+12t-12\sqrt{l^{2}-1}-2(2t-2\sqrt{t^{2}-1})0t-6\sqrt{t^{2}-}1(t>1),令f(t)=10t-6\sqrt{t^{2}-1},则f'(t)=10-\frac{6t}{\sqrt{2-1}},令f'(t)=0解得t=\frac{5}{4},当1<t<\frac{5}{4}时,f(t)<0,所以f(t)在(1,\frac{5}{4})上单调递减,当t>\frac{5}{4}时,f'(t)>0,所以f(t)在(\frac{5}{4},+\infty)上单调递增,即当t=\frac{5}{4}时f(t)取得最小值,所以S_{AABF}+S_{\triangleAMN}的最小值为8,均答家为:8()本题老杳百线与抛物线的位置关系的应用老杳抛物线中=的求法老杳和用导函数求最值

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/100 + y^2/36 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 6

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{3-t}-\frac{y^{2}}{1-t}=1$所表示的曲线为椭圆，则实数$t$的取值范围是?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，若在双曲线右支上存在点$P$，满足$|P F_{1}|-|P F_{2}|=\frac{3}{5}|F_{1} F_{2}|$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = (3/5)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2))
process: 解:\because|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=\frac{3}{5}|F_{1}F_{2}|,\therefore2a=\frac{3}{5}\cdot2c,\thereforea=\frac{3}{5}c^{'}所以b=\frac{4}{8}c\Rightarrow\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3},渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x

text: 点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆的左右焦点，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot |P F_{2} |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 试题分析:由已知条件利用椭圆定义和余弦定理列出方程组,由此能求出|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|.解:\because点P是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1上的一点,F_{1}、F_{2}分别是椭圆的左右焦点,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=60^{\circ}\therefore\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=6\\\cos60^{\circ}=\frac{|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}-|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}}{16}^{2|PF_{1}|}\cdot|PF_{2}|\end{cases}解得|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=\frac{16}{3}.

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$, $P$是$l$上一点，$Q$是直线$P F$与$C$的一个交点，若$\overrightarrow{F P}=4 \overrightarrow{F Q}$，则$|Q F|$等于?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;F: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;l: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(P, l);OneOf(Intersection(LineOf(P,F),C))=Q;VectorOf(F, P) = 4*VectorOf(F, Q)
process: 试题分析:求得直线PF的方程,与y^{2}=8x联立可得x=1,利用|QF|=d可求.解:设Q到l的距离为d,则|QF|=d,\because\overrightarrow{FP}=4\overrightarrow{FQ},\therefore|PQ|=3d,\therefore不妨设直线PF的斜率为\cdot\frac{2\sqrt{2}d}{d}=2\sqrt{2},\becauseF(2,0)\therefore直线PF的方程为y=-2\sqrt{2}(x-2)与y^{2}=8x联立可得x=1\therefore|QF|=d=1+2=3,

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=2 x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

process: \becauseAF=AM,N为AM的中点,且FN\botAM,\therefore\angleAFN=30^{\circ},则直线AB的倾斜角为60^{\circ},斜率为\sqrt{3}.由抛物线y^{2}=12x,得F(3,0),则直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-3)联立\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-3)\\v2=12x\end{cases},得x^{2}-10x+9=0.则x_{A}+x_{B}=10,\therefore|AB|=x_{A}+x_{B}+p=16[

text: 已知圆$(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=36$的圆心为$M$，设$A$为圆上任一点，且点$N(2,0)$，线段$A N$的垂直平分线交$M A$于点$P$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;A: Point;N: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x + 2)^2 = 36);Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);Center(G)=M;PointOnCurve(A, G);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,N)), LineSegmentOf(M, A)) = P
process: 先由圆的方程,得到圆心为M(-2,0),半径为r=6,设点P(x,y),根据题中条件,由对称性,得到|PM|+|PN|=|PM|+|PA|=6>|MN|=4,所以点P的轨迹是以M(-2,0),N(2,0)为焦点,以2a=6为长轴长的椭圆,进而可求出结果.详解]因为圆(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=36的圆心为M(-2,0),半径为r=6设点P(x,y),所以|PN|=|PA|,因此|PM|+|PN|=|PM|+|PA|=|MA|=6>|MN|=4,因此点P的轨迹是以M(-2,0),N(2,0)为焦点,以2a=6为长轴长的椭圆.即b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{9-4}=\sqrt{5}所以动点P的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$的两个焦点，$P$是双曲线上的一点，且$3 P F_{1}=4 P F_{2}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/24 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);3*LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 4*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)
process: 先由双曲线的方程求出F_{1}F_{2}|=10,再由3|PF_{1}|=4|PF_{2}|,求出|PF_{1}|=8,|PF_{2}|=6,由此能求出\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的面积.详解】双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1的两个焦点F_{1}(-5,0),F_{2}(5,0),|F_{1}F_{2}|=10由3|PF_{1}|=4|PF_{2}|,设|PF_{2}|=x,则PF_{1}|=\frac{4}{3}x,由双曲线的性质知\frac{4}{3}x-x=2,解得x=6.\therefore|PF_{1}|=8,|PF_{2}|=6,\becauseF_{1}F_{2}=10,\therefore\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},\therefore\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的面积=\frac{1}{2}\times8\times6=24.答案为2的时)本题考查双曲线的性质和应用,考查三角形面积的计算,属于基础题

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$上的一点，若$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=\sqrt{| \overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|^{2}}$ ,$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|=2|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(VectorOf(P, F1) + VectorOf(P, F2)) = sqrt(Abs(VectorOf(P, F1))^2 + Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))^2);Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))
process: 将|\overrightarrow{PF}|+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=\sqrt{|\overrightarrow{PF}|}^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}两边同时平导\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形,由双曲线的定义可得|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=2a,|\overrightarrow{PF}|=\overline{F_{1}}=2c,由勾股定理列方程可得关于a,c的方程,再由离心率公式即可求解.\neq解】由|\overrightarrow{PF}|+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=\sqrt{|\overrightarrow{PF}|}^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}可得(\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{PF_{2}})^{2}=|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|即\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}^{2}+PF_{2}^{2}+2\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}所以|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}+2\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{PF}|^{2}+|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|^{2}可得\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}=0所以\overrightarrow{PF}\bot\overrightarrow{PF},所以\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形.设|\overrightarrow{PF}|=m,则|\overrightarrow{PF}|=2m,由双曲线的定义可得|\overrightarrow{PF}|-|\overrightarrow{PF}|=2m-m=2a,所以m=2a,|\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}|=2a,|\overrightarrow{PF}|=4a,|\overrightarrow{F_{1}F_{2}}|=2c.在Rt\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}2=F_{1}F_{2}2即(4a)^{2}+(2a)^{2}=(2c)^{2}所以20a^{2}=4c^{2},所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{20}{4}=5,所以e=\sqrt{5},

text: 若点$P$是方程$\sqrt{(x-5)^{2}+y^{2}}-\sqrt{(x+5)^{2}+y^{2}}=6$所表示的曲线上的点，点$P$又是直线$y=4$上的点,则点$P$的横坐标为?

text: 若$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\Delta A F_{2} B$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 由椭圆的定义可知|AF_{1}|+|AF_{2}|=2a=|BF_{1}|+|BF_{2}|又\because|AB|=|AF_{1}|+|BF_{1}|\thereforeAAF_{2}B的周长为|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|+|AB|=|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|+|AF_{1}|+|BF_{1}|=4a.椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1中,a=4,\thereforeAAF_{2}B的周长为4a=16.

text: 若中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的椭圆过点$P(3,0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$\sqrt{3}$倍，则其标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(P) = (3, 0);Center(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G)=axis;PointOnCurve(P,G);Length(MajorAxis(G))=sqrt(3)*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 分别讨论椭圆焦点在x轴和y轴上两种情况,采用待定系数法,根据a=\sqrt{3}b和椭圆过P(3,0)可求得结果.\textcircled{1}当椭圆焦点在x轴时,设其方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)\because长轴长是短轴长的\sqrt{3}倍,\thereforea=\sqrt{3}b,又椭圆过P(3,0)\therefore\frac{9}{a^{2}}=1,解得:a^{2}=9,\thereforeb^{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{3}=3,\therefore标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\textcircled{2}当椭圆焦点在y轴时,设其方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),\because长轴长是短轴长的\sqrt{3}倍,\thereforea=\sqrt{3}b,又椭圆过P(3,0)\therefore\frac{9}{b^{2}}=1,解得:b^{2}=9,\thereforea^{2}=3b^{2}=27,\therefore标准方程为\frac{y^{2}}{27}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1;综上所述:所求椭圆的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1或\frac{y^{2}}{27}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1

process: 将点P(4,4)坐标代入抛物线C:x^{2}=2py,解得p=2,即抛物线方程为x^{2}=4y所以|PF|=4+\frac{p}{2}=5.

text: 已知椭圆$G$的中心在原点，长轴在$x$轴上，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，且$G$上一点到$G$的两焦点的距离之和为$12$，则椭圆$G$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;OverlappingLine(MajorAxis(G), xAxis);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 12;Focus(G) = {F1, F2}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的弦$A B$过点$(-1,0)$，则弦$A B$中点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(G) = (-1, 0);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C);PointOnCurve(G,LineSegmentOf(A,B))
process: 试题分析:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),AB中点C(x,y),若直线AB斜率存在:\frac{x_{1}2}{3}+y_{1}2=1\textcircled{1},\frac{x_{2}^{2}}{3}+y_{2}^{2}=1\textcircled{2},\textcircled{1}-\textcircled{2},得\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{3}+(y_{1}+y_{2})\times\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}}=0,即\frac{2x}{3}+2y\times\frac{y-x_{2}}{x+}x^{2}+x+3y^{2}=0;若AB斜率不存在:C(-1,0)也满足,综上所述,AB中点的轨迹方程为x^{2}+x+3y^{2}=0

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的一条渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/2 = 1)
process: 试题分析:求出双曲线的a=2,b=\sqrt{2},再由渐近线方程y=\pm\frac{b}{a},即可得到.解:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1的a=2,b=\sqrt{2},则渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}x

text: 已知点$M$是椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$上的一动点，点$T$的坐标为$(0,-3)$，点$N$满足$|N T|=1$，且$\angle M N T=90^{\circ}$，则$|M N|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/25 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;T: Point;Coordinate(T) = (0, -3);N: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, T)) = 1;AngleOf(M, N, T) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)
process: 解:如图,M在椭圆上,N在以T为圆心,以1为半径的圆上,由椭圆\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1,得点T为椭圆的下焦点要使|MN|最大,则|MT|最大,|MT|_{\max}=5+3=8,\therefore|MN|_{\max}=\sqrt{8^{2}-1^{2}}=3\sqrt{7}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$ , $A(-1,0)$，点$P$是抛物线上的动点，则当$|P F|$的值最小时，$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)))
process: 抛物线的准线方程为x=-1.设P到准线的距离为|PQ|,则|PQ|=|PF|\therefore\frac{|PF|}{|PA|}=\frac{|PQ|}{|PA|}=\sin\anglePAQ\therefore当PA与抛物线y^{2}=4x相切时,\anglePAQ最小,即\frac{|PF|}{|PA|}取得最小值设过A点的直线y=kx+k与抛物线相切(k\neq0),代入抛物线方程得k^{2}x^{2}+(2k^{2}-4)x+k^{2}=0,\thereforea=(2k^{2}-4)^{2}-4k^{4}=0,解得k=\pm1.即x^{2}-2x+1=0,解得x=1,把x=1代入y^{2}=4x得y=\pm2.\thereforeP(1,2)或P(1,-2),\therefore|PF|=2.

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上两点，线段$A B$的中点在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$上，则直线$A B$在$y$轴上截距的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,C);PointOnCurve(B,C);PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), G)
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),AB中点D(x_{0},y_{0}),直线AB:y=kx+m,代入椭圆方程消去y得到关于x的一元二次方程,由韦达定理求出x_{1}+x_{2},x_{1}x_{2},即可求出_{x_{0}}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}}{2},y_{0}=\frac{y_{1}+y_{2}}{2}用k,m表示,再将其代入x^{2}+y^{2}=1中,看成关于k^{2}的方程由二次函数根的分布即可求m的范围设直线AB:y=kx+m,A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),AB中点D(x_{0},y_{0})由\begin{cases}y=kx+m\\\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\end{cases}可得:3x^{2}+4(kx+m)^{2}=12,即(3+4k^{2})x^{2}+8mkx+4m^{2}-12=0所以x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{-8km}{3+4k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=\frac{4m2-12}{3+4k^{2}},y_{1}+y_{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2})+2m=\frac{-8k^{2}m}{3+4k^{2}+2m=\frac{6m}{3+4k^{2}}}所以x_{0}=\frac{-4km}{3+4k^{2}},y_{0}=\frac{3m}{3+4k^{2}}因为点D(x_{0},y_{0})在圆x^{2}+y^{2}=1上所以(\frac{-4km}{3+4k^{2}})^{2}+(\frac{3m}{3+4k^{2}})^{2}=1,整理可得:16k^{4}+(24-16m^{2})k^{2}+9-9m^{2}=0设t=k^{2},则16t^{2}+(24-16m^{2})t+9-9m^{2}=0在t\geqslant0有解,所以A=(24-16m^{2})^{2}-4\times16\times(9-9m^{2})\geqslant0,整理得:m^{2}\geqslant\frac{3}{4}解得:m\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}或m\leqslant-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},\textcircled{1}对称轴x=\frac{16m2-24}{32}\geqslant0,解得:m\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}或m\leqslant-\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},此时方程在t\geqslant0一定有解;\textcircled{2}由\begin{cases}x=\frac{16m2-24}{32}<0\\f(0)=9-9m^{2}\leqslant0\end{cases},可得-\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}<m\leqslant-1^{或}1\leqslantm<\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}综上所述:m\leqslant-1或m\geqslant1所以直线AB在y轴上截距的取值范围为(-\infty,-1]\cup[1,+\infty)

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}+m y^{2}=1$过点$(-\sqrt{2} , 2)$，则该双曲线的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (m*y^2 + x^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (-sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 试题分析:由题意得2+4m=1,m=-\frac{1}{4},因此双曲线的虚轴长为2\times2=4.

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$是双曲线左支上的一点，直线$A F_{1}$与直线$y=\frac{b}{a} \cdot x$平行，$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为$8 a$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LeftPart(G));IsParallel(LineOf(A, F1), H);H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x*(b/a));Perimeter(TriangleOf(A, F1, F2)) = 8*a
process: 根据双曲线的定义分析AF_{1},AF_{2}的关系,再根据直线AF_{1}与直线_{y}=\frac{b}{a}\cdotx平行可得\tan\angleAF_{1}F_{2}的表达式,进而求得\cos\angleAF_{1}F_{2},再在焦点三角形中利用余弦定理化简求解即可.由题,设AF_{1}=x,则AF_{2}=x+2a,又AAF_{1}F_{2}的周长为8a,可得x+x+2a+2c=8a\Rightarrowx=3a-c.又直线AF_{1}与直线y=\frac{b}{a}\cdotx平行,故\tan\angleAF_{1}F_{2}=\frac{b}{a},故^{\cos\angleAF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{a}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{a}{c}由余弦定理可得,(5a-c)^{2}=(3a-c)^{2}+(2c)^{2}-2(3a-c)\cdot(2c)\cos\angleAF_{2}F_{1}整理得c^{2}+2ac-7a^{2}=0,同除以a^{2}可得e^{2}+2e-7=0,故e=\frac{-2\pm\sqrt{4+28}}{2}=-1\pm2\sqrt{2}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2 p}-\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1$的一个焦点，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;p: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(2*p) - y^2/p = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(H) = OneOf(Focus(G))
process: 因为抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点为(\frac{p}{2},0)所以双曲线的右焦点为(\frac{p}{2},0),又因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{2p}-\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1的右焦点坐标为(\sqrt{3p},0)所以\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{3p}解得p=12,均答安为:12

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的一条准线方程为$x=\frac{3}{2}$，则$a$等于?该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Directrix(G))) = (x = 3/2)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3 a}$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3*a)
process: 依题意有\frac{\sqrt{a+2}}{\sqrt{a}}=\sqrt{3a},即3a^{2}-a-2=0,解得a=1,所以渐近线的方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x=\pm\sqrt{2}x

text: 已知动点$M$到$A(2,1)$的距离与到$B(3,4)$的距离相等，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;M:Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (3, 4);Distance(M,A)=Distance(M,B)
process: 设M的坐标为(x,y),由题意,得|MA|=|MB|,即\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}}=\sqrt{(x-3)^{2}+(y-4)^{2}}两边平方并化简,得x+3y-10=0,故点M的轨迹方程为x+3y-10=0.

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m^2 + 12) - y^2/(4 - m^2) = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/6 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: 解:\because椭圆\frac{x2}{m}+\frac{y2}{6}=1,\therefore\textcircled{1}当椭圆焦点在x轴上时,a^{2}=m,b^{2}=6,可得c=\sqrt{m-6}离心率e=\frac{\sqrt{m-6}}{\sqrt{m}}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=8;\textcircled{2}当椭圆焦点在y轴上时,a^{2}=6,b^{2}=m,可得c=\sqrt{6-m}离心率e=\frac{\sqrt{6-m}}{\sqrt{6}}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=\frac{9}{2}综上所述m=\frac{9}{2}或8.

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}
process: 根据题设条件写出直线AB的方程为:y=\sqrt{3}x-\sqrt{3},与抛物线联立得到:3x^{2}-1D.x+3=0,利用弦长公式求|AB|.因为焦点F(1,0),k_{AB}=\tan60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}\therefore直线AB的方程为:y=\sqrt{3}x-\sqrt{3},代入y^{2}=4x,整理得到:3x^{2}-10x+3=0\thereforex=3或x=\frac{1}{3},所以不妨取A(\frac{1}{3},-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}),B(3,2\sqrt{3}),\therefore|AB|=\sqrt{(\frac{1}{3}-2}\frac{人个分取}{-3)^{2}+(-\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}-2\sqrt{3})}=\frac{16}{3}

fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/3 = 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2)) = 8

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$，直线$l$: $x=4 a$与双曲线$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$、$B$两点若$\Delta O A B$(点$O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$32$，且双曲线$C$的焦距为$2 \sqrt{5}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;L1:Line;L2:Line;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(x=4*a);Asymptote(C)={L1,L2};Intersection(l,L1)=A;Intersection(l,L2)=B;Area(TriangleOf(O,A,B))=32;FocalLength(C) = 2*sqrt(5)

text: 已知$\frac{1}{m}+\frac{2}{n}=1(m>0 , n>0)$，则当$m \cdot n$取得最小值时，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{n^{2}}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;n: Number;m: Number;m>0;n>0;2/n + 1/m = 1;WhenMin(m*n);Expression(G) = (y^2/n^2 + x^2/m^2 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦点到渐近线的距离为$\frac{a^{2}}{b}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G))= a^2/b
process: 解:取双曲线的右焦点F(c,0),取双曲线的渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x,即bx-ay=0.依题意得\frac{bc}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\frac{a^{2}}{b},即b=a,\therefore该双曲线的离心率_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}{a}=\sqrt{2}

text: 焦点在$x$轴上，焦距为$6$，且经过点$(\sqrt{5}, 0)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(5), 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 6;PointOnCurve(H, G)
process: 焦点在x轴上,焦距为6,c=3,且经过点(\sqrt{5},0)可得a=\sqrt{5}所以b^{2}=9-5=4.双曲线的标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 点$P$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上，点$P$到直线$3 x-4 y=24$的最大距离和最小距离为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-6 y+5=0$没有公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-6*y + x^2 + y^2 + 5 = 0);NumIntersection(Asymptote(G), H) = 0
process: 先根据双曲线方程求得双曲线的渐近线,进而利用圆心到渐近线的距离大于半径,求得a和b的关系,进而利用c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}求得a和c的关系,则双曲线的离心率可求.解】\because双曲线渐近线为bx\pmay=0,与圆x^{2}+(y\cdot3)^{2}=4没有公共点,\therefore圆心到新近线的距离大于半径,即\frac{3a}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}>2.\therefore9a^{2}>4c^{2},由e=\frac{c}{a}<\frac{3}{2}与睛)本题主要考查了双曲线的简单性质,直线与圆的位置关系,点到直线的距离公式等.考查了学生数形结合的用相的运用,届干中档题

text: 设点$O$是抛物线的顶点，$F$是焦点，$P Q$是过焦点的弦，已知$|O F|=1$,$|P Q|=5$，则$\triangle O P Q$的面积是?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$ , $B$两点，若线段$AB$的长为$8$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(45, degree);Intersection(H,G) = {B, A};Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8;F: Point

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的焦距是$8$，渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (y^2/4 - x^2/b^2 = 1);FocalLength(G) = 8
process: 解:由双曲线\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)的焦距是8,则c=4,a=2,又a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},得4+b^{2}=16解得b=2\sqrt{3}则双曲线方程为\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{12}=1,即双曲线渐近线方程是y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，椭圆上的点$M$满足$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，且$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}=4$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);AngleOf(F1, M, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F1), VectorOf(M, F2)) = 4

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$右焦点$F_{2}$的最短弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);F2: Point;RightFocus(G) = F2;H: LineSegment;IsChordOf(H, G);PointOnCurve(F2, H)
process: 由椭圆的性质,过椭圆焦点的最短弦即为垂径,由椭圆方程:a=5,b=4\thereforec=3故右焦点坐标为(3,0),令x=3,代入解得:y=\pm\frac{16}{6}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点为$(\sqrt{13}, 0)$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(13), 0);RightFocus(G) = H

text: 双曲线的中心在坐标原点，离心率等于$2$，它的一个顶点与抛物线$y^{2}=-8 x$的焦点重合，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;G:Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = -8*x);Eccentricity(G)=2;Center(G)=O;OneOf(Vertex(G))=Focus(H)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$上横坐标为$\frac{3 a}{2}$的点到右焦点的距离大于它到左准线的距离，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);XCoordinate(P)=3*a/2;Distance(P,RightFocus(G))>Distance(P,LeftDirectrix(G))

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$  (其中$a>0 , b>0$)的焦距为$4 \sqrt{5}$，其中一条渐近线的斜率为$2$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;FocalLength(C) = 4*sqrt(5);Slope(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = 2
process: 根据渐近线斜率求得b=2a,根据焦距求得c的值,利用a,b,c的平方关系得到关于a的方程,求得a的值.[详解]双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的的渐进线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x\because一条渐近线的斜率为2,\therefore\frac{b}{a}=2,即b=2a,又\because2c=4\sqrt{5},\thereforec=2\sqrt{5},\thereforec^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}=5a^{2}=20\thereforea=2,均答安为:2

text: 已知点$M(-2,0)$, $N(2,0)$，动点$P$满足条件$|P M|-|P N|=2 \sqrt{2}$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N)) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 试题分析:依题意,点P的轨迹是以M,N为焦点的双曲线的右支,又\becauseM(-2,0),N(2,0),|PM|-|PN|=2\sqrt{2}.\thereforec=2a=\sqrt{2},\therefore所求方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(x>0)

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$上的动点，点$P$在$y$轴上的射影是$M$ , $A(\frac{7}{2}, 4)$，则$|P A|+|P M|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(A) = (7/2, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Projection(P, yAxis) = M
process: 试题分析:由已知得,抛物线的焦点为F(\frac{1}{2},0),准线为x=-\frac{1}{2}.延长PM交准线于H点,则|PF|=|PH|,|PM|=|PH|-\frac{1}{2}=|PF|-\frac{1}{2},所以|PM|+|PA|=|PF|+|PA|-\frac{1}{2},我们只需求出|PF|+|PA|的最小值即可.又|PF|+|PA|\geqslant|AF|=\sqrt{(\frac{7}{2}-\frac{1}{2})^{2}+(4-0)^{2}}=5,所以|PA|+|PM|的最小值为5-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{9}{2}.

text: 已知定点$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,4)$，点$P$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$右支上任意一点，则$|P B|-|P A|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B) = (5, 4);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C))
process: 依题意可知a=4,b=3,所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=5'所以A(-5,0)为双曲线的左焦点,设右焦点为F(5,0).所以|PB|-|PA|=|PB|-(|PF|+2a)=|PB|-|PF|-8\leqslant|BF|-8=4-8=-4当且仅当P、F、B三点共线时,取等号

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，点$A$在$x$轴上方，$O$为坐标原点，当$|\overrightarrow{O A}| \geq|\overrightarrow{F A}|$时，直线$l$斜率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(A, xAxis);Abs(VectorOf(O, A)) >= Abs(VectorOf(F, A))
process: 根据|\overrightarrow{OA}|\geqslant|\overrightarrow{FA}|,可得x_{A}\geqslant\frac{p}{4},进一步得到y_{A},然后根据直线l斜率\frac{y_{A}}{x_{A}-\frac{p}{2}},可得结果由题意知:点A的横坐标x_{A}\geqslant\frac{p}{4}时,满足|\overrightarrow{OA}|\geqslant|\overrightarrow{FA}|,此时y_{A}\geqslant\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}p'故直线l的斜率的取值范围是(-\infty,-2\sqrt{2}]\cup(0,+\infty)

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$具有相同的渐近线，且经过点$A(3,-2 \sqrt{3})$的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (3, -2*sqrt(3));Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(G);PointOnCurve(A, C)
process: 解:设与双曲线\frac{x2}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1具有相同的渐近线的双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}--\frac{3}{1}\frac{2}{6}=nn(m\neq0),代入点A(3,-2\sqrt{3}),解得m=\frac{1}{4},则所求双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=\frac{1}{4},

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\frac{3}{4}$，点$P$为$C$上一点，若$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为$7$，且$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$内切圆的半径为$1$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Eccentricity(C)=3/4;PointOnCurve(P, C);Area(TriangleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 7;Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)))=1
process: 由\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积为7,得\frac{1}{2}(2a+2c)r=7,即a+c=7.又离心率为\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3}{4},所以a=4,c=3,所以b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=7,故C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$M$是这条抛物线上的一个动点，$P(3,1)$是一个定点，则$|M P|+|M F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: F: Point;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3, 1)
process: 设点M在准线上的射影为D,则根据抛物线定义可得:|MF|=|MD|,所以|MP|+|MF|的最小值,即为|PM|+|MD|的最小值.当D,M,P三点共线时|PM|+|MD|最小,其值为3-(-1)=4,

text: 一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，焦点$(4,0)$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);Coordinate(Focus(G))=(4,0)
process: 试题分析:由题意可知\begin{cases}\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3}\\c=4\\c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\end{cases}可得a^{2}=4,b^{2}=12,所以双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的焦点到准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 8*y)
process: 试题分析:抛物线x^{2}=8y的焦点是(0,2),准线方程是y=-2,所以焦点到准线的距离是4.

fact_expressions: C: Curve;M: Point;Expression(C) = (sqrt(y^2/7) + sqrt(x^2/16) = 1);Coordinate(M) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(M, C) = True;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(B) = (3, 0);x1: Number;y1: Number
process: 曲线C:\sqrt{\frac{x^{2}}{16}}+\sqrt{\frac{y^{2}}{7}}=1可化为\frac{|x|}{4}+\frac{|y|}{\sqrt{7}}=1,它的图像是以点(\pm4,0)和(0,\pm\sqrt{7})为顶点的平行四边形,且是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1的内接平行四边形,利用椭圆性质可知当M在椭圆上时|MA|+|MB|=8,而M在椭圆内时|MA|+|MB|<8,综上可得|MA|+|MB|的最大值为8.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$，以$C$的右焦点为圆心且与$C$的渐近线相切的圆的半径是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);RightFocus(C)=Center(G);IsTangent(G, Asymptote(C))

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点$F$，直线$y=\sqrt{3} x$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点 (点$A$在第一象限)，且$O A=O F$($O$为坐标原点)，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;B:Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);RightFocus(C) = F;Intersection(G,C)={A,B};Quadrant(A)=1;LineSegmentOf(O, A) = LineSegmentOf(O, F)
process: 设椭圆左焦点为F_{1},连接F_{1}A、F_{1}B.在\triangleAFB中,OA=OB=OF=c,\angleAOF=\frac{\pi}{3},则AF\botBF,AF=c,BF=\sqrt{3}c由F_{1}O=FO,OA=OB,可知四边形F_{1}AFB为平行四边形,则AF+BF=AF+AF_{1}=2a,又AF+BF=c+\sqrt{3}c则c+\sqrt{3}c=2a,故椭圆的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{1+\sqrt{3}}=\sqrt{3}-1

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 6

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$在椭圆上运动，当$\frac{1}{|P F_{1}|}+\frac{4}{|P F_{2}|}$的值最小时，$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/6 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(1/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))+4/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)))

text: 已知双曲线 $C$ 经过点 $C1$$(1，1)$ ，它的一条渐近线方程为 $y=\sqrt3 x$. 则双曲线$C$ 的标准方程是？
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;C1: Point;Coordinate(C1) = (1,1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的焦点为顶点，离心率为$2$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);G: Hyperbola;Focus(H) = Vertex(G);Eccentricity(G) = 2
C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;F: Point;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (x0, y0);x0: Number;y0: Number;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = (5/4)*x0
process: 根据抛物线的定义可得,A到焦点F的距离等于其到准线x=-1的距离.故x_{0}+1=\frac{5}{4}x_{0}解得x_{0}=4.

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上一点$P$到焦点的距离是$6$，则点$P$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = 6
process: 利用抛物线的定义可求得点P的横坐标,进而可求得i安点的纵坐标,由此可得结果设点P的坐标为(x_{0},y_{0}),抛物线y^{2}=8x的准线方程为x=-2.由抛物线的定义可得x_{0}+2=6\Rightarrowx_{0}=4,\thereforey_{0}^{2}=8x_{0}=32,解得y_{0}=\pm4\sqrt{2}因此,点P的坐标是(4,\pm4\sqrt{2})

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上任一点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$的最大值为$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);Max(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = (2*pi)/3
process: 试题分析:由椭圆的性质可得:当点P取椭圆短轴的一个端点时,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}取得最大值为\frac{2\pi}{3},可得\tan\angleOPF_{2}=\tan\frac{\pi}{3}=\sqrt{3}=\frac{c}{b},化简整理即可得出解:由椭圆的性质可得:当点P取椭圆短轴的一个端点时,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}取得最大值为\frac{2\pi}{3}\therefore\tan\angleOPF_{2}=\tan\frac{\pi}{3}=\sqrt{3}=\frac{c}{b},\thereforec^{2}=3b^{2}=3(a^{2}-c^{2})

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左右焦点，直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3} x$与双曲线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A B|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(l)=(y = sqrt(3)*x) ;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2))
process: 不妨设A,B分别在第一、第三象限,则\angleAOF_{2}=60^{\circ}由|AB|=|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c得|OA|=|OF_{2}|,且四边形AF_{1}BF_{2}为矩形.故\triangleAOF_{2}是正三角形,|AF_{2}|=c,|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c.由双曲线的定义知\sqrt{3}c-c=2a.从而e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3}+1

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/8 = 1)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/25 = 1)
process: 在双曲线的标准方程中,把1换成0,即得此双曲线的渐近线方程[详解]令\frac{x^{2}}{9}\cdot\frac{y^{2}}{2<}=0得\therefore双曲线\frac{x2}{9}\cdot\frac{y^{2}}{25}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{5}{3}x

text: 若双曲线$C$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$共渐近线，且过点$A(3, \sqrt{2})$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;H: Hyperbola;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A,C);Expression(H) = (x^2/12-y^2/8=1);Coordinate(A) = (3, sqrt(2));Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(H)
process: 因为双曲线C与双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1共渐近线,所以设双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=\lambda(\lambda\neq0)因为双曲线C过点A(3,\sqrt{2})所以\frac{9}{12}-\frac{2}{8}=\lambda,可得\lambda=\frac{1}{2}所以双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=\frac{1}{2},即\frac{x^{2}}{6}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的右准线与渐近线的交点在抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$上，则实数$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Real;PointOnCurve(Intersection(RightDirectrix(G), Asymptote(G)), H)
process: 解:双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1的右准线x=\frac{a^{2}}{c}=\frac{4}{4}=1,渐近线y=\pm\sqrt{3}x,双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1的右准线与渐近线的交点(1,\pm\sqrt{3})交点在抛物线y^{2}=2px上,可得:3=2p解得p=\frac{3}{2}

text: 已知椭圆$E$的中心为坐标原点，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，$E$的右焦点与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=12 x$的焦点重合，$A$、$B$是$C$的准线与$E$的两个交点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;E: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;O:Origin;Center(E)=O;Eccentricity(E)=sqrt(3)/2;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 12*x);RightFocus(E) = Focus(C);Intersection(Directrix(C),E)={A,B}
process: 试题分析:可由抛物线的焦点坐标求出椭圆的焦点坐标(3,0),所以c=3,然后由离心率得a=2\sqrt{3},则椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1.已知弦AB的长即为通经长\frac{2b^{2}}{a}=\sqrt{3}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上有点$A$，它的横坐标是$3$，它到焦点的距离是$5$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);XCoordinate(A) = 3;Distance(A, Focus(G)) = 5
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: \textcircled{1}当椭圆的焦点在x轴上时,由题意得\frac{\sqrt{4-m}}{2}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=3;\textcircled{2}当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,由题意得\frac{\sqrt{m-4}}{\sqrt{m}}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=\frac{16}{3}综上,m=3或m=\frac{16}{3}

text: 已知定点$P(-4,0)$和定圆$Q$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=8 x$，动圆$M$和圆$Q$外切，且经过点$P$，求圆心$M$的轨迹方程?
fact_expressions: Q: Circle;P: Point;M: Circle;Expression(Q) = (x^2 + y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(P) = (-4, 0);PointOnCurve(P,M);IsOutTangent(M,Q);Center(M)=M1;M1:Point
process: 结合图象可得,|MQ|\cdot|MP|=4,可得a=2,c=4,则b=2\sqrt{3}M的轨迹为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y}{1}

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$上一点$P$到双曲线的一个焦点的距离等于$6$，那么$P$点到另一焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 6

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的半焦距为$c$，且$c=\sqrt{3} b$，若椭圆$E$经过$A$、$B$两点，且$A B$是圆$M$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=r^{2}$的一条直径，则直线$A B$的方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，右焦点为$F_{2}$，点$M$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$上，且$M$在第一象限，过$M$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$的切线交椭圆于$P$，$Q$两点. 若$\Delta P F_{2} Q$的周长为$4$，则椭圆$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Eccentricity(C) = 1/2;F2: Point;RightFocus(C) = F2;M: Point;G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = b^2);PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Quadrant(M) = 1;P: Point;Q: Point;l: Line;TangentOnPoint(M,G) = l;Perimeter(TriangleOf(P, F2, Q)) = 4;Intersection(l,C) = {P,Q}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (a>b>0)$的两焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，若在椭圆上存在一点$P$，使$PF_{1} \perp PF_{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 平面上有三个点$A(-2, y)$, $B(0, \frac{\gamma}{2})$, $C(x, y)$, 若$\overrightarrow{A B} \perp \overrightarrow{B C}$, 则动点$C$的轨迹方程是?
