text: $P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$上的点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是两个焦点，则$|PF_{1}| \cdot| PF_{2}|$的最大值与最小值之差是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G)={F1,F2}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，若抛物线$C$上一点$P(4, y_{0})$满足$|F P|=4$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*p*y);p: Number;p > 0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (4, y0);y0: Number;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, P)) = 4
process: 因为点P(4,y_{0})在抛物线C:x^{2}=2py(p>0)上,所以y_{0}=\frac{8}{p}由抛物线的定义知,|FP|=y_{0}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{8}{p}+\frac{p}{2}=4,解得p=4.

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$C$的中心在坐标原点，长轴在$y$轴上，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，且$C$上一点$C$到的两个焦点的距离之和是$12$，则椭圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;C1: Point;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;OverlappingLine(MajorAxis(C), yAxis);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/2;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(C1,C);Distance(C1, F1) + Distance(C1, F2) = 12
process: 设椭圆方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,由题意可得:\begin{cases}e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\\2a=12\\a^{2}=b^{2}+c2\end{cases}求解方程组可得:\begin{cases}a^{2}=36\\b^{2}=9\\c^{2}=27\end{cases}据此可知椭圆的方程是\frac{y^{2}}{36}+\frac{x^{2}}{0}=1

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$上的点到直线$x-2 y-12=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - 2*y - 12 = 0);D: Point;PointOnCurve(D, G) = True

text: 动点$P$到点$F(-1,0)$的距离比到它到$y$轴的距离大$1$，动点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: F: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-1, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, yAxis) + 1
process: 设P(x,y),根据题意得\sqrt{(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}}=|x|+1,两边平方化简,再去绝对值求解设P(x,y),根据题意得\sqrt{(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}}=|x|+1两边平方化简整理得y2=2|x|-2x当x>0时,y2=0,当x\leqslant0时,y^{2}=-4x综上:y^{2}=\begin{cases}0,x>0\\-4x,x\leqslant0\end{cases}

text: $P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{15}=1$上任意点，$E F$为圆$N$:$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=4$的任意一条直径，则$\overrightarrow{P E} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F}$最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;N: Circle;E: Point;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/15 = 1);Expression(N) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(E,F),N)
process: 圆N:(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=4的圆心为N(1,0),半径长为2,设点P(x,y),则y^{2}=15-\frac{15}{16}x2且-4\leqslantx\leqslant4,\overrightarrow{PE}=\overrightarrow{PN}+\overrightarrow{NE},\overrightarrow{PF}=\overrightarrow{PN}+\overrightarrow{NF}=\overrightarrow{PN}-\overrightarrow{NE},所以,\overrightarrow{PE}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}=(\overrightarrow{PN}+\overrightarrow{NE})\cdot(\overrightarrow{PN}-\overrightarrow{NE})=\overrightarrow{PN}-\overrightarrow{NE}^{2}=(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}-4=x^{2}-2x+1+15-\frac{15}{16}x^{2}-4=\frac{1}{16}x^{2}-2x+12=\frac{1}{16}(x-16)^{2}-4,所以,当x=-4时,\overrightarrow{PE}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF}取得最大值,即(\overrightarrow{PE}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF})_{\max}=\frac{1}{16}\times(-4)^{2}+8+12=21

text: 已知直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，且线段$A B$的中点为$(-1,1)$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/6 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)))=(-1,1)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的右焦点为$F$,右准线为$l$,点$A\in l$,线段$AF$交$C$于点$B$,若$\overrightarrow{FA}=3 \overrightarrow{FB}$,则$|\overrightarrow{AF}|$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;F: Point;C: Ellipse;B: Point;l: Line;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;RightDirectrix(C) = l;In(A, l) = True;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A, F), C) = B;VectorOf(F, A) = 3*VectorOf(F, B)

text: $O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 x$的焦点，$P(x_{0} , y_{0})$为$C$上一点，若$|P F|=\frac{3}{2} x_{0}$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;F: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = (3/2)*x0
process: 由已知抛物线C:y^{2}=2x,可得其焦点为F(\frac{1}{2},0)又P(x_{0},y_{0})为C上一点,若|PF|=\frac{3}{2}x_{0},可得:\frac{1}{2}+x_{0}=\frac{3}{2}x_{0}'解得x_{0}=1,所以P(1,\pm\sqrt{2})则\trianglePOF的面积为:\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{1}{2}\times\sqrt{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$共焦点，且过点$(2 , 1)$的圆锥曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: ConicSection;P:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);PointOnCurve(P,H)
process: 由题曲线的焦点为F(\pm\sqrt{6},0)若曲线为椭圆,由题意设所求的椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(a>b>0)\because椭圆过点(2,1),\therefore\begin{cases}a2-b^{2}=(\pm\sqrt{6})^{2}\\\frac{4}{a^{2}}+\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},解得a^{2}=8,b^{2}=2,\therefore所求椭圆为\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1.若曲线为双曲线,设所求的双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(a>0,b>0)\because双曲线过点(2,1).\begin{cases}a^{2}+b^{2}=(\pm\sqrt{6})\\\frac{4}{a^{2}}-\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases}解得a^{2}=3,b^{2}=3,\therefore所求双曲线为\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，过焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$ , $B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{A F}=\overrightarrow{F B}$，若点$A$ , $B$在$l$上的投影分别为$M$、$N$，则$\Delta M F N$的内切圆半径为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;M: Point;F: Point;N: Point;A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(F,H);Intersection(H,G) = {A,B};VectorOf(A, F) = VectorOf(F, B);Projection(A,l)=M;Projection(B,l)=N
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点为F(1,0),因为\overrightarrow{AF}=\overrightarrow{FB},所以直线l垂直于x轴,所以A(1,2),B(1,-2),所以M(-1,2),N(-1,-2),\overrightarrow{FM}=(-2,2),\overrightarrow{FN}=(-2,-2),因为\overrightarrow{FM}\cdot\overrightarrow{FN}=0,所以\triangleMFN为直角三角形,且|\overrightarrow{FM}|=|\overrightarrow{FN}|=2\sqrt{2},设其内切圆半径为r,则有\frac{1}{2}\times2\sqrt{2}\times2\sqrt{2}=\frac{1}{2}(2\sqrt{2}+2\sqrt{2}+4)r,解得r=\frac{2}{\sqrt{2}+1}=2(\sqrt{2}-1)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = 1)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$，过点$P(0,-1)$作抛物线的切线$P A$, $P B$, $A$, $B$为切点，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*y);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (0, -1);TangentOfPoint(P, C) = {LineOf(P, A), LineOf(P, B)};TangentPoint(LineOf(P, A), C) = A;TangentPoint(LineOf(P, B), C) = B;A: Point;B: Point
process: \because切线过点P(0,-1),且交抛物线C:x^{2}=4y于A,B两点\therefore切线斜率存在,设切线斜率为k,则过P(0,-1)的切线方程为y=kx-1,联立\begin{cases}y=kx-1\\x^{2}=4y\end{cases},则x^{2}-4kx+4=0,令d=16k^{2}-16=0,\thereforek=\pm1\therefore切线PA,PB的方程分别为:y=x-1和y=-x-1,联立\begin{cases}y=x-\\x^{2}=4y\end{cases}1则x^{2}-4x+4=0,\thereforex=2,\thereforeA(2,1),同理可知B(-2,1)\becauseP(0,-1),\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}=(2,2),\overrightarrow{PB}=(-2,2),\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=-4+4=0xx.

text: 到点$(-2,1)$和$(2 , 1)$的距离之和为$4$的点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, 1);P: Point;Distance(P, A) + Distance(P, B) =4
process: 记点A(-2,1)、B(2,1),设所求点为P,由|PA|+|PB|=|AB|,则点P的轨迹为线段AB,即所求动点的轨迹方程为y=1(-2\leqslantx\leqslant2)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=8$ ,$|A F|<|B F|$，则$|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) < Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-y^{2}=1$的离心率$e$=?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2 = 1);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 经过点$(2 ,-3)$且与椭圆$9 x^{2}+2 y^{2}=36$有共同焦点的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;C: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 + 2*y^2 = 36);Coordinate(H) = (2, -3);PointOnCurve(H, C);Focus(G) = Focus(C)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的焦距等于$6$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/6 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;FocalLength(G) = 6
process: 由双曲线的方程知m+6=(\frac{6}{2})^{2}=9,所以m=3,故填3.

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 100)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，其渐近线与圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2$相交，且渐近线被圆截得的两条弦长都为$2$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 2);IsIntersect(Asymptote(C), G);L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {L1, L2};Length(InterceptChord(L1, G)) = 2;Length(InterceptChord(L2, G)) = 2
process: 双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的一条渐近线为bx+ay=0,与圆(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2相交,弦长为2即圆心(2,0)到渐近线Sbx+ay=0的距离为1\therefore\frac{|2b|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=1,得3b^{2}=a^{2}在双曲线中b^{2}=c^{2}-a^{2},\therefore3c^{2}-3a^{2}=a^{2},即3c^{2}=4a^{2}\thereforee=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{4}{3}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)
process: 试题分析:根据题中所给的椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1,可知a^{2}=6,b^{2}=2,所以c=2,从而确定出椭圆的右焦点为(2,0),因为抛物线y^{2}=2px的焦点为(\frac{p}{2},0),所以\frac{p}{2}=2,即p=4.

text: 点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右支上，其左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$P F_{1}$与以坐标原点$O$为圆心，$a$为半径的圆相切于点$A$，线段$P F_{1}$的垂直平分线恰好过点$F_{2}$，$\frac{S_{\Delta O F_{1} A}}{S_{\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G)) = True;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;H: Circle;Center(H) = O;O: Origin;Radius(H) = a;TangentPoint(LineOf(P,F1),H) = A;A: Point;PointOnCurve(F2,PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))) = True;IsTangent(LineOf(P,F1),H) = True
process: 因为|OA|=a,所以|BF_{2}|=2a.又|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,所以|BF_{1}|=2b,|PF_{1}|=4b.又|AF_{1}|=b,所以\frac{S_{\DeltaOFA}}{S_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}}=\frac{0.5bc\cdot\sinF_{1}}{0.5\times4b\times2c\sinF_{1}}=\frac{1}{8}

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的顶点是抛物线上到点$A  (0 , a)$的距离最近的点，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);A:Point;Coordinate(A)=(0,a);WhenMin(Distance(Vertex(G),A))
process: 设点P(x,y)为抛物线上的任意一点,则点P离点A(0,a)的距离的平方为|AP|^{2}=x^{2}+(y-a)^{2}=x^{2}+y^{2}-2ay+a^{2}\becausex^{2}=4y\therefore|AP|^{2}=4y+y^{2}-2ay+a^{2}(y\geqslant0)=y^{2}+2(2-a)y+a^{2}(y\geqslant0)\therefore对称轴为y=a-2,\because离点A(0,a)最近的点恰好是顶点\thereforea-2\leqslant0解得a\leqslant2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$, 其一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，点$P(\sqrt{3}, y_{0})$在该双曲线上,则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);y0:Number;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), y0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知动点$M(x, y)$的坐标满足$\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}}=|x+2|$，则动点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: x_: Number;y_: Number;M: Point;Coordinate(M)=(x_, y_);sqrt((x_-2)^2 + y_^2) = Abs(x_+2)
process: 设F(2,0)直线l:x=-2,则动点M到点F的距离为\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}},动点M到直线l:x=-2,的距离为|x+2|,又因为\sqrt{(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}}=|x+2|,所以动点M的轨迹是以F(2,0)为焦点,x=-2为准线的抛物线,其轨迹方程为y^{2}=8x

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F(1,0)$，点$A$是抛物线的准线与坐标轴的交点，点$M$在抛物线上，当$\frac{|M F|}{|M A|}$最小时，$|M A|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;F: Point;M: Point;A: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C),axis)=A;PointOnCurve(M, C);WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,A)))

text: $\odot O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=16$ , $A(-2,0)$, $B(2,0)$为两个定点，$l$是$\odot O$的一条切线，若过$A$、$B$两点的抛物线以直线$l$为准线，则该抛物线的焦点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: O: Circle;Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 16);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);IsTangent(l, O) = True;l: Line;PointOnCurve(A, G) = True;PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;G: Parabola;Directrix(G) = l
process: 根据题意画出图像,任意画出一条切线,做AB垂直于切线于CD两点,设抛物线的焦点为F点,根据抛物线的定义得到FA=AE,FB=BC,FA+FB=AE+BC,因为O为AB的中点,做OG垂直于切线于点G,OG为梯形ABCE的中位线,故得到BF+AF=2OG=8,故根据椭圆的定义得到轨迹是以AB为焦点的椭圆长半轴为4,c=2,故得到轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1(y\neq0),由条件知焦点一定不能落在x轴上故需要去掉两点

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$A$与焦点$F$以及坐标原点$O$构成的三角形$O A F$的面积为$p$且$|A F|=4$. 则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, F)) = p;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4

text: 若直线$y=k x+1(k \in R)$与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{t}=1$恒有公共点，则$t$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;t: Number;H: Line;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/t = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);IsIntersect(G,H)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(4>b>0)$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，若$P$为椭圆$C$上一点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积等于?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 + y^2/b^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/2;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;P: Point;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);b:Number;4>b;b>0
process: 分析:根据椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1可得意a=4,由离心率\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},可得c值,因为\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ},结合椭圆的定义和勾股定理形成方程组可求得|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}的值,再求面积即可.详解:由题意a=4,e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},得a=4,b=2,c=2\sqrt{3}\becauseP为椭圆C上一点,且\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=8,|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}=4c^{2}=48,\therefore|PF|+|PF_{2}|^{2}-2|PF|.|PF_{2}|=48,即64-2|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=48,得|PF_{1}|\cdot|PF_{2}|=8,故\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}|PF|.|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times8=4.

text: 已知线段$A B$的端点$B$的坐标为$(4,0)$，端点$A$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$上运动，则线段$A B$的中点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;B: Point;A: Point;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))={A,B};Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(B)=(4,0);PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 设$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$为双曲线$4 x^{2}-2 y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - 2*y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)
process: 由题得a^{2}=\frac{1}{4},b^{2}=\frac{1}{2},\thereforec^{2}=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{4},\thereforec=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}由题得\begin{cases}3=|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}|-2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|\times\frac{1}{2}\\|PF|-|PF|=1\end{cases}{|PF_{2}|所以s=\frac{1}{2}.|PF_{1}|PF_{2}|\cdot\sin\frac{\pi}{3}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\cdot\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=1$没有公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y - 2)^2 = 1);NumIntersection(Asymptote(G), H) = 0

text: 已知中心在原点的双曲线$C$的右焦点为$F(3,0)$，离心率等于$\frac{3}{2}$，则$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Center(C)=O;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);RightFocus(C) = F;Eccentricity(C)=3/2

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点作一条渐近线的垂线，垂足恰好落在曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, OneOf(Asymptote(G)));H: Curve;Expression(H) = (x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(FootPoint(Z, OneOf(Asymptote(G))), H)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$是椭圆上异于长轴端点的任意一点，若$M$是线段$P F_{1}$上一点，且满足$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}=2 \overrightarrow{P M}$, $\overrightarrow{M F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{O P}=0$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Negation(P=Endpoint(MajorAxis(C)));M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, LineSegmentOf(P, F1));O: Origin;VectorOf(M, F1) = 2*VectorOf(P, M);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F2), VectorOf(O, P)) = 0
process: 试题分析:由题意得,设P(x,y),取MF_{1}的中点N,由\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}=2\overrightarrow{PM},则\overrightarrow{NF_{1}}=\frac{1}{2}\overrightarrow{PN},解得点N(\frac{x-c}{3},\frac{y}{3}),又\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}\cdot\overrightarrow{OP}=0,所以\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}\bot\overrightarrow{OP},由三角形的中位线可知\overrightarrow{ON}\bot\overrightarrow{OP},即(x,y)\cdot(\frac{x-c}{3},\frac{y}{3})=0,整理得(x-c)^{2}+y^{2}=c^{2},所以点P的轨迹为以(c,0)为圆心,以c为半径的圆上,所以使得圆与椭圆有公共点,则a-c<c\Rightarrow\frac{c}{a}>\frac{1}{2},所以椭圆的离心率为e\in(\frac{1}{2},1)

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ ,过$F$的直线$m$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，$A F$的垂直平分线分别交$l$和$x$轴于$P$、$Q$两点若$\angle A F P=\angle A F Q$ ,则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: m: Line;E: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;B: Point;l: Line;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(E) = F;Directrix(E) = l;PointOnCurve(F, m);Intersection(m, E) = {A, B};Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,F)),l)=P;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,F)),xAxis)=Q;AngleOf(A,F,P)=AngleOf(A,F,Q)
process: 由条件可得\triangleAPF为等边三角形,然后可得直线AB的倾斜角,然后利用弦长公式求解即可.设AF的中点为M,因为\angleAFP=\angleAFQ,AF的垂直平分线分别交1和x轴于P,Q两点所以\trianglePMF\cong\triangleQMF,所以PA=PF=FQ,M是PQ的中点,所以四边形APFO是菱形,所以AP//FO,所以由抛物线的定义可得PA=AF,所以\triangleAPF为等边三角形所以\anglePAF=\angleAFQ=60^{\circ},所以直线AB的方程为y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),由\begin{cases}y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)\\\end{cases}可得3x^{2}-10x+3=0所以x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{10}{3},x_{1}x_{2}=1,所以|AB|=\sqrt{(1+3)(\frac{100}{0}-4)}=\frac{16}{2}数答客为:16

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$，圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$，过椭圆上任一与顶点不重合的点$P$引圆$O$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，直线$A B$与$x$轴、$y$轴分别交于点$M$、$N$，则$\frac{a^{2}}{|O N|^{2}}+\frac{b^{2}}{|O M|^{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;O: Circle;B: Point;A: Point;N: Point;M: Point;P:Point;a > b;b > 0;L1:Line;L2:Line;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(O)=(x^2+y^2=b^2);PointOnCurve(P,G);Negation(P=Vertex(G));TangentOfPoint(P,O)={L1,L2};TangentPoint(L1,O)=A;TangentPoint(L2,O)=B;Intersection(LineOf(A,B), xAxis) = M;Intersection(LineOf(A,B), yAxis) = N

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，$M$是$C$上一点，$F M$的延长线交$y$轴于点$N$，若$M$为线段$F N$的中点，且$|F N|=6$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);N: Point;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(F, M)), yAxis) = N;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F, N)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N)) = 6

text: 已知抛物线$C$以坐标原点$O$为顶点，以$(\frac{p}{2}, 0)$为焦点，直线$x-m y-2 p=0$与抛物线$C$交于两点$A$ , $B$ ,直线$A B$上的点$M(1,1)$满足$O M \perp A B$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(C) = O;Coordinate(Focus(C)) = (p/2,0);p: Number;G: Line;Expression(G) = (-2*p - m*y + x = 0);m: Number;Intersection(C,G) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(M,LineOf(A,B)) = True;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);M: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O,M),LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = True
process: 由题意可知,当y=0时,x=2p.即直线x-my-2p=0恒过定点(2p,0)所以k_{AB}=\frac{1-0}{1-2p}=\frac{1}{1-2p},且k_{OM}=\frac{1-0}{1-0}=1因为OM\botAB,所以k_{AB}\cdotk_{OM}=-1即\frac{1}{1-2p}\times1=-1,解得p=1所以抛物线C的方程为:y2=2x

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的顶点为焦点，焦点为顶点的双曲线方程的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Vertex(H)=Focus(G);Focus(H)=Vertex(G)
process: 分析:由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1的焦点为F(\pm3,0),顶点为A(\pm5,0),可得双曲线的焦点与顶点,从而可得双曲线方程.详解:\because椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1的焦点为F(\pm3,0),顶点为A(\pm5,0)双曲线的顶点与焦点分别为F(\pm3,0),A(\pm5,0)可得c=5,a=3\Rightarrowb=4,所以双曲线方程是\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1,

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}+ky^{2}=1$的离心率是$2$，则实数$k$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (k*y^2 + x^2=1);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知点$P(m, 4)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆的半径为$\frac{3}{2}$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;m: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (m, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = 3/2
process: 试题分析:因为APF_{1}F_{2}的内切圆的半[径为\frac{3}{2},\int)\cap以AFF_{1}不积S=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|r,即S=(a+c)r=\frac{3}{2}(a+c),又因为APF_{1}F_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}\times|F_{1}F_{2}|\times4=4c,所以\frac{3}{2}(a+c)=4c,即e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{3}{5},故应填\frac{3}{5}

fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Coordinate(P) = (1, 3/2);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 4
process: 由椭圆的定义和点在椭圆上,可建立方程组,解之可得椭圆自由|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=4得2a=4,解得a=2,又P(1,\frac{3}{2})在椭圆C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)上,所以椭圆\frac{1}{2}+\frac{(\frac{3}{2})^{2}}{b^{2}}=1'解得b=\sqrt{3}所以椭圆C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1.

text: 已知直线$l$过点$(1,0)$且垂直于$x$轴，若$l$被抛物线$y^{2}=4 a x$截得的线段长为$4$，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;a: Number;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*(a*x));Coordinate(P) = (1, 0);PointOnCurve(P,l);IsPerpendicular(l, xAxis);Length(InterceptChord(l,G))=4
process: 分析:根据题干描述画出相应图形,分析可得抛物线经过点(1,2),将点(1,2)坐标代入可求参数a的值,进而可求焦点坐标.详细:由题意可得,点P(1,2)在抛物线上,将P(1,2)代入y^{2}=4ax中解得:a=1,\thereforey^{2}=4x,由抛物线方程可得:2p=4,p=2,\frac{p}{2}=1,\therefore焦点坐标为(1,0).

text: 已知点$P$在渐近线方程为$4 x \pm 3 y=0$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上，其中$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为其左、右焦点，若$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$16$且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$a+b$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(4*x+pm*3*y=0);PointOnCurve(P,G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 16;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0
process: 试题分析:由双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为4x\pm3y=0知,\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3}\textcircled{1};由\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0知\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}\bot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}},APF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形,所以PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}=(2c)^{2},由双曲线的定义得PF//PF_{2}=2a,|PF|-|PF_{2}|^{2}=(2a)^{2},|PF|^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}-2|PF|\cdot|PF_{2}|=4a^{2},|PF|\cdot|PF_{2}|=2(c^{2}-a),所以\frac{1}{2}\cdotPF|\cdot|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2(c^{2}-a^{2})=16,c^{2}-a^{2}=16,而a^{2}+b^{2}=c^{2},所以b=4,结合\textcircled{1}得a=3,a+b=7

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4 a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3 a^{2}}=1  (a>0)$的左焦点为$F$，直线$x=m$与椭圆相交于点$A$、$B$，当$\triangle F A B$的周长最大时，$\triangle F A B$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/((4*a^2)) + y^2/((3*a^2)) = 1);a: Number;a>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;H: Line;Expression(H) = (x = m);m: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F,A,B))) = True
process: 解:设椭圆的右焦点为E,连接AE,BE,如图:由椭圆的定义可知,AFAB的周长为|AB|+|AF|+|BF|=|AB|+4a-|AE|+4a-|BE|=8a+|AB|-|AE|-|BE|\because|AE|+|BE|\geqslant|AB|.\therefore|AB|-|AE|-|BE|\leqslant0,当且仅当AB过点E时取等号\therefore|AB|+|AF|+|BF|\leqslant8a,即直线x=m经过椭圆的右焦点E时AFAB的周长最大此时m=a,把x=a代入\frac{x^{2}}{4a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3a^{2}}=1得y=\pm\frac{3}{2}a,则|AB|=3a又|EF|=2a,\thereforeAFAB的面积S_{AFAB}=\frac{1}{2}|AB|\cdot|EF|=3a^{2}

text: 若斜率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$的直线$l$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$有两个不同的交点，且这两个交点在$x$轴上的射影恰好是椭圆的两个焦点，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Slope(l) = sqrt(2)/2;l: Line;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Focus(G) = {Projection(A, xAxis), Projection(B, xAxis)}
process: 由题意易知两交点的横坐标为-c、c,纵坐标分别为-\frac{b}{a}、\frac{b^{2}}{a},所以由\frac{b}{c-(\frac{b}{a})}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}得2b^{2}=\sqrt{2}ac=2(a^{2}-c^{2}),即2e^{2}+\sqrt{2}c-2=0,解得c=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}或c=-\sqrt{2}(负根舍去).

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$共渐近线且经过点$M(2 \sqrt{6}, 6)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Hyperbola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (2*sqrt(6), 6);PointOnCurve(M,H);Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(H)
process: 设双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=t(t\neq0)又经过点M(2\sqrt{6},6)\therefore\frac{24}{4}-\frac{36}{9}=t,即t=2故所求双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{8}-\frac{y^{2}}{18}=1

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P(3 , y)$，则点$P$到抛物线焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (3, y1);PointOnCurve(P,G);y1:Number
process: 解:\because抛物线y^{2}=4x,与抛物线的标准方程y^{2}=2px比较,得到p=2.\therefore抛物线的准线方程为x=-1由抛物线的定义知,点P到抛物线焦点的距离等于E到抛物线的准线的距离由于P的横坐标为3,P到抛物线的准线的距离为3+1=4.\thereforeP到抛物线的焦点的距离为4

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上任意一点$P$，作与实轴平行的直线，交两渐近线$M$,$N$两点，若$\overrightarrow{P M} \cdot \overrightarrow{P N}=2 b^{2}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1$与直线$x+y-1=0$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$\overrightarrow {O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$($O$为原点)，则$\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$E$:$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$点$P(2 , t)$, $F$为椭圆的左焦点，过点$P$作椭圆的切线$P A$ , $P B$，切点分别为$A$、$B$，则$\triangle A B F$面积的范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;P: Point;t:Number;Expression(E) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Coordinate(P)=(2,t);LeftFocus(E) = F;TangentOfPoint(P,E)={LineOf(P,A),LineOf(P,B)};TangentPoint(LineOf(P,B),E)=A;TangentPoint(LineOf(P,A),E)=B
process: 解:设点A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),所以切线PA的方程为\frac{x_{1}x}{2}+y_{1}y=1,切线PB的方程为\frac{x_{2}x}{2}+y_{2}y=1因为点P在切线PA和切线PB上,所以\begin{cases}x_{1}+ty_{1}=1\\x_{2}+ty,=1\end{cases},所以直线AB的方程为x+ty=1所以直线AB过定点(1,0),且定点是椭圆E的右焦点F_{2}(x+ty=1且\begin{cases}x+ty=1\\\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1\end{cases},消去x得:(t^{2}+2)y^{2}-2ty-1=0,+y_{2}=\frac{2t}{t^{2}+2}'.|x|-1\begin{matrix}t-+2&t\\=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times\sqrt{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}}=\sqrt{(\frac{2t}{t^{2}+2})^{^{2}}-4\times\frac{-1}{t^{2}+2}}&=\frac{2\sqrt{2}\sqrt{t^{2}+1}}{t^{2}+2}\end{matrix}令\sqrt{t^{2}+1}=m\geqslant1,则t^{2}=m^{2}-1,m+\frac{1}{m}\geqslant2^{,}则0<\frac{1}{m+\frac{1}{1}}\leqslant\frac{1}{2}则S_{\DeltaABF}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}\sqrt{t^{2}+1}}{t^{2}+2}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}m}{m^{2}+1}=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{m+\frac{1}{m}}\in(0,\sqrt{2}]

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的焦点到其渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1)
process: 由题得:其焦点坐标为(-\sqrt{2},0),(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},0).渐近线方程为y=\pmx所以焦点到其渐近线的距离d=\frac{|\pm\sqrt{2}|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(\pm1)^{2}}}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a , b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 过点$F_{1}$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$的直线$l$与双曲线的左、右支分别交于点$A$、$B$. 且$|A F_{2}|=|B F_{2}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Inclination(l) = pi/6;A: Point;Intersection(l, LeftPart(G)) = A;B: Point;Intersection(l, RightPart(G)) = B;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2))
process: 过F_{2}作F_{2}N\botAB于点N,设|AF_{2}|=|BF_{2}|=m,因为直线l的倾斜角为\frac{\pi}{6}所以在直角三角形F_{1}F_{2}N中,|NF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|=c,|NF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c由双曲线的定义可得|BF_{1}|-|BF_{2}|=2a,所以|BF_{1}|=2a+m,同理可得|AF_{1}|=m-2a,所以|AB|=|BF_{1}|-|AF_{1}|=4a,即|AN=2a,所以|AF_{1}|=\sqrt{3}c-2a,因此m=\sqrt{3}c,在直角三角形ANF_{2}中,AF_{2}=|NF_{2}|^{2}+|AN^{2},所以(\sqrt{3}c)^{2}=4a^{2}+c^{2},所以c=\sqrt{2}a,则e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}故答家为:,下

text: 已知两定点$A(-2,0)$ , $B(2,0)$，点$P$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$上，且满足$|P A|-|P B|=2$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 2
process: 解:设P(x,y),由A(-2,0)、B(2,0),|PA|-|PB|=2,可得点P的轨迹是以点A、B为焦点的双曲线的右支,且2a=2,c=2,\thereforeb=\sqrt{3},\thereforeP的轨迹方程为:x-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(x\geqslant1),联立椭圆与双曲线的方程可得:\begin{cases}\frac{x2}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1\\x2\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\end{cases},可得x^{2}=4,y^{2}=9,\therefore\overrightarrow{PA}\cdot\overrightarrow{PB}=(x+2)(x-2)+y^{2}=x^{2}-4+y^{2}=故答案:9.有围)本题考查用定义法求双曲线的标准方程,求双曲线的交点的坐标,以及两个向量的数量积公式的应用,是中档题

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，右顶点到直线$x-y+2 \sqrt{2}=0$的距离为$3$，则椭圆$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G:Line;a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x - y + 2*sqrt(2) = 0);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(2)/2;Distance(RightVertex(C),G)=3
process: 因为椭圆的离心率为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2},故\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}.又右顶点的坐标为(a,0),故有\frac{|a-0+2\sqrt{2}|}{\sqrt{1+1}}=3,故a=\sqrt{2},所以b=1,椭圆的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y2=1.

text: 在平面直角坐标系$x O y$中，双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$的右顶点到双曲线的一条渐近线的距离为$\frac{4 \sqrt{5}}{3}$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;a > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/16 = 1);Distance(RightVertex(C), OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = 4*sqrt(5)/3
process: 由双曲线方程知,右顶点为(a,0),渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{4}{a}x,即\pm4x-ay=0\therefore右顶点到双曲线渐近线距离d=\frac{|\pm4a|}{\sqrt{16+a^{2}}}\frac{4\sqrt{5}}{3},解得:a^{2}=20\therefore双曲线C的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{20}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1本题正确结果:\frac{x^{2}}{20}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 与点$F(0,-3)$和直线$y-3=0$的距离相等的点的轨迹方程是?

process: 解:由抛物线的定义可得平面内与点F(0,-3)和直线y-3=0的距离目等的点的轨迹为抛物线.且F(0,-3)为焦点,直线y=3为准线,设抛物线的方程为x^{2}=-2py(p>0),可知\frac{p}{2}=3,解得p=6,所以该抛物线方程是x^{2}=-12y

text: 若抛物线$y=m x^{2}$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的上焦点重合，则$m$=?

process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1中a=\sqrt{6},b=\sqrt{2},c=\sqrt{6-2}=2,即焦点为(0,\pm2)抛物线y=mx^{2}的标准方程是x^{2}=\frac{1}{m}y^{,}2p=\frac{1}{m},p=\frac{1}{2m},由抛物线的焦点就是椭圆的焦点\frac{p}{2}=\frac{1}{4m}=2,m=\frac{1}{8}

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=3 x$的焦点，过$F$作直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle A O B$面积的最小值为?

fact_expressions: M:Circle;C1:Circle;Expression(C1) = ((x+1)^2 + y^2 = 36);IsInTangent(M,C1);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = ((x-1)^2 + y^2 = 4);IsOutTangent(M,C2);Center(M) = M1;M1: Point
process: 设动圆的圆心M的坐标为(x,y),半径为r,根据题意得到|MC_{1}|=6-r,|MC_{2}|=r+2,进而得到|MC_{1}|+|MC_{2}|=8>|C_{1}C_{2}|=2,结合椭圆的定义,即可求解.设动圆的圆心M的坐标为(x,y),半径为r.因为动圆M与圆C_{1}:(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=36内切,且与圆C_{2}:(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=4外切可得|MC_{1}|=6-r,|MC_{2}|=r+2,所以|MC_{1}|+|MC_{2}|=8>|C_{1}C_{2}|=2,根据椭圆的定义知,动点M的轨迹是以C_{1},C_{2}为焦点的椭圆,且2a=8,2c=2.可得a=4,c=1,则b=\sqrt{a^{2}-c^{2}}=\sqrt{15}所以动点M的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{15}=1

process: 求得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{4},再利用公式_{e}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}可求得双曲线的离心率由于焦点在x轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{3}{4}x,则\frac{b}{a}=\frac{3}{4},因此,该双曲线的离心率为\frac{5}{4}.

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=6$，则线段$A B$中点的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x,\thereforep=2,设经过点F的直线与抛物线相交于A、B两点,其横坐标分别为x_{1},x_{2}利用抛物线定义,AB中点横坐标为x_{0}=\frac{1}{2}(x_{1}+x_{2})=\frac{1}{2}(|AB|-p)=2.

text: 设$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点. 若在$C$上存在一点$P$. 使$PF_{1} \perp PF_{2}$且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线的两个焦点为$F_{1}(-\sqrt{10}, 0)$ , $F_{2}(\sqrt{10}, 0)$，渐近线为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-sqrt(10), 0);Coordinate(F2) = (sqrt(10), 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/3))
process: 由双曲线的焦点坐标知,c=\sqrt{10}又渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{1}{3}x,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{1}{3},又c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},解得b^{2}=1,a^{2}=9所以双曲线的标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-y^{2}=1,故填\frac{x^{2}}{9}-y^{2}=1.睛】本题主要考查了双曲线的标准方程,双曲线的简单几何性质,属于中档题

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点$F$，点$P$是渐近线上的点，且$|O P|=2$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = 2

text: 已知点$A(1,1)$，且$F$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点，$P$是椭圆上任意一点，则$|P F|+|P A|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1可知a=2,c=\sqrt{a^{2-b^{2}}}=1,设椭圆的右焦点为F_{1}(1,0),则|AF_{1}|=1,如图,所以|PF|+|PA|=2a-|PF_{1}|+|PA|=4+|PA|-|PF_{1}|\geqslant4-|AF_{1}|=4-1=3即当P在F_{1}A的延长线上时,取得最小值.

text: 点$A$是椭圆$C_{1}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$与双曲线$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的一个交点，且点$A$与椭圆$C_{1}$两焦点距离之和为$m$，距离之差的绝对值为$n$，则$m+n$的值为?
fact_expressions: C2: Hyperbola;C1: Ellipse;A: Point;Expression(C1) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);OneOf(Intersection(C1, C2)) = A;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};Distance(A, F1) + Distance(A, F2) = m ;m: Number;n: Number;Abs(Distance(A, F1) - Distance(A, F2)) = n
process: 椭圆C_{1}:\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的焦点为F_{1}(\sqrt{5},0),F_{2}(\sqrt{5},0)双曲线C_{2}:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1的焦点为(\sqrt{5},0),(\sqrt{5},0),所以椭圆与双曲线的焦点相同,点A是椭圆C_{1}:\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1与双曲线C_{2}:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1的一个交点\thereforem=6,n=4,m+n=10.

text: 已知直线$l$: $y=k(x+4)$与圆$(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=4$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$M$是线段$A B$的中点，则$M$到直线$3 x+4 y-6=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = k*(x + 4));k:Number;G: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x + 2)^2 = 4);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x + 4*y - 6 = 0)
process: 由于直线l恒过点(-4,0)且点在圆上,设A(-4,0),M(x,y),B(x_{1},y_{1}),轨迹法即可求得M的轨迹方程为(x+3)^{2}+y^{2}=1.利用点到直线的距离即可求解.羊解】圆(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=4的圆心C(-2,0),半径r=2圆心C(\cdot2,0)到直线y=k(x+4)的距离d=\frac{|-2k+4k|}{\sqrt{k^{2}+1}}=\frac{|2k|}{\sqrt{k^{2}+1}}<2,直线l:y=k(x+4)过定点A(\cdot4,0),设M(x,y),B(x_{1},y_{1}),则\begin{cases}x_{1}=2x+4\\y_{1}=2y\end{cases},代入(x+2)^{2}+y^{2}=4,可得(x+3)^{2}+y^{2}=1.\thereforeM的轨迹是以(-3,0)为圆心,以1为半径的圆,不含(-4,0)则M到直线3x+4y-6=0的距离的最小值为\frac{|-3\times3-6|}{5}-1=2.本题考查直线和圆的位置关系,考查轨迹法求曲线方程,考查数形结合的能力,属于中档题

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F(c, 0)$,过$F(c, 0)$向一条渐近线作垂线，垂足为$A$、$O$为坐标原点，当$\Delta O A F$的面积为$\frac{c^{2}}{4}$时，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G:Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;c:Number;L:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G)=F;Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);PointOnCurve(F,L);IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),L);FootPoint(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),L)=A;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, F)) = c^2/4
process: 由题意取双曲线的一条渐近线l:bx-ay=0,利用点到线的距离公式求出|FA|,由勾股定理可得|OA|,根据面积公式得到a、c的关系式,计算可得解:由题意取双曲线的一条渐近线l:bx-ay=0,则|FA|=\frac{bc}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b,由勾股定理得|OA|=\sqrt{OF^{2}-AF^{2}}=\sqrt{c^{2}-b^{2}}=a,S_{AOAF}=\frac{1}{2}ab=\frac{1}{4}c^{2},解得2ab=c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},即a=b.c=\sqrt{2}a,则离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点且垂直于$x$轴的直线与双曲线相交于$M$、$N$两 点，以$MN$为直径的圆恰好过双曲线的左顶点，则双曲线的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;L: Line;M: Point;N: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(RightFocus(G), L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);Intersection(L,G) = {N, M};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(M,N),H);PointOnCurve(LeftVertex(G),H)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且$F_{1} P \perp P F_{2}$，则$\Delta F_{1}PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F1, P), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 试题分析:由已知得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=4,|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{3},由勾股定理得|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=2,由此能求出\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积.解:\becauseF_{1},F_{2}是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1的两个焦点,点P在椭圆上,且F_{1}P\botPF_{2}\therefore|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=4,|F_{1}F_{2}|=2\sqrt{3},\therefore|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}+2|PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=16,\therefore|F_{1}F_{2}|^{2}+2|PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=16,\therefore12+2|PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=16,.2|PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=4,\therefore|PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=2\therefore\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积S=\frac{1}{2}PF_{1}|\times|PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times2=1.

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点为$F$ , $A(-2,1)$ , $P$为抛物线$C$上的动点，则$|P F|+|P A|$的最小值为?

text: 若直线$a x+y+b-1=0(a>0 , b>0)$过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$，则$\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);a>0;b>0;Expression(H) = (b + a*x + y - 1 = 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H)
process: 由抛物线y^{2}=4x,可得焦点F(1,0),代入直线方程ax+y+b-1=0可得:a+b=又a>0,b>0\therefore\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=(a+b)(\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b})=2+\frac{b}{a}+\frac{a}{b}\geqslant2+2\sqrt{\frac{b}{a}\cdot\frac{a}{b}}=4当且仅当a=b=\frac{1}{2}时取等号\therefore\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}的最小值为4

text: 以抛物线$C$的顶点为圆心的圆交$C$于$M$、$N$两点，交$C$的准线于$A$、$B$两点$|M N|=4 \sqrt{2}$ ,$|A B|=2 \sqrt{11}$，则$C$的焦点到准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Circle;M: Point;N: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Vertex(C)=Center(G);Intersection(G, C) = {M, N};Intersection(G, Directrix(C)) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = 4*sqrt(2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2*sqrt(11)
process: 解:设抛物线为y^{2}=2px,如图:|MN|=4\sqrt{2},|AB|=2\sqrt{11}\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{2})^{2}=\frac{4}{P},r=\sqrt{3}2\sqrt{2})^{2}=2px_{M}',F=\sqrt{(-\frac{p}{2})^{2}+(\sqrt{11})^{2}}=\frac{4}{p},\thereforeM(\frac{4}{P},2\sqrt{2})解得:p=2,即C的焦点到准线的距离为:2

text: 过点$(2,2)$的双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$F_{1} B$与$y$轴相交于$D$. 若$A D \perp F_{1} B$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;B: Point;A: Point;D: Point;F2: Point;L:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (2, 2);PointOnCurve(P,C);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(F2,L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);Intersection(L,C)={A,B};Intersection(LineSegmentOf(F1, B), yAxis) = D;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, D), LineSegmentOf(F1, B))
process: 根据垂直关系可得\overrightarrow{AD}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{1}B}=0,根据数量积的坐标运算可构造关于a,c的齐次方程求得离心率e.即可得到a,c关系;利用双曲线过点(2,2),c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}可构造方程组求得结果令x=c,代入双曲线方程得:A(c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),B(c,-\frac{b^{2}}{a}\becauseOD//AB,O为F_{1}F_{2}中点OD为AF_{1}BF_{2}中位线\therefore|OD|=\frac{1}{2}|BF_{2}|=\frac{b^{2}}{2a}\thereforeD(0,-\frac{b^{2}}{2a})\therefore\overrightarrow{AD}=(-c,-\frac{3b^{2}}{2a}),\overrightarrow{F_{1}B}=(2c,,-\frac{b^{2}}{a})\becauseAD\botFB\therefore\overrightarrow{AD}\cdot\overrightarrow{F_{1}B}=0,即-2c^{2}+\frac{3b^{4}}{2a2}=-2c^{2}+\frac{3(c^{2}-a^{2})^{2}}{2a^{2}}=0\therefore3c^{4}-10a^{2}c^{2}+3a^{4}=0\therefore3e4-10e^{2}+3=0,解得:e^{2}=3或e^{2}=\frac{1}{3}(舍)\thereforee=\sqrt{3},即c=\sqrt{3}a又\begin{cases}\frac{4}{a^{2}}-\frac{4}{b^{2}}=1\\a^{2}-a^{2}+k^{2}\end{cases}\thereforea^{2}=2,b^{2}=4\therefore双曲线C的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

text: 斜率为$-\frac{1}{3}$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点坐标为$(1 , 2)$，则椭圆$C$的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = (1, 2);Slope(l)=-1/3;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B}

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点$F$作其中一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$Q$，直线$F Q$与双曲线的左、右两支分别交于点$M$、$N$，若$|M Q|=3|Q N|$，$|F N|=4$，则双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;Q: Point;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;l:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);IsPerpendicular(l,OneOf(Asymptote(G)));FootPoint(l,OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=Q;Intersection(LineOf(F,Q), LeftPart(G)) = M;Intersection(LineOf(F,Q), RightPart(G)) = N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, Q)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, N));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N)) = 4

text: 已知圆$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=25$，过点$M(-2,3)$作直线$l$交圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，分别过$A$、$B$两点作圆的切线，当两条切线相交于点$N$时，则点$N$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = 25);M: Point;l: Line;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 3);PointOnCurve(M, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentOnPoint(A,C)=L1;TangentOnPoint(B,C)=L2;N: Point;Intersection(L1, L2) = N
process: 考虑如下问题:已知C:x^{2}+y^{2}=r^{2}(r>0)和点P(a,b).若点P在C内,过P作直线/交C于A.B两点,分别过AB两点作C的切线,当两条切线相交于点Q时,求点Q的轨迹方程.圆C:x^{2}+y^{2}=r^{2}的圆心C为(0,0),设A(x_{1}y_{1}),B(x_{2}y_{2}),Q(x_{0}y_{0}),因为AQ与圆C相切,所以AQ\botCA.所以(x_{1}-x_{0})(x_{1}-0)+(y_{1}-y_{0})(y_{1}-0)=0,即x^{2}_{1}-x_{0}x_{1}+y^{2}_{1}-y_{0}y_{1}=0,因为x^{2}+y^{2}=2,所以x_{0}x_{1}+y_{0}y_{1}=r^{2}同理x_{0}x_{2}+y_{0}y_{2}=r^{2}.所以过点A,B的直线方程为xx_{0}+yyv_{0}=r^{2}因直线AB过点(a,b).所以代入得ax_{0}+by_{0}=2所以点Q的轨迹方程为:ax+by=r^{2}.结合题意可知,点N的轨迹方程为2x-3v+25=0.

text: 若抛物线过点$(-1,3)$，则抛物线的标准方程为?

text: 已知点$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，过点$P$作圆$x^{2}+(y-3)^{2}=1$的切线，切点为$A$，则$P A$的最小值为?

process: 圆x^{2}+(y-3)^{2}=1的圆心C(0,3),半径r=1由切线的性质可得|PA|=\sqrt{|PC|^{2}-r^{2}}=\sqrt{|PC|^{2}}若要使|PA|最小,则|PC|取最小值,设P(\frac{y_{0}}{4},y_{0}),则|PC|=\sqrt{(\frac{y}{4}}_{+9}y_{0}-3)^{2}=\sqrt{\frac{y_{0}4}{16}+y_{0}^{2}}2-6y令f(x)=\frac{x4}{16}+x^{2}-6x+9,则f'(x)=\frac{x^{3}}{4}+2x-6易知f'(x)单调递增,且f'(2)=0,所以f(x)在(-\infty,2)上单调递减,在(2,+\infty)上单调递增.所以f(x)\geqslantf(2)=2,所以\frac{y_{0}4}{16}+y_{0}2-6y_{0}+9的最小值为2即|PC|的最小值为\sqrt{2},所以|PA|_{\min}=\sqrt{2-1}=1.

text: 已知点$A(1,0)$，直线$l$: $x=-1$，两个动圆均过点$A$且与$l$相切，其圆心分别为$C_{1}$、$C_{2}$，若动点$M$满足$2 \overrightarrow{C_{2} M}=\overrightarrow{C_{2} C_{1}}+\overrightarrow{C_{2} A}$，则$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 0);l: Line;Expression(l) = (x=-1);D: Circle;Z: Circle;PointOnCurve(A, D);PointOnCurve(A, Z);IsTangent(D, l);IsTangent(Z, l);C1: Point;C2: Point;Center(D) = C1;Center(Z) = C2;M: Point;2*VectorOf(C2, M) = VectorOf(C2, A) + VectorOf(C2, C1)
process: 由抛物线的定义得动圆的圆心轨迹方程y^{2}=4x,设C_{1}(a,b),C_{2}(m,n),M(x,y),根据2\overrightarrow{C_{2}M}=\overrightarrow{C_{2}C_{1}}+\overrightarrow{C_{2}A}可得a=2x-1,b=2y,利用b^{2}=4a可求得结果.由抛物线的定义得动圆的圆心轨迹是以A(1,0)为焦点,直线l:x=-1为准线的抛物线,其方程为y^{2}=4x,设C_{1}(a,b),C_{2}(m,n),M(x,y),因为动点M满足2\overrightarrow{C_{2}M}=\overrightarrow{C_{2}C_{1}}+\overrightarrow{C_{2}A}所以2(x-m,y-n)=(a-m,b-n)+(1-m,-n),即2x=a+1,2y=b所以a=2x-1,b=2y,因为b^{2}=4a,所以(2y)^{2}=4(2x-1)所以y^{2}=2x-1,即M的轨迹方程为y^{2}=2x-1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{10-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m-2}=1$，若其长轴在$y$轴上. 焦距为$4$，则$m$等于?

process: 由已知得a^{2}=4,即a=2,取椭圆另一焦点为F_{2},\triangleF_{1}AB的周长为L=|F_{1}A|+|F_{1}B|+|AB|=(2a-|F_{2}A|)+(2a-|F_{2}B|)+|AB|=4a+|AB|-(|F_{2}A|+|F_{2}B|)\leqslant4a+|AB|-|AB|=4a=8,当且仅当A,F_{2},B三点共线时取得等号

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm x$且一个焦点为$(4 \sqrt{2}, 0)$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(y=pm*x);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (4*sqrt(2), 0)
process: 解:因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pmx所以\frac{b}{a}=1,即a=b,因为双曲线的一个焦点为(4\sqrt{2},0)所以c=4\sqrt{2},即a^{2}+b^{2}=32解得a=b=4,

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$有相同的左、右焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两条曲线的一个交点，则$P F_{1} \cdot P F_{2}$的值是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;n: Number;m > n;n > 0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(H) = F1;RightFocus(H) = F2;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G)= F2;P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P
process: 不妨取P在双曲线的右支上,|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2\sqrt{m},|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,所以PF_{1}^{2}+PF_{2}^{2}+2PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=4m,PF_{1}^{2}-2PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}+PF_{2}^{2}=4a^{2},两式相减得:4PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=4m-4a^{2},\thereforePF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}=m-a^{2}故答案:m-a^{2}青】本题主要考查圆锥曲线的综合问题.解决本题的关键在于根据椭圆和双曲线有相同的焦点F_{1}.F_{2},利用定义化简

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F(-c, 0)$为圆心，$c$为半径的圆与椭圆的左准线交 于不同的两点，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 双曲线的渐近线经过点$(1,2)$，双曲线经过点$(2 \sqrt{2}, 4)$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 2);PointOnCurve(H, Asymptote(G));I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (2*sqrt(2), 4);PointOnCurve(I, G)
process: 由题意,设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),则其渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x'\begin{cases}2=\frac{b}{a}\\\frac{8}{a2}-\frac{16}{12}=1\end{cases},解得a=2,b=4,则c=2\sqrt{5},所以双曲线的离心率为e=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{2}=\sqrt{5}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，$A$，$B$分别为该椭圆的左顶点、上顶点，点$P$在线段$AB$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的取值范围是?

process: 由F_{1},F_{2}是椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1的两个焦点,A、B分别为该椭圆的左顶点、上顶点,可得F_{1}(-\sqrt{3},0),F_{2}(\sqrt{3},0),A(-2,0),B(0,1),设P(x,y),因为点P在线段AB上,所以,y=\frac{1}{2}x+1,-2\leqslantx\leqslant0\overrightarrow{PF}\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=(x+\sqrt{3},y)\cdot(x-\sqrt{3},y)=x^{2}+y2-3=\frac{5}{4}x^{2}+x-2=\frac{5}{4}(x+\frac{2}{5})^{2}-\frac{11}{5}\in[-\frac{11}{5},1],

text: 已知拋物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Parabola;b: Number;Expression(C)=(y^2 = 16*x);Expression(G) = (x^2/12 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Focus(C) = RightFocus(G)
process: 由题意可得,抛物线y^{2}=16x的焦点坐标为(4,0)则双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的右焦点坐标为(4,0),则\sqrt{12+b^{2}}=4,可得b=2.所以,双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,则该双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线$l$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$相切，则双曲线$C$的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;G: Parabola;l: Line;e: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Directrix(G) = l;IsTangent(l, C);Eccentricity(C) = e
process: 抛物线y^{2}=8x的准线l:x=-2,依题意可得,直线l:x=-2经过双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1的左顶点则a=2,所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{5}故_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，圆心在$C$上的圆过原点且与抛物线$C$的准线相切，若该圆截直线$x-\sqrt{2} y=0$所得弦长为$2 \sqrt{6}$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;G: Circle;PointOnCurve(Center(G), C);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, G);IsTangent(G, Directrix(C));H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - sqrt(2)*y = 0);Length(InterceptChord(H, G)) = 2*sqrt(6)
process: 由题,得圆心坐标P(\frac{p}{4},\frac{p}{\sqrt{2}}),所以P到x-\sqrt{2}y=0的距离d=\frac{|\frac{p}{4}-p|}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}p}{4},又由=2\sqrt{r2-d^{2}},列出方程解得p,即可得到本题答案.如图,设圆心为P,因为|PO|=|PE|=|PF|.所以P(\frac{p}{4},\frac{p}{\sqrt{2}}),且r=\frac{3p}{4}则P到x-\sqrt{2}y=0的距离d=\frac{|\frac{p}{4}}{又由l=2\sqrt{r-d^{2}},得2\sqrt{6}=2\sqrt{(\frac{3p}{4})^{2}}-(\frac{\sqrt{3}p}{4})^{2}\Rightarrowp=4所以抛物线的标准方程为y^{2}=8x.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线与直线$l$: $x-2 y+2020=0$垂直，则双曲线$C$的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: C:Hyperbola;l:Line;a,b:Number;e:Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(l)=(x-2*y+2020=0);IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(C)),l)=True;Eccentricity(C)=e

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$是以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与该椭圆的一个交点，且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=2 \angle PF_{2} F_{1}$，则这个椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P;P: Point;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2), H);H: Circle;AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = 2*AngleOf(P, F2, F1)
process: 因为P是以F_{1}F_{2}为直径的圆与该椭圆的一个交点,所以\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\frac{\pi}{2}因为\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=2\anglePF_{2}F_{1},所以\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=\frac{\pi}{6}所以|PF_{1}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|\sin\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=2c\sin\frac{\pi}{6}=c,|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}|\cos\anglePF_{2}F_{1}=2c\times\cos\frac{\pi}{6}=\sqrt{3}c所以,a=\frac{|PF|+|PF_{2}|}{e=\frac{c}{a}}=\frac{c+\sqrt{3}c}{2}=\frac{c(1+\sqrt{3})}{2}

text: 设$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，则$|P F_{1}| | P F_{2}|$的最大值为?最小值为?

text: 已知动点$P(x, y)$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上，若$A$点坐标为$(3,0)$ ,$|\overrightarrow{A M}|=1$，且$\overrightarrow{P M} \cdot \overrightarrow{A M}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{P M}|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);x1: Number;y1: Number;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (3, 0);M: Point;Abs(VectorOf(A, M)) = 1;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, M), VectorOf(A, M)) = 0
process: \because\overrightarrow{PM}\cdot\overrightarrow{AM}=0,\therefore\overrightarrow{PM}\bot\overrightarrow{AM},|\overrightarrow{PM}|=|A|1,\therefore|\overrightarrow{AN}|\frac{AM}{2}=1则|\overrightarrow{PM}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{AP}|^{2}-|\overrightarrow{AM}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{AP}|^{2}-1\because|\overrightarrow{AM}|=1,\therefore点M的轨迹是以点A为圆心,1为半径的圆,A点同时为椭圆的右焦点.|\overrightarrow{PM}|^{2}=|\overrightarrow{AP}|^{2}-1'|\overrightarrow{AP}|越小,|\overrightarrow{PM}|越小,结合图形知,当P点为椭圆的右顶点时,|\overrightarrow{AP}|取最小值a-c=5-3=2,\therefore|\overrightarrow{PM}|最小值是\sqrt{4-1}=\sqrt{3}

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$共焦点且以$x \pm \sqrt{3} y=0$为渐近线的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/64 + y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(x+pm*sqrt(3)*y=0)

text: 点$P(x_{0}, 1)$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1  (a>2)$在上一点，以点$P$以及焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为顶点的三角形的面积为$1$，则椭圆$C$的长轴长是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;P: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;x0:Number;a>2;Expression(C) = (y^2/4 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x0, 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C)={F1,F2};Area(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2))=1
process: 根据\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}的面积,先求出c,结合椭圆方程,得出a,即可求出椭圆的长轴长因为以点P(x_{0},1)以及焦点F_{1},F_{2}为顶点的三角形的面积为1.所以S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|F_{1}F_{2}|\cdoty_{p}=\frac{1}{2}\cdot2c\cdot1=c=1,又椭圆方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(a>2),所以a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}=4+1=5,则a=\sqrt{5}所以椭圆C的长轴长是2a=2\sqrt{5}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若椭圆$C$上存在一点$P$，使得$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，且$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积等于$4$.则实数$b$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Real;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Area(TriangleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 4
process: 由三角形面积公式、向量数量积的坐标表示及P在椭圆上列方程可得c|y_{P}|=4、|y_{P}|=\frac{b^{2}}{c},即可求参数b.解】由题设,\frac{1}{2}\times2c\times|y_{p}|=c|y_{p}=4,且(-c-x_{P},-y_{P})\cdot(c-x_{P},-y_{P})=0,可得x_{P}^{2}=c^{2}-y_{P}^{2}又C:\frac{x_{P}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{P}^{2}}{k^{2}}=\frac{c^{2}-y_{P}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{P}^{2}}{k^{2}}=1,则y_{P}=\frac{b^{2}}{c},综上,b^{2}=4,又b>0,则b=2.均答家为:2

text: 已知曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y|y|=1$，若直线$l$: $y=x+t$与曲线有且仅有一个公共点，则实数$t$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;t: Real;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y*Abs(y) = 1);Expression(l)=(y=x+t);NumIntersection(l,C)=1
process: 当y\geqslant0时,x^{2}-y^{2}=1;当y<0时,x^{2}+y^{2}=1;由此可得曲线C图象如下图所示\textcircled{1}当t\geqslant0时,\becausey=x为双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=1的产所近线,其与x^{2}+y^{2}=1(y<0)有唯一交点\therefore当t\geqslant0时,y=x+t与C有唯一交点\textcircled{2}当t<0时,若y=x+t与C有唯一交点,则y=x+t与x^{2}+y^{2}=1(y<0)相切则\frac{|t|}{\sqrt{2}}=1,解得:t=\sqrt{2}(舍)或t=-\sqrt{2}综上所述:实数t的取值范围为{-\sqrt{2}}\cup[0,+\infty)

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1)

text: 若点$M$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$上的一点，$O$为坐标原点，则$| O M |$的最大值和最小值分别是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, G)
process: 由椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1得,a=3,b=\sqrt{5},设点M(x,y),则|OM|=\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}}=\sqrt{\frac{4}{9}x^{2}+5}又x\in[-3,3],所以当M点分别为长轴端点、短轴端点时,|OM取得最大值、最小值,所以|OM|的最大值和最小值分别是3,\sqrt{5}.数答家为:3.\sqrt{5}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=x$的弦$A B$与$x$轴不垂直，则$A B$的中垂线与$x$轴交点的横坐标的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);Negation(IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), xAxis))

text: 已知斜率为$-\frac{1}{3}$且不经过坐标原点$O$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$M$为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$O M$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;M: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/7 = 1);Slope(H)=-1/3;Negation(PointOnCurve(O,H));Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M

text: 设双曲线$\frac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,(0<a<b)$的半焦距为$c$，直线$l$过点$(a, 0)$，$(0, b)$两点已知原点到直线$l$的距离为$\frac{3}{4} c$, 则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;I: Point;O: Origin;0 < a;a < b;c: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (a, 0);Coordinate(I) = (0, b);HalfFocalLength(G) = c;PointOnCurve(H, l);PointOnCurve(I, l);Distance(O, l) = (3/4)*c

text: 方程$x^2+(k-1) y^2=k+1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线，则实数$k$的取值范围是？
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;k:Real;Expression(E)=(x^2+(k-1)*y^2=k+1);PointOnCurve(Focus(E),xAxis) =True

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过右焦点$F_{2}$作其渐近线的垂线，垂足为$M$，交双曲线$C$右支于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=2 \overrightarrow{P M}$，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F2: Point;P: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F2,L);IsPerpendicular(Asymptote(C),L);FootPoint(Asymptote(C),L)=M;Intersection(L,RightPart(C))=P;VectorOf(F2, P) = 2*VectorOf(P, M);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)
process: 由F_{2}M\botOM,OM是渐近线,求出|F_{2}M|,从而可得|F_{2}P|,由双曲线定义得|F_{1}P|,然后用余弦定理得出a,b,c的等式,从而求得离心率.详解】由题意F_{2}(c,0),渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x,即bx-ay=0,\therefore|F_{2}M|=\frac{bc}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=b\because\overrightarrow{F_{2}P}=2\overrightarrow{PM},\therefore|PF_{2}|=\frac{2}{3}|MF_{2}|=\frac{2}{3}b,由双曲线定义得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a,|PF_{1}|=2a+\frac{2}{3}b,又|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c,\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=120^{\circ}在\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中由余弦定理得4c^{2}=\frac{4}{9}b^{2}+(\frac{2}{3}b+2a)^{2}-2\times\frac{2}{3}b\times(\frac{2}{3}b+2a)\times(-\frac{1}{2}),又c^{2}=a^{2+b^{2}}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}.

text: 已知点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，过原点$O$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$的一个交点为$M$，且$|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}-\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;O: Origin;l: Line;PointOnCurve(O, l);Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);M: Point;OneOf(Intersection(l, C)) = M;Abs(VectorOf(M, F1) + VectorOf(M, F2)) = Abs(VectorOf(M, F1) - VectorOf(M, F2))
process: 由|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}+\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}-\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|分析出\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}为直角三角形,解三角形得到各边边长,利用椭圆定义得到c+\sqrt{3}c=2a,求出离心率.不妨设M在第一象限,由|\overrightarrow{MF}_{1}+\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}-\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}|,两边平方后化简得:\overrightarrow{MF}\cdot\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}=0,所以\overrightarrow{MF_{1}}\bot\overrightarrow{MF_{2}}在Rt\triangleMF_{1}F_{2}中,\because\angleMOF_{2}=60^{\circ},|OM|=c,|OF_{2}|=\cdot\angleMF_{2}F_{1}=60^{\circ}|MF_{2}|=|F_{2}F_{1}|\cos\angleMF_{2}F_{1}=2c\cos60^{\circ}=c,|MF_{1}|=|F_{2}F_{1}|\sin\angleMF_{2}F_{1}=2c\sin60^{\circ}=\sqrt{3}c,由椭圆定义可知:|MF_{2}|+|MF_{1}|=c+\sqrt{3}c=2a,所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{1+\sqrt{3}}=\sqrt{3}-

fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;C2: Parabola;a:Number;b:Number;p:Number;p>0;a>0;b>0;Expression(C1)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Eccentricity(C1)=2;Expression(C2)=(x^2=2*(p*y));Distance(Focus(C2),Asymptote(C1))=2
process: 试题分析:e=\frac{c}{a}=2,\thereforec=2a,b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=\sqrt{3}a,所以双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{3}x,又抛物线的焦点坐标为(0,\frac{p}{2}),由点到直线的距离公式得_{2}=\frac{p}{2},\thereforep=8

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/(3 - m) + x^2/m^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (0, 1);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率是$\frac{1}{2}$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2
process: \textcircled{1}当椭圆的焦点在x轴上时,由题意得\underline{\sqrt{4-m}}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=3;\textcircled{2}当椭圆的焦点在y轴上时,由题意得\frac{\sqrt{m-4}}{\sqrt{m}}=\frac{1}{2},解得m=\frac{16}{3}综上所述,m=3或\frac{16}{3}

text: 若点$(a, \frac{a}{2})$在方程$y=3 x^{2}+x$所表示的曲线上，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (a, a/2);Expression(G)=(y = 3*x^2 + x);PointOnCurve(H, G);a:Number
process: 点(a,\frac{a}{2})在方程y=3x^{2}+x所表示的曲线上,则\frac{a}{2}=3\cdota^{2}+a,解得a=0或a=-\frac{1}{6}

fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (9, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);y2>y1;y1>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 5*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))
process: 由抛物线的定义可得|AF|=1+\frac{p}{2},|BF|=9+\frac{p}{2},依据题设可得9+\frac{p}{2}=5+\frac{5p}{2}\Rightarrowp=2,则y_{1}^{2}=4\times1=4,y_{2}^{2}=4\times9=36\Rightarrowy_{2}=6(舍去负值),故y_{1}^{2}+y_{2}=10,故填10

text: 对于抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上任意一点$Q$，点$P(a , 0)$都满足$|P Q |\geq|a|$，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, G);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (a, 0);a: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) >= Abs(a)

text: 若点$O$和点$F$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的中心和左焦点，点$P$为椭圆上的任意一点，则$|O P|^{2}+|P F|^{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Center(G) = O;LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)
process: 本题考查椭圆标准方程,几何性质,函数思想的应用椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1中心O(0,0),左焦点F(-1,0);设P(x,y),则y=1-\frac{x^{2}}{2}(-\sqrt{2}\leqslantx\leqslant\sqrt{2});于是|OP|^{2}+|PF|^{2}=x^{2}+y^{2}+(x+1)+y^{2}=x^{2}+2(1-\frac{x^{2}}{2})+(x+1)^{2}=(x+1)^{2}+2(-\sqrt{2}\leqslantx\leqslant\sqrt{2}),当x=-1时,|OP^{2}+|PF|^{2}取最小值,最小值是2

text: 若抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点在直线$x+2 y-4=0$上，则$p$=? $C$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(G) = (x + 2*y - 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G)

text: 椭圆$m x^{2}+n y^{2}=1$与直线$y=1-x$交于$M$、$N$两点,原点与线段$MN$中点的连线的斜率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$, 则$\frac{m}{n}$的值是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;G: Ellipse;n: Number;m: Number;H: Line;Expression(G) = (m*x^2 + n*y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = 1 - x);Intersection(G, H) = {M, N};O:Origin;Slope(LineSegmentOf(O,MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N))))=sqrt(2)/2

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，$M$是抛物线上的点且$|M F|=3$ , $N(-2,0)$，则直线$M N$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(M, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 3;Coordinate(N) = (-2, 0)
process: 设M(x,y),抛物线y^{2}=8x准线方程为x=-2,由|MF|=3,则x+2=3,得x=1,y=\pm2\sqrt{2},故MN的斜率为\frac{\pm2\sqrt{2}}{1-(-2)}=\pm\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}

text: 实轴长为$12$，离心率为$2$，焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Length(RealAxis(G))=12;Eccentricity(G)=2;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis)
process: 根据题意,要求双曲线的实轴长为12,则2a=12,即a=6,又由其离心率e=2,即e=\frac{c}{a}=2,则有c=12,则b=\sqrt{c^{2}-a^{2}}=\sqrt{108},又由双曲线的焦点在x轴上,则其标准方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{36}-\frac{y^{2}}{108}=1;

text: 焦点与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$右焦点相同的抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)
process: 求出双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点为(\sqrt{5},0),设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=2px(p>0),由\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{5}求出p=2\sqrt{5},即可求解.详解】由x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1可得:a^{2}=1,b^{2}=4,所以c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{1+5}=\sqrt{5},所以双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右焦点为(\sqrt{5},0)设抛物线的方程为y^{2}=2px(p>0),由题意知\frac{p}{2}=\sqrt{5},所以p=2\sqrt{5}所以抛物线的方程为y2=4\sqrt{5}x,

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$与$l$: $x+y=1$相交于两个不同的点$A$ ,$B$, $l$与$y$轴交于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{P A}=\frac{5}{12} \overrightarrow{P B}$，则$a$=?

text: 设$F_{1}(-c, 0)$ , $F_{2}(c, 0)$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点，若直线$x=\frac{2 a^{2}}{c}$上存在点$P$，使$|P F_{2}|=2 c$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;H: Line;P: Point;c: Number;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);Expression(H) = (x = (2*a^2)/c);PointOnCurve(P, H);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2*c;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2
process: 由题设,|PF_{2}|=2c\geqslant\frac{2a^{2}}{c}-c,则e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}\leqslant\frac{2}{3},而0<e<1.所以_{0}<e\leqslant\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，$B(0,-1)$ , $A$为抛物线上任意一点，当$\frac{|A F|}{|A B|}$取最小值时，$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: F:Point;G:Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2=4*y);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (0,-1);A:Point;PointOnCurve(A,G) = True;WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F)) / Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = True;Focus(G) = F
process: 由题意得F(0,1),抛物线x^{2}=4y的准线方程方程为y=-1,点B(0,-1)在准线上,如图所示,根据抛物线的定义知|AF|=|AA_{1}|,所以\frac{|AF|}{|AB|}=\frac{|AA_{1}|}{|AB|}=\sin\angleABA_{1}'即问题转化为当直线AB的倾斜角的正弦值最小时,求|AB|的值;设l_{AB}:y=kx-1,当直线与抛物线相切时,倾斜角的正弦值最小联立\begin{cases}x^{2}=4y\\y=kx-1\end{cases}\Rightarrowx^{2}-4kx+4=0,判别式_{A}=(-4k)^{2}-4\times4=0时,解得k=\pm1,

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=m x$的焦点坐标为$(\frac{1}{2}, 0)$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2 = m*x);Coordinate(Focus(G))=(1/2,0)
process: 直接由抛物线方程写出焦点坐标,由题意得求出m的值.解:由抛物线方程得:焦点坐标(\frac{m}{4},0),\therefore\frac{m}{4}=\frac{1}{2},\thereforem=2.

text: 已知椭圆的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$，它的两个焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，若$|F_{1} F_{2}|=8$，弦$AB$过$F_{1}$，则$\triangle ABF_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$的焦点重合，则该双曲线的焦点到其渐近线的距离等于?

text: 若$F$为双曲线$M$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左焦点，过原点的直线$l$与双曲线$M$的左、右两支各交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\frac{1}{|F A|}-\frac{9}{|F B|}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: F: Point;M: Hyperbola;Expression(M) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(M) = F;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, l) = True;l: Line;Intersection(l,LeftPart(M)) = A;Intersection(l, RightPart(M)) = B;A: Point;B: Point
process: 如图所示:设|AF|=m,|BF|=n,F为双曲线的右焦点,连接AF,BF,则AFBF是平行四边形则|AF|=|BF|=m,由双曲线定义得n-m=2a=6,即n=m+6,且m\geqslantc-a=2,所以|\frac{1}{|F}.-\frac{9}{\frac{9}{1}}==\frac{1}{m}-\frac{9}{n}=\frac{1}{m}-\frac{9}{m+6},=\frac{|FB|}{m}-\frac{9}{m+6}\frac{1}{2}(m\geqslant2),则f'(m)=-\frac{1}{m^{2}}+\frac{9}{(m+6)}\frac{8m2-12m-1}{m^{2}(m+6)}\frac{2m-36}{+6}^{2}=\frac{8(2m+3)(m}{m2(m+6)}\_.当2\leqslantm<3时,f'(m)<0,当m>3时,f'(m)>0,所以当m=3时,f(m)_{\min}=-\frac{2}{3}当m\rightarrow+\infty时,f(m)\rightarrow0,当m=2时,f(2)=\frac{1}{2}-\frac{9}{2+6}=-\frac{5}{8},所以\frac{1}{FA}-\frac{9}{FB}的取值范围是-\frac{2}{3},0)

process: 若\overrightarrow{AF}=-2\overrightarrow{BF},则由图1可知:渐近线OB的斜率为-\frac{b}{a},l\botOB.在RtAOBA中,由角平分线定理可得\frac{|OA|}{|OB|}=\frac{|FA|}{|FB|}=2,所以\angleAOB=60^{\circ},\anglexOA=30^{\circ},所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}若\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{BF},则由图2可知:渐近线OB为AAOF边AF的垂直平分线,故\triangleAOF为等腰三角形,故\angleAOB=\angleBOF=60^{0},\frac{b}{a}=\sqrt{3},e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=2即该双曲线的离心率为2或\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{}

text: 已知直线$y=\frac{1}{2} x+1$与抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则三角形$O A B$的面积为?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线渐近线方程为$2 x \pm 3 y=0$，且焦距是$2 \sqrt{13}$，则双曲线的方程为?

process: 解:因为焦点在x轴上的双曲线,所以设双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)因为双曲线渐近线方程为2x\pm3y=0,所以\frac{b}{a}=\frac{2}{3},因为焦距是2\sqrt{13},所以2c=2\sqrt{13},得c=\sqrt{13},所以a^{2}+b^{2}=13.解得a=3,b=2,所以双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1

A1: Point;A2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a>1;LeftVertex(G) = A1;RightVertex(G) = A2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;k1: Number;Slope(LineOf(P,A1)) = k1;k2: Number;Slope(LineOf(P,A2)) = k2;k1 * k2 = -1/4;a: Real
process: \because椭圆\frac{x2}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)\thereforeA(-a,0),B(a,0),设P(x,y),\because直线PA_{1}的斜率为k_{1},直线PA_{2}的斜率为k_{2}若k_{1}k_{2}=-\frac{1}{4}.\therefore\frac{y-0}{x+a}\cdot\frac{y-0}{x-a}=-\frac{1}{4},化简得:x^{2}+4y^{2}-a^{2}=0,即\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{a^{2}}{4}}=\thereforea^{2}=4,可得a=2.

process: \because双曲线与椭圆\frac{x2}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1有公共焦点.\therefore双曲线的焦点坐标为F_{1}(-2\sqrt{5},0),F_{2}(2\sqrt{5},0)设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{20-a^{2}}=1(0<a<2\sqrt{5})\because双曲线过点(3\sqrt{2},2)\therefore\underline{(3\sqrt{2})^{2}}-\frac{2^{2}}{20-}\frac{2^{2}}{-a^{2}}=1'即a^{4}-42a^{2}+360=0解得a^{2}=12或a^{2}=30(舍去)\therefore双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=4$，则该抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Inclination(l) = pi/4;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4
process: 分析:由焦点坐标写出直线AB的方程y=x-\frac{p}{2},设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),把直线方程代入抛物线方程整理由韦达定理可得x_{1}+x_{2},再由抛物线的定义表示出焦点弦长为x_{1}+x_{2}+p,从而可求得p.详解:直线AB方程为y=x-\frac{p}{2},代入抛物线方程并整理得x^{2}-3px+\frac{p^{2}}{4}=0设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=3p,又|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p,\therefore3p+p=4,p=1,\therefore抛物线方程为y2=2x

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，直线$l$: $y=m(x-1)$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，点$A$在第一象限，若$|F A|=3|F B|$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = m*(x - 1));m: Number;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Quadrant(A) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),直线方程与椭圆方程联立方程组,消元后由韦达定理得y_{1}+y_{2},y_{1}y_{2},利用已知得y_{1}=-3y_{2}这样可求得交点坐标,从而求得m.解:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}y=m(x-1)\\y2=4x\end{cases},消去x得my^{2}-4y-4m=0,则y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{4}{m},y_{1}y_{2}=-4,由|AF|=3|BF|可得y_{1}=-3y_{2}所以-2y_{2}=\frac{4}{m},3y^{2}解得m=\sqrt{3}(m=-\sqrt{3}舍去)

process: 抛物线C:y^{2}=4x的准线为x=-1设点P在准线上的射影为D,则根据抛物线的定义可知|PF|=|PD|要求|PA|+|PF|取得最小值,即求|PA|+|PD|取得最小.当D,P,A三点共线时,|PA|+PD最小,为4.(-1)=5.

text: 若椭圆的长轴长是短轴长之的$2$倍，它的一个焦点是$F_{1}(0,-3)$，则椭圆的标准方程为?

process: 由题意设椭圆方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0),则\begin{cases}2a=4b\\c=3\\a=b^{2}+c^{2}\end{cases}.解得\begin{cases}a=2\sqrt{3}\\b=\sqrt{3}\end{cases}所以椭圆方程为\frac{y^{2}}{12}+\frac{x^{2}}{3}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线过点$(2, \sqrt{3})$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H, OneOf(Asymptote(G)))
process: 由条件可得直线y=\frac{b}{a}x过点(2,\sqrt{3}),然后可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},然后可得答案.[详解]双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x所以直线y=\frac{b}{a}x过点(2,\sqrt{3}),代入可得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}所以e=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=2$，则椭圆的离心率等于?

text: 已知双曲线$C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线与$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$ 、 $B$两点，若$3 \overrightarrow{F_{1} A}=2 \overrightarrow{A B}$ , $\overrightarrow{F_{1} B} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}=0$，则$C$的离心率为?

text:
抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$ , $A$, $B$在抛物线上，且$\angle A F B=\frac{\pi}{2}$，弦$AB$的中点$M$在其准线上
的射影为$N$，则$\frac{|M N|}{|A B|}$的最大值为?

text: 已知$F$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，若直线$y=k x$与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\angle A F B=135^{\circ}$，记椭圆的离心率为$e$，则$e^{2}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);k: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};AngleOf(A, F, B) = ApplyUnit(135, degree);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 设F为椭圆的另一焦点,如图,连接AF,BF,BF,AF根据椭圆和直线的对称性,可得四边形AFBF为平行四边形又因为\angleAFB=135^{\circ},所以\angleFAF=45^{\circ}在\triangleAFF中|FF|^{2}=|AF|+|AF|^{2}-2|AF|\cdot|AF|\cos\angleFAF=(|AF|+|AF|)^{2}-(2+\sqrt{2})\times|AF|\cdot|AF|所以_{(|AF|+|AF|})^{2}-(2+\sqrt{2})\times(\frac{|AF|+|AF|}{2})^{2}\leqslant(|FF|)^{2}当且仅当|AF|=|AF|时,等号成立,即\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{4}\leqslant(\frac{|FF|}{|AF|+|AF|}^{2}又因为|FF|=2c,|AF|+|AF|=2a,所以e^{2}\geqslant\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{4}又因为e^{2}<1,故\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{4}\leqslante^{2}<1:\frac{2-\sqrt{2}}{<e^{2}<1}

text: 动点$P$在抛物线$y=2 x^{2}+1$上运动，则$P$点与点$A(0,-1)$所连线段中点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;M:Point;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2 + 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, -1);PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,A))=M

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作斜率等于$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$的直线与抛物线$C$交于$A$ ,$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,G);Slope(G) = sqrt(3)/3;Intersection(G,C)={A,B}
process: 将直线方程代入抛物线方程,利用抛物线焦点弦长公式,结合韦达定理可求得结果由抛物线方程知:F(1,0),则直线AB方程为:y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}(x-1)'代入抛物线方程可得:\frac{1}{3}(x^{2}-2x+1)=4x,整理得:x^{2}-14x+1=0,\therefore|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+2=14+2=16.

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$E$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左，右焦点，点$M$在$E$上，$M F_{1}$与$x$轴垂直，$\sin \angle M F_{2} F_{1}=\frac{1}{3}$,则$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(E)=F1;RightFocus(E)=F2;PointOnCurve(M, E);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,F1),xAxis);Sin(AngleOf(M, F2, F1)) = 1/3

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的点$P$到它的焦点$F$的最短距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P, G) ;Focus(G) = F;F:Point
process: 试题分析:P(x_{0},y_{0}),(x_{0}\geqslant0),根据焦半径公式|PF|=x_{0}+1\geqslant1.

fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M, LeftPart(C)) = True;PointOnCurve(N, RightPart(C)) = True;IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(M, N), LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2))/2;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(F1, N), C) = Q;Q: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, Q)) = (2/5)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, N))
process: 分析:运用双曲线的对称性由条件可设N的坐标,由中点坐标公式可得Q的坐标,再由N,Q在双曲线上得到关于a,b,c的关系式,从而可得双曲线的离心率\therefore|MN|=c.由MN//F_{1}F_{2},可设N(\frac{c}{2},t),\because|F_{1}Q|=\frac{2}{5}|F_{1}N|,\therefore可得点Q的坐标为(-\frac{2c}{5},\frac{2t}{5})\because点N,Q在双曲线上,\frac{c^{2}}{4a^{2}}-\frac{t^{2}}{b^{2}}=1消去t整理得\frac{c^{2}}{2}=7,\therefore离心率e=\sqrt{7}

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交双曲线左支于$A$、$B$两点，则$|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|$的最小值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/6 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l) = True;l: Line;Intersection(l, LeftPart(G)) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point
process: 试题分析:|AF_{2}|+|BF_{2}|=2a+|AF_{1}|+2a+|BF_{1}|=4a+|AB|\geqslant4a+\frac{2b^{2}}{a}=4\times3+\frac{2\times6}{3}=16

fact_expressions: C1: Ellipse;Expression(C1) = (x^2/36 + y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};C2: Parabola;Expression(C2) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p > 0;Focus(C2) = F2;P: Point;Intersection(C1, C2) = P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 7
process: 依题意,由椭圆定义得|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=12,而|PF_{1}|=7,则|PF_{2}|=5,因点F_{2}是抛物线C_{2}:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点,则该抛物线的准线l过点F_{1},如图,过点P作PQ\botl于点Q,E由抛物线定义知|PQ|=|PF_{2}|=5,而F_{1}F_{2}//PQ,则\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\angleF_{1}PQ所以\cos\anglePF_{1}F_{2}=\cos\angleF_{1}PQ=\frac{|PQ|}{|PF|}=\frac{5}{7}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)
process: 根据双曲线的离心率为\sqrt{3},由_{e}=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{3}求解因为双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的离心率为\sqrt{3}所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{b}{a})^{2}}=\sqrt{3},解得\frac{b}{a}=\pm\sqrt{2},所以双曲线C的渐近线方程为y=\pm\sqrt{2}x

text: 若焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} x$，则该双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*x*(sqrt(3)/2))
process: \because焦点在x轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}x\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}则离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{3}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}

text: $F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的两个焦点，$P$在双曲线上且满足$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|=32$，则$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$的大小为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 32

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点到其渐近线的距离为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则该双曲线的焦距等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;Distance(OneOf(Focus(G)), Asymptote(G)) = 2*sqrt(2)
process: 解:由双曲线x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则双曲线的渐近线为y=\pmbx,不妨设为y=-bx,即bx+y=0,焦点坐标为F(c,0),则焦点到其渐近线的距离d=\frac{bc}{\sqrt{1+b^{2}}}=\frac{bc}{c}=b=2\sqrt{2}则双曲线的焦距等于2c=6,

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=12 y$的焦点为$F$，经过点$P(2,1)$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点且点$P$恰为$A B$的中点，则$|A F|+|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 12*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，若以$N(0,2)$为圆心且与椭圆$C$有公共点的圆的最大半径为$\sqrt{26}$，此时椭圆$C$的方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;N: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(N) = (0, 2);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(2)/2;IsIntersect(G,C) = True;Center(G) = N;Max(Radius(G)) = sqrt(26)

text: 已知点$P$在抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上，则当点$P$到点$Q(1,2)$的距离与点$P$到抛物线焦点距离之和取得最小值时，点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Q: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(Q) = (1, 2);PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Distance(P, Q) + Distance(P, Focus(G)))
process: 根据抛物线定义,可得点P到抛物线焦点距离等于P到准线的距离,结合图象即可求得PQ+PM取得最小值是P的位置,即可求得答案.如图所示:是据抛物线定义可得:点P到抛物线焦点距离等于P到准线的距离,即为PF=PM,所求即为PQ+PF=PQ+PM,由图象可得,当P运动到Q的正下方P时,QP'+P'M最小,即为QM',所以x_{p}=1,代入抛物线方程可得y_{p}=\frac{x_{p}^{2}}{4}=\frac{1}{4},所以P的坐标为(1,\frac{1}{4})

text: 已知顶点在原点的抛物线$C$的顶点坐标为原点，焦点在$x$轴上，直线$y=x$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点。若$P(2 , 2)$为$AB$的中点，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;O:Origin;Expression(G) = (y = x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 2);Vertex(C)=O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), xAxis);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 若双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率为$3$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2/16 - x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 3
process: 分析:首先求得m的值,然后求解渐近线方程即可详解:由双曲线方程可知:m>0,且:a^{2}=16,b^{2}=m^{1}则c^{2}=16+m,双曲线的离心率:e=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{16+m}{16}}=3,解得:m=128.则双曲线的渐近线满足:\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{128}=0,整理可得渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}x

fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;x0:Number;y0:Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5
process: 抛物线C的准线方程为x=-1,由抛物线的焦半径公式可得|PF|=x_{0}+1=5,解得x_{0}=4.

fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(l) = (x - y + 1 = 0);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G)
process: 分析:联立直线方程和椭圆方程,利用根与系数的关系以及弦长公式即可得到答案.详解:设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),联立\begin{cases}x-y+1=0\\\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1\end{cases},化为7x^{2}+8x-8=0,\frac{x_{2}=-\frac{8}{7},}{(x_{1}+x_{2})^{2}-4x_{1}x_{2}}=-\frac{2}{1}=\sqrt{2}\cdot\sqrt{(-\frac{8}{7})^{2}+4\times\frac{8}{7}}=\frac{24}{7}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$在双曲线$C$上，若$|P F|=5 a$, $\angle P F O=120^{\circ}$，其中$O$为坐标原点，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5*a;AngleOf(P, F, O) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);O: Origin
process: 设左焦点为F_{1},由双曲线定义可得|PF_{1}|=|PF|+2a=7a,|F_{1}F|=2c,\anglePFF_{1}=120^{\circ}由余弦定理\cos\anglePFF_{1}=\frac{|PF|^{2}+|FF_{1}|^{2}-|PF_{1}2}{2|PF||FF|}代入得-\frac{1}{2}=\frac{25a^{2}+4c^{2}-49a^{2}}{2\times2c\times5a}化简得2c^{2}+5ac-24a^{2}=0,同除以a2得2e^{2}+5e-24=0,即(2e-3)(e+4)=0所以e=\frac{3}{3}青)本题考查了双曲线定义及离心率求法,余弦定理的简单应用,属于中档题

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 ,(a>0, b>0)$的虚轴长为$2$，焦距为$2 \sqrt{3}$，则此双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 2;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(3)
process: 由题可以得2b=2\Rightarrowb=1,2c=2\sqrt{3}\Rightarrowc=\sqrt{3}.由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}可得a=\sqrt{2}.所以双曲线的方为:\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$和$A(0,1)$，点$P$为抛物线上的动点，$P$到该抛物线准线的距离为$d$，则$|P A|+d$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P,Directrix(G))=d;d:Number
process: 根据抛物线的定义可得,d=|PF|则(|PA|+d)_{\min}=(|PA|+|PF|)_{\min}=|AF|=\sqrt{2}

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$过点$(-3 \sqrt{2}, 2)$, 则该双曲线的焦距为?
