text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，则实数$m$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/m = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x)
process: 试题分析:由渐近线方程可知a=b\thereforem=4

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的焦点，且垂直于$x$轴的直线，交双曲线于$A$,$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
process: 解析过程略

text: 曲线$C$的方程为$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，其上一点$P(x , y)$，则$3 x+y$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);x1:Number;y1:Number;PointOnCurve(P, C)
process: 令3x+y=n,代入x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1,消去y化简整理,得12x^{2}-6nx+n^{2}-3=0,A=36n^{2}-4\times12(n^{2}-3)\geqslant0,解得-2\sqrt{3}\leqslantn\leqslant2\sqrt{3}答案:2\sqrt{3}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的长轴两端点为$M$、$N$，异于$M$、$N$的点$P$在椭圆上，则$P M$, $P N$的斜率之积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Endpoint(MajorAxis(G))={M,N};PointOnCurve(P,G);Negation(M=P);Negation(N=P)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$,已知$A$、$B$为抛物线上的两个动点，且满足$\angle A F B=60^{\circ}$, 过弦$A B$的中点$M$作抛物线准线的垂线$M N$, 垂足为$N$,则$\frac{|M N|}{|A B|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;p>0;Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);AngleOf(A, F, B) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Directrix(G));FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Directrix(G))=N;PointOnCurve(M, LineSegmentOf(M, N))
process: 试题分析:过A,B作准线的垂线,垂足为P,Q,由图可知,MN=\frac{1}{2}(AP+BQ),根据抛物线的定义可知AP=AF,BQ=BF,所以MN=\frac{1}{2}(AF+BF).在\triangleABF中,根据余弦定理可知\cos60^{\circ}=\frac{AF^{2}+BF^{2}-AB^{2}}{2\cdotAF\cdotBF}=\frac{1}{2},所以(AF+BF)^{2}-3\cdotAF\cdotBF=AB^{2}根据基本不等式的性质AF\cdotBF\leqslant(\frac{AF+BF}{2})^{2},所以上式可化为\frac{1}{4}(AF+BF)^{2}\leqslantAB^{2},即MN^{2}\leqslantAB^{2},所以\frac{MN}{AB}\leqslant1.

fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = ((x + 2)^2 + y^2 = 4);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = ((x - 2)^2 + y^2 = 36);M: Circle;IsOutTangent(M, C1);IsInTangent(M, C2);M1: Point;Center(M) = M1
process: 设动圆M的圆心M(x,y),半径为r_{1}由题意得MC_{1}=r+2,MC_{2}=6-r,所以MC_{1}+MC_{2}=8>4,故M的轨迹是以C_{1},C_{2}为焦点的椭圆,a=4,c=2,所以b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=12,所以动圆圆心M的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1

text: 已知椭圆$C$的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-1}=1$，若椭圆$C$的离心率$e=\sqrt{\frac{6}{7}}$，则$k$的所有取值构成的集合为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/(9 - k) + y^2/(k - 1) = 1);Eccentricity(C) = e ;e= sqrt(6/7);e:Number;k:Number
process: 试题分析:9-k>k-1>0时,\frac{\sqrt{9-k-(k-1)}}{\sqrt{9-k}}=\sqrt{\frac{6}{7}},解得k=2,当k-1>9-k>0时,\frac{(k-1)-(9-k)}{\sqrt{k-1}}=\sqrt{6},解得k=8,所以k的为{2,8}.

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ ,$ A $, $B$分别是它的右顶点和上顶点，$M$是椭圆$E$上的一点，过$M$向$x$轴作垂线恰好通过椭圆的左焦点$F_{1}$，若$A B / / O M$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;F1:Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(E)=A;UpperVertex(E)=B;LeftFocus(E)=F1;PointOnCurve(M, E);L:Line;PointOnCurve(M,L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);PointOnCurve(F1,L);IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(A, B),LineSegmentOf(O,M))
process: 根据题意知:A(a,0),B(0,b),M(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a}),则k_{AB}=-\frac{b}{a},k_{MO}=-\frac{b^{2}}{ac}AB//OM,则-\frac{b}{a}=-\frac{b^{2}}{ac},故b=c,故离心率为\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}.

text: 已知抛物线方程为$x^{2}=-2 y$，则该抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -2*y)

text: 若点$P(2021, t)$在抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上，点$F$为该抛物线的焦点，则$|P F|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (2021, t);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F;t:Number

C1: Ellipse;C2: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};Focus(C2) = {F1, F2};M: Point;OneOf(Intersection(C1, C2)) = M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M, F1), LineSegmentOf(M, F2));e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(C1) = e1;Eccentricity(C2) = e2;e2 = 2*e1
process: 如图,由椭圆定义及勾股定理得,\begin{cases}|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a_{1}\\|PF_{1}|^{2}+|PF_{2}|=4c^{2}\end{cases},可得S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=b_{1}^{2}\becausee_{1}=\frac{c}{a_{1}},\thereforea_{1}=\frac{c}{e_{1}},\thereforeb_{1}2=a_{1}2-c^{2}=c^{2}(\frac{1}{e^{2}}-1)同理可得S_{\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}}=b_{2}^{2},\becausee_{2}=\frac{c}{a_{2}},\thereforea_{2}=\frac{1}{e_{2}},\thereforeb_{2}^{2}=c^{2}-a_{2}^{2}=c^{2}(1-\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}),c^{2}(\frac{1}{e_{1}^{2}}-1)=c^{2}(1-\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}})即\frac{1}{e_{1}^{2}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}=2,c_{2}=2e_{1},\thereforee_{1}=\frac{\sqrt{10}}{4}.】本题考查椭圆和双曲线的简单性质,利用三角形面积相等是解答该题的关键,属于中档题

text: 若点$O$和点$F(-2,0)$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的中心和左焦点，点$P$为双曲线右支上的任意一点，则$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{F P}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (-2, 0);Center(G) = O;LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}(-c, 0)$, $F_{2}(c, 0)$，若椭圆上存在点$P$使$\frac{a}{\sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}}=\frac{c}{\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}}$, 则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;c: Number;Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);a/Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = c/Sin(AngleOf(P, F2, F1))

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的焦点坐标为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1)
process: 由c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2},可得c=\sqrt{2},双曲线x^{2}-y^{2}=1的焦点坐标为(\pm\sqrt{2},0)令x^{2}-y^{2}=0,可得渐近线y=\pmx

text: 已知以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为左、右焦点的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的左顶点为$A$，上顶点为$B$，点$M$、$N$是椭圆上任意两点，若$\Delta M A B$的面积最大值为$4(\sqrt{2}+1)$，则$\frac{|N F_{1}|+9|N F_{2}|}{4|N F_{1}||N F_{2}|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);F1:Point;F2:Point;LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;a: Number;a>1;A:Point;B:Point;M:Point;N:Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Max(Area(TriangleOf(M, A, B))) = 4*(1 + sqrt(2)) ;LeftVertex(G)=A;UpperVertex(G)=B
process: 由题意有A(-a,0),B(0,1),则|AB|=\sqrt{1+a^{2}},k_{AB}=\frac{1}{a},设直线l为椭圆的一条与AB平行的切线方程,其方程设为:y=\frac{1}{a}x+m,由\begin{cases}y=\frac{1}{a}x+m\\x^{2}+a^{2}y^{2}=a^{2}\end{cases},得2x^{2}+2mx+a^{2}m^{2}-a^{2}=0,\therefore_{\triangle}=(2am)^{2}-4\times2\times(a^{2}m^{2}-a^{2})=0,得m=\pm\sqrt{2},根据题意m=-\sqrt{2},切线l到直线AB的距离为:d=\frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{1+\frac{1}{a^{2}}};\therefore面积的最大值为(S_{\triangleABM})_{\max}=\frac{1+\frac{1}{a^{2}}}{2\sqrt{a^{2}+1}\frac{\sqrt{2}+1}{\sqrt{1}+1}}=4(\sqrt{2}+1),得a=8,设|NF|=m,|NF_{2}=n,则m+n=16,所以\frac{|NF|+9|NF_{2}|}{4|NF|}=\frac{m+9n}{4mn}=\frac{1}{4}(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{9}{n})=\frac{1}{64}(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{9}{m})(m+n)=\frac{1}{6}(1+9+\frac{m}{n}+\frac{9n}{m})\geqslant\frac{1}{74}(10+2\sqrt{\frac{m}{n}}.\frac{9n}{m})=\frac{1}{4}当且仅当\frac{m}{2}=\frac{9n}{},即m=3n时等号成立,均答字的,1

text: 直线$l$的方程为$y=x+3$，在$l$上任意取一点$P$，若过点$P$且以双曲线$12 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=3$的焦点为椭圆的焦点作椭圆，那么具有最短长轴的椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (12*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 3);Expression(l) = (y = x + 3);PointOnCurve(P, l);PointOnCurve(P, H);Focus(G) = Focus(H);WhenMin(MajorAxis(H))

text: 设$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=x$的焦点，过$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|+3| B F |$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作斜率为$2$的直线$l$，与该抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\Delta O A B$的面积等于$\sqrt{5}$($O$为坐标原点)，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));F: Point;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) = 2;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(O, A, B)) = sqrt(5)
process: 先由抛物线方程写出焦点F的坐标,然后可得直线l的方程,把直线方程代入抛物线方程,得到点AB的纵坐标的关系式,结合已知并利用三角形的面积公式列出方程,可求得p的值羊解】由题意可得抛物线的焦点F(\frac{p}{2},0),从而直线l的方程为x=\frac{1}{2}y+\frac{p}{2}.代入抛物线方程,得y^{2}-py-p^{2}=0.设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则y_{1}+y_{2}=p,y_{1}y_{2}=-p^{2}\DeltaOAB的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{p}{2}|y_{1}-y_{2}|=\frac{p}{4}\sqrt{(y_{1}+y_{2})^{2}-4y_{1}y_{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{4}p^{2}=\sqrt{5},得p=2.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25} + \frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左，右焦点，点$P$在椭圆$C$上，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}| \cdot |\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1),VectorOf(P, F2))=0
x_: Real;y_:Real;x_^2 = 4*y_

text: 已知两点$A(-3 , 0)$与$B(3 , 0)$，若$|PA|-|PB|=2$，那么$P$点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-3, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (3, 0);P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 2

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=-2 p x(p>0)$上一点到焦点和抛物线的对称轴的距离分别是$10$和$6$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;D: Point;PointOnCurve(D, G) = True;Distance(D, Focus(G)) = 10;Distance(D, SymmetryAxis(G)) = 6
process: 抛物线的焦点为(-\frac{p}{2},0),对称轴为x轴,\sqrt{10^{2}-6^{2}}=8.故可设符合题意的点的坐标为(-\frac{p}{2}\pm8,\pm6)代入抛物线方程得36=-2p(-\frac{p}{2}+8),解得p=2或p=18,负根舍去.睛】本小题主要老杳抛物线方程的求法,老杳抛物线的几何性质,老杳方程的用相,属于基础题

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$截直线$y=x+1$所得弦长是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x + 1)
G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e:Number;e= sqrt(15)/5
process: 若0<m<5,则e^{2}=\frac{5-m}{5}=\frac{15}{25}=\frac{3}{5}\thereforem=2;若m>5,则e^{2}=\frac{m-5}{m}=\frac{3}{5}\thereforem=\frac{25}{2}\thereforem的值为:2或\frac{25}{2}

text: 已知动点$P(x, y)$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上，过点$P$作圆$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=1$的切线，切点为$M$，则$P M$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;l1:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G);TangentOfPoint(P,H)=l1;TangentPoint(l1,H)=M
process: 设圆(x-3)^{2}+y2=1的圆心为A(3,0),由题意可知PM\botAM\therefore|PM^{2}|=|AP|^{2}-|AM^{2}|\because|AM|^{2}=1,\therefore|AP|越小,|PM|越小,而A为椭圆的右焦点\therefore|AP|最小是5-3=2,\therefore|PM|最小是\sqrt{4-1}=\sqrt{3}

text: 已知$F_{1}(-3,0)$ , $F_{2}(3,0)$是双曲线$C$的两个焦点，且直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$是该双曲线的一条渐近线，则此双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (3, 0);Focus(C) = {F1,F2};G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x*(sqrt(5)/2));OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = G
process: 由渐近线得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2},再由焦点得c=3,结合c^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}可求得a,b,得标准方程.由题意\begin{cases}\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}\\c=3\\c2=a+b^{2}\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}a=2\\b=\sqrt{5}\end{cases}\therefore双曲线标准方程是\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=2$与$y$轴的交点为$M$，与抛物线的交点为$N$，且$4|N F|=5|M N|$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;N: Point;F: Point;M: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (y = 2);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(H, yAxis) = M;Intersection(H,G)=N;4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = 5*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))
process: 分析:首先将y=2代入抛物线的方程,求得对应点N的坐标,从而求得|MN|,利用抛物线的定义,将|NF|用点N到抛物线准线的距离来表示,求得|NF|,之后应用题中所给的等量关系式,得到关于p的式子,从而求得结果,详解:将y=2代入抛物线方程,可以求得x=\frac{2}{p},利用题中条件,结合抛物线定义,可以求得4(\frac{2}{p}+\frac{p}{2})=5\times\frac{2}{p},解得p=1.

text: 点$M(5,3)$到抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a<0)$的准线的距离为$6$，那么抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;M: Point;a<0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);Coordinate(M) = (5, 3);Distance(M, Directrix(G)) = 6
process: 由题意知:抛物线准线方程为x=-\frac{a}{4}(a<0),而M(5,3)到准线的距离为6,\therefore|5+\frac{a}{4}|=6,解得a=4(舍)或a=-44.\therefore抛物线的标准方程是y2=-44xb答交为.,2=-44x

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=a y$的焦点恰好为双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=2$的上焦点，则$a$=?

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点作一条倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$的直线$l$，直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16-m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+20}=1$的右焦点，则实数$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;p: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(16 - m) - y^2/(m + 20) = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$的中心在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，若双曲线$C$的一条渐近线与直线$\sqrt{2} x-y-1=0$平行，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), yAxis);G: Line;Expression(G) = (sqrt(2)*x - y - 1 = 0);IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(C)), G)
process: 试题分析:利用已知条件列出ab关系式,然后求解双曲线的离心率即可详解:双曲线C的中心在原点,焦点在y轴上,若双曲线C的一条渐近线与直线\sqrt{2}x-y-1=0可得\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{2},即a^{2}=2b^{2}=2c^{2}-2a^{2},可得离心率e=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}.

text: 已知$A$,$B$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{25 y^{2}}{9 a^{2}}=1$上的两点，$F_{2}$是椭圆的右焦点，如果$|A F_{2}|+|B F_{2}|=\frac{8}{5} a$，$AB$的中点到椭圆左准线距离为$\frac{3}{2}$，则椭圆的方程?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = ((25*y^2)/(9*a^2) + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);RightFocus(G) = F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F2))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(B,F2))=(8/5)*a;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), LeftDirectrix(G)) = 3/2

text: 直线$l$经过椭圆的一个顶点和一个焦点，若椭圆中心到$l$的距离为其短轴长的$\frac{1}{4}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)), l);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), l);Distance(Center(G), l) = (1/4)*Length(MinorAxis(G))
process: 法一不妨设直线/过椭圆的上顶点(0,b)和左焦点(-c,0),b>0,c>0,则直线l的方程为bx-cy+bc=0,由已知得\frac{bc}{\sqrt{b^{2}+c^{2}}}=\frac{1}{4}\times2b解得b^{2}=3c^{2},又b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2},所以e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4},所以e=\frac{1}{2}法二不妨设直线l过椭圆的上顶点(0,b)和左焦点(-c,0),b>0,c>0则直线l的方程为bx-cy+bc=0,由已知得\frac{bc}{\sqrt{b^{2}+c2}}=\frac{1}{4}\times2b所以\frac{bc}{a}=\frac{1}{4}\times2b,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{2}.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$l$: $y=2 x$，且其实轴长小于$6$，则$C$的一个标准方程可以为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;l:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);OneOf(Asymptote(C))=l;Expression(l)=(y=2*x);Length(RealAxis(C))<6
process: 依题意得\frac{b}{a}=2'又其实轴长2a<6,故a<3,令a=2,得b=4,于是得C的一个标准方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 m}=1$的一个焦点为$(2 \sqrt{3}, 0)$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-1/(3*m)*y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (2*sqrt(3),0)
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{3m}=1的一个焦点为(2\sqrt{3},0),即c=\sqrt{m+3m}=2\sqrt{3}解得m=3,

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线与圆$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=16$相切，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 16);IsTangent(Directrix(G), H)
process: 抛物线的准线为x=-\frac{p}{2},与圆相切,则3+\frac{p}{2}=4,p=2.

text: 已知双曲线的一个焦点与抛物线$x^{2}=24 y$的焦点重合，一条渐近线的倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = 24*y);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=ApplyUnit(30,degree)
process: 试题分析:求得抛物线的焦点,设双曲线的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a,b>0),求得渐近线方程和a,b,c的关系,解方程即可得到所求.解:抛物线x^{2}=24y的焦点为(0,6)设双曲线的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}\cdot\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a,b>0)即有c=6,即a^{2}+b^{2}=36,渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{a}{b}x,由题意可得\tan30^{\circ}=\frac{a}{b},即为b=\sqrt{3}a解得a=3,b=3\sqrt{3},即有双曲线的标准方程为:\frac{y^{2}}{9}-\frac{x^{2}}{27}=1

text: 已知点$A$、$B$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上不同的两点，且$A$、$B$两点到抛物线$C$的焦点$F$的距离之和为$6$，线段$A B$的中点为$M(2,-1)$，则焦点$F$到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;B: Point;A: Point;M: Point;F:Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (2, -1);PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(B, C);Focus(C)=F;Distance(A,F)+Distance(B,F)=6;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = M;Negation(A=B)
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})由抛物线定义可知:x_{1}+x_{2}+p=6,则x_{1}+x_{2}=6-p又M(2,-1)为AB中点,则\frac{6-p}{2}=2\Rightarrowp=2\RightarrowF(1,0)\therefore抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x则:\begin{cases}y_{1}=4x_{1}\\y^{2}=4x_{2}\end{cases},两式作差得:(y_{1}+y_{2})(y_{1}-y_{2})=4(x_{1}-x_{2})则k_{AB}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{x_{1}}-\frac{2}{x_{2}}=\frac{4}{y_{1}+y_{2}}=\frac{4}{-2}=-2\therefore直线AB的方程为:y+1=-2(x-2),即2x+y-3=0\therefore点F到直线AB的距离d=\frac{|2+0-3|}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}本题正确结果:\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 中心在原点，焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的一条渐近线经过点$(4,-2)$，则它的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(H) = (4, -2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(H,OneOf(Asymptote(G)));Center(G)=O
process: 设双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0),则其渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,将点(4,-\sqrt{2})坐标代入上式,得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4},\therefore_{e=\frac{c}{a}}=\frac{\sqrt{a2+b^{2}}}{a^{2}}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\sqrt{1+(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4})}^{2}=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}答案:\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=ApplyUnit(60,degree)
process: 由双曲线方程\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1可得其焦点在y轴上,因为一条渐近线的倾斜角为60^{\circ},所以其方程为y=\sqrt{3}x,所以\frac{a}{b}=\sqrt{3},\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},设半焦距为c,所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2 m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(m + 4) + x^2/(2*m) = 1);m: Real;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)
process: 试题分析:因为双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的两条渐近线为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x,所以\frac{x^{2}}{2m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1的渐近线为y=\pm\sqrt{\frac{m+4}{2m}}x,则有\sqrt{\frac{m+4}{2m}}=\sqrt{3}\Rightarrowm=\frac{4}{5}.

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$的左、右焦点，点$P$为双曲线$C$上一点，如果$|P F_{1}|-|P F_{2}|=4$，那么双曲线$C$的方程为?离心率为？
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/16 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 4
process: 试题分析:因为|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=4,所以2a=4,得a=2,所以双曲线C的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1;所以离心率为e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{4+16}}{2}=\sqrt{5}

text: 已知抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{m}+\frac{x^{2}}{2}=1$的一个焦点重合，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/2 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Focus(G) = OneOf(Focus(H))

text: 点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一动点，则点$P$到点$A(0,-1)$的距离与到直线$x=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, -1);H: Line;Expression(H) = (x = -1)
process: 根据抛物线的定义,由A,P,F三点共线时,P到点A(0,-1)的距离与到直线x=-1的距离之和最小求解.[详解]因为抛物线方程为y^{2}=4x.所以抛物线的焦点坐标为F(1,0)准线方程为:x=-1.如图所示:由抛物线的定义得:点p到的焦点F(1,0)的距离与到准线x=-1的距离相等所以当A,P,F三点共线时,P到点A(0,-1)的距离与到直线x=-1的距离之和最小最小值为|AF|=\sqrt{2},

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的一条弦$A B$恰好以$P(1,1)$为中点，则弦$A B$所在直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=P

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x)
process: 对于抛物线y^{2}=4x,\because2p=4,\thereforep=2又\because抛物线开口向右,\therefore准线方程为x=-1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一点到其焦点距离为$3$，则该点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = 3
process: 试题分析:由题意知抛物线的焦点为(1,0),准线为x=-1;根据抛物线的定义:抛物线上的点到焦点的距离等于该点到准线的距离,知该点的横坐标为2,代入抛物线方程得该点坐标为(2,\pm2\sqrt{2}).

text: 抛物线$16 y^{2}=x$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (16*y^2 = x)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$a x+b y-\sqrt{a b}=0$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{2}{5}$相切，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;H: Line;Expression(H) = (-sqrt(a*b) + a*x + b*y = 0);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 2/5);IsTangent(H, G)
process: 因为直线ax+by-\sqrt{ab}=0与圆x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{2}{5}相切,所以圆心(0,0)到直线ax+by-\sqrt{ab}=0的距离\frac{|-\sqrt{ab}|}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}=\sqrt{\frac{2}{5}}所以a=2b,所以_{c}=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{a^{2}-\frac{1}{4}a^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}a所以椭圆C的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}

text: 已知双曲线$C$过点$M(2 , 2)$，且与$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$有相同的渐近线，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 2);PointOnCurve(M, C);Z: Curve;Expression(Z) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 4);Asymptote(Z) = Asymptote(C)
process: 双曲线C与x^{2}\cdot4y^{2}=4有相同的渐近线,设双曲线C方程为x^{2}-4y2=4\lambda(\lambda\neq0)双曲线C过点M(2,2),\therefore2^{2}-4\cdot2^{2}=-12=4\lambda,\therefore\lambda=-3,所以双曲线C的方程为\frac{y^{2}}{3}-\frac{x^{2}}{12}=1

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，点$A$、$B$在抛物线上，且满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F B}$，若$|\overrightarrow{A F}|=\frac{3}{2}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;lambda:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2=4*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);VectorOf(A, F) = lambda*VectorOf(F, B);Abs(VectorOf(A, F)) = 3/2
process: 设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).因为抛物线x^{2}=4y的焦点为F(0,1),准线为y=-1所以由|\overrightarrow{AF}|=\frac{3}{2},得y_{1}+1=\frac{3}{2},所以y_{1}=\frac{1}{2},x_{1}^{2}=4y_{1}=2.由\overrightarrow{AF}=\lambda\overrightarrow{FB}得\begin{cases}-x_{1}=\lambdax_{2},\\1-y_{1}=\lambda(y_{2}-1)\end{cases}即\begin{cases}x_{2}=-\frac{1}{2}x_{1},\\y_{2}=\frac{1-y_{1}}{2}+1=\frac{1}{2\lambda}+1\end{cases}因为x_{2}^{2}=4y_{2},所以(-\frac{1}{7}x_{1})^{2}=4(\frac{1}{27}+1)\cdot解得\lambda=\frac{1}{2}或\lambda=-1(舍)

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $b x^{2}+y^{2}=-2 b$的一个焦点与抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 \sqrt{6} y$的焦点相同，则双曲线$E$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (b*x^2 + y^2 = -2*b);b: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*(sqrt(6)*y));OneOf(Focus(E)) = Focus(C)
process: 抛物线C:x^{2}=4\sqrt{6}y的焦点为(0,\sqrt{6}),所以双曲线E:\frac{x^{2}}{-2}+\frac{y^{2}}{-2b}=1的一个焦点为(0,\sqrt{6}),所以b<0,2-2b=6,解得b=-2,即\frac{x^{2}}{-2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1则双曲线E的渐近线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{-2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=0即y=\pm\sqrt{2}x.

text: 抛物线$y=-\frac{1}{6} x^{2}$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = -x^2/6)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的一条渐近线被圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4$截得线段长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 4)
process: 双曲线x^{2}\cdoty^{2}=1的一条渐近线不妨为:x+y=0,圆C:(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4的圆心(2,0),半径为2,圆心到直线的距离为:d=\frac{|2-0|}{\sqrt{2}}=\sqrt{2}\therefore被圆C截得的线段长为2\sqrt{2-d^{2}}=2\sqrt{4-(\sqrt{2})^{2}}=2\sqrt{2}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=5 x$上的两点$A$、$B$到焦点的距离之和为$10$，则线段$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 5*x);A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G) = True;PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;Distance(A, Focus(G)) + Distance(B, Focus(G)) = 10
process: 试题分析:由题意知A,B两点到抛物线准线x=-\frac{5}{4}的距离和为10,则线段AB的中点到抛物线准线x=-\frac{5}{4}的距离为5,线段AB的中点到y轴的距离是5-\frac{5}{4}=\frac{15}{4}

text: 双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=m(m \neq 0)$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2 = m);m: Number;Negation(m=0)
process: 当m>0时,则y^{2}-x^{2}=m,得\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{m}=1'所以a^{2}=b^{2}=m所以a=b=\sqrt{m}c=\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=\sqrt{2m},所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2},当m<0时,\frac{x^{2}}{m-\frac{y^{2}}{m}}=1所以a^{2}=b^{2}=-m^{m},所以离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{2},综上,双曲线的离心率为,,数答安为:,,

text: 若直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点$F$，且与抛物线交于不同的两点$A$、$B$，其中点$A(2, y_{0})$，且$|A F|=4$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Negation(A=B);y0: Number;Coordinate(A) = (2, y0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4
process: 根据抛物线的定义,可得结果.根据题意:抛物线y^{2}=2px的准线方程为x=-\frac{p}{2}由抛物线上的点A(2,y_{0}),所以|AF|=2-(-\frac{p}{2})=2+\frac{p}{2},又|AF|=4.所以2+\frac{p}{2}=4,则p=4

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^2}{2}-y^{2}=1$有相同渐近线，且过$(2,0)$的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);Z: Hyperbola;Asymptote(Z) = Asymptote(G);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(H, Z)
process: 设与双曲线\frac{x2}{2}-y2=1有相同渐近线的双曲线方程为:\frac{x2}{2}-y2=m(m\neq0)又双曲线过(2,0)\thereforem=2\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y2}{2}=1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是双曲线上的一点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$ , $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$2 a b$，则双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 2*(a*b);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} x$，则双曲线的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x*(sqrt(3)/2)))
process: 试题分析:由题意得,因为双曲线\frac{x2}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}x'所以\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{m}}{2},解得m=3,所以c=\sqrt{4+m}=\sqrt{7},所以双曲线的交点坐标为(\pm\sqrt{7},0)

process: 可Dx,y),可求得\overrightarrow{OP}上^{^{2}}又量积的坐标公式结合椭圆的方程即可求得其解:\because点P为椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1上的任意一点,设P(x,y)(-2\leqslantx\leqslant2,-\sqrt{3}\leqslanty\leqslant\sqrt{3})依题意得左焦点F(-1,0),\therefore\overrightarrow{OP}=(x,y),\overrightarrow{FP}=(x+1,y),\therefore\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}=x(x+1)+y^{2}=x^{2}+x+\frac{12--}{4}=\frac{1}{4}x^{2}+x+3=(\frac{1}{2}x+1)^{2}+2-2\leqslantx\leqslant2,\therefore0\leqslant\frac{1}{2}x+1\leqslant2,\therefore0\leqslant(\frac{1}{2}x+1)^{2}\leqslant4,\therefore2\leqslant(\frac{1}{2}x+1)^{2}+2\leqslant6即2\leqslant\overrightarrow{OP}\cdot\overrightarrow{FP}\leqslant6.

process: 利用椭圆的定义可以得出PF_{1}+PF_{2}=2a=8,F_{1}F_{2}=2c=2\sqrt{7},利用余弦定理可计算PF_{1}\cdotPF_{2}的值,再利用三角形面积公式即可求解.由椭圆的方程可得:a=4,b=3,c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}=\sqrt{7}在\DeltaF_{1}PF_{2}中,PF_{1}+PF_{2}=2a=8,F_{1}F_{2}=2c=2\sqrt{7}在\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}中,由余弦定理可得:F_{1}F_{2}2=PF_{1}2+PF_{2}2-2PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}\times\cos60^{\circ}即4c^{2}=(PF_{1}+PF_{2})^{2}-3PF_{1}\timesPF_{2},可得28=64-3PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}解得:PF_{1}\timesPF_{2}=12,由三角形面积公式可得\triangleF_{1}PF_{2}的面积为\frac{1}{2}\timesPF_{1}\timesPF_{2}\sin60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}\times12\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=3\sqrt{3}

process: 利用渐近线与圆相切求得\frac{b}{a}的值,求出圆C的圆心坐标可得出\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}的值,由此可得出关于a、b的方程组,解出这两个量的值,即可得出双曲线的方程.圆C的标准方程为(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=4,圆心C(4,0),半径长为2.双曲线\frac{x2}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{b}{a}x'由于双曲线的两条渐近线与圆C相切,则\frac{4b}{(b)^{2}}=2,解得\frac{b}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}又\because双曲线的右焦点为圆C的圆心,则\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}=4,则有\begin{cases}b=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\\\sqrt{a2+b^{2}}=4\end{cases}解得\begin{cases}b=2\\a=2\sqrt{3}\end{cases}因此,双曲线的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1.

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$作直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$P$，则$\frac{|A B|}{|P F|}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), xAxis) = P
process: 由题知抛物线的焦点为(2,0),且所作直线存在斜率,可设方程为y-0=k(x-2),即kx-y-2k=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1},B(x_{2},y_{2}),将直线与抛物线联立,消去y可得k^{2}x^{2}-(4k^{2}+8)x+4k^{2}=0,则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{4k^{2}+8}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=4.进一步得y_{1}+y_{2}=\frac{8}{k},得AB中点坐标(\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},\frac{4}{k}),线段AB的中垂线方程为y-\frac{4}{k}=-\frac{1}{k}(x-\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}}),令y=0,得P点横坐标x_{p}=4+\frac{2k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},所以PF=x_{p}-2=\frac{4k^{2}+4}{k^{2}},利用焦点弦公式可得AB=\frac{8(1+k^{2})}{k^{2}}.故\frac{|AB|}{|PF|}=2.故本题填2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上存在点$P$使得$P$到左焦点的距离等于$P$到右准线的距离的$6$倍，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = 6*Distance(P, RightDirectrix(G))

text: 若一个圆的圆心是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，且被直线$y=x+3$截得的弦长为$2$，则该圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;I: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Expression(I) = (y = x + 3);Center(H)=Focus(G);Length(InterceptChord(I,H))=2
process: 根据抛物线的焦点,可求得圆心坐标,根据弦长为2,结合弦长公式,可求得r_{2},代入方程,即可得答案.因为x^{2}=4y的焦点为(0,1)所以所求圆的圆心为(0,1),设该圆半径为r则圆心(0,1)到直线x-y+3=0的距离d=\frac{|0-1+3|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}=\sqrt{2}所以弦长2=2\sqrt{r^{2}-d^{2}}=2\sqrt{r2-2},解得r^{2}=3,故该圆的标准方程为:x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=3

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{t}+y^{2}=1(t>1)$的一焦点与短轴两端点形成的三角形的面积为$1$，则$t$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;t: Number;t>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/t = 1);F:Point;A:Point;B:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Endpoint(MinorAxis(G))={A,B};Area(TriangleOf(F,A,B))=1
process: \because椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{t}+y^{2}=1(t>1),\therefore其焦点在x轴,其短半轴b=1,设半焦距为c,一焦点与短轴两端点形成的三角形的面积为1又\frac{1}{2}\times2b\timesc=1,而b=1,\thereforec=1,\thereforet=b^{2}+c^{2}=1+1=2,

text: 直线$y=x+1$被椭圆$x^{2}+2 y^{2}=4$所截得的弦的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 2*y^2 = 4);Expression(H) = (y = x + 1)
process: 试题分析:试题分析:联立\begin{cases}y=x+1\\x^{2}+2y^{2}=4\end{cases},得x^{2}+2(x+1)^{2}-4=0,即3x^{2}+4x-2=0,则弦的中点的横坐标为-\frac{2}{3},纵坐标为-\frac{2}{3}+1=\frac{1}{3},即(-\frac{2}{3},\frac{1}{3});故填(-\frac{2}{3},\frac{1}{3})

text: 已知直线$l$过抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点$F$，交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，交$C$的准线于点$M$. 若$\overrightarrow{A F}=\overrightarrow{F M}$，则$\frac {p}{|B F|}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Intersection(l,Directrix(C))= M;VectorOf(A, F) = VectorOf(F, M)
process: 如图,过A作抛物线准线的垂线AD,由\overrightarrow{AF}=\overrightarrow{FM},得|AD|=|AF|=|FM|,则直线l的倾斜角为\frac{5\pi}{6},设直线l的方程为y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x+\frac{p}{2}设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})联立\begin{cases}y=-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}x+\frac{p}{2},\\x2=2pv\end{cases}得12y^{2}-20py+3p^{2}=0\textcircled{1}.解得'_{1}=\frac{3}{2}p'\therefore|BF|+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{p}{6}+\frac{p}{2}=\frac{2}{3}p,\therefore\frac{p}{|BF|}=\frac{3}{2},

text: 已知倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线过曲线$C$: $y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$，且与$C$相交于不同的两点$A$、$B$($A$在第一象限)，则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;C: Curve;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Negation(A = B);Focus(C) = F

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，以$O F$为直径的圆交双曲线的一条渐近线于异于原点的$A$，若点$A$与$O F$中点的连线与$O F$垂直，则双曲线的离心率$e$为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;O: Origin;F: Point;A:Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(O,F),H);Intersection(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),H)=A;Negation(A=O);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O,F))),LineSegmentOf(O,F));Eccentricity(G) = e
process: 因为点A与OF中点的连线与OF垂直,故得到三角形OAF是等腰直角三角形,故底角AOF为45度.故a=b,离心率为\sqrt{2}.

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，已知点$A$ , $B$为抛物线上的两个动点，且满足$\angle A F B=60^{\circ}$. 过弦$AB$的中点$M$作拋物线准线的垂线$MN$，垂足为$N$，则$\frac{|M N|}{|A B|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);AngleOf(A, F, B) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M;PointOnCurve(M,LineSegmentOf(M,N));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Directrix(G));FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Directrix(G))=N
process: 设|AF|=a,|BF|=b,由抛物线定义,得AF|=|AQ|,|BF|=|BP|在梯形ABPQ中,\therefore2|MN|=|AQ|+|BP|=a+b.由余弦定理得,|AB|^{2}=a^{2}+b^{2}\cdot2ab\cos60^{\circ}=a^{2}+b^{2}\cdotab配方得,|AB|^{2}=(a+b)^{2}\cdot3ab,又\becauseab\leqslant(\frac{a+b}{2})^{2},\therefore(a+b)^{2}\cdot3ab\geqslant(a+b)^{2}\cdot\frac{3}{4}(a+b)^{2}=\frac{1}{4}(a+b)2得到|AB|\geqslant\frac{1}{2}(a+b)\therefore\frac{|MN|}{|AB|}\leqslant1,即\frac{|MN|}{|AB|}的最大值为1.

text: 焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线$C$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有共同的渐近线，且$C$的焦点到一条渐近线的距离为$3 \sqrt{2}$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), xAxis);Z: Hyperbola;Expression(Z) = (x^2/4-y^2/9=1);Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(Z);Distance(Focus(C), OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = 3*sqrt(2)
process: 【分析1由共渐近线的双曲线系方程可设C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=\lambda(\lambda>0),根据焦点到渐近线距离为b可构造方程求得\lambda,由此可得双曲线方程.由题意可设双曲线C的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=\lambda(\lambda>0),即\frac{x^{2}}{4\lambda}-\frac{y^{2}}{9\lambda}=1;则a^{2}=4\lambda,b^{2}=9\lambda.\because双曲线焦点到渐近线距离为b,\therefore3\sqrt{2}=\sqrt{9},解得:\lambda=2,\therefore双曲线C的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{8}-\frac{y^{2}}{18}=1

text: 若点$(3,1)$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的一条弦的中点，且这条弦所在直线的斜率为$2$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: LineSegment;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(Z) = (3, 1);Z: Point;MidPoint(H) = Z;IsChordOf(H,G);Slope(OverlappingLine(H))=2
process: 试题分析:过点(3,1)且斜率为2的直线方程为y=2x-5,代入抛物线y^{2}=2px,可得(2x-5)^{2}=2px^{2},即4x^{2}-(20+2p)x+25=0\cdot\frac{20+2p}{4}=6,\thereforep=2,

fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;C2: Hyperbola;H: Point;Expression(C1) = (x^2/4 - y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 4);Asymptote(C1)=Asymptote(C2);PointOnCurve(H,C2)
process: 设双曲线C_{2}的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=\lambda,由题得\frac{2}{4}-\frac{4^{2}}{8}=\lambda,\therefore\lambda=1-2=-1所以双曲线C_{2}的方程为:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=-1,即:\frac{y^{2}}{8}-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1.

text: 点$Q$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$上，则点$Q$到直线$3 x-2 y-16=0$的距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/7 = 1);Expression(H) = (3*x - 2*y - 16 = 0);PointOnCurve(Q, G)
process: 设椭圆的参数方程为\begin{cases}x=2\\v=\end{cases}\frac{6\cos\theta-2\sqrt{7}\sin\theta-1}{\sqrt{13}}=\frac{\sqrt[0]{si}(\theta为参数)}{|2\sqrt{7}\sin\theta-6\cos\theta+16|}=\frac{|8si(\theta-\varphi)+16|}{\sqrt{13}}(其中\tan\varphi=\frac{3}{\sqrt{7}})当\sin(\theta-\varphi)=1时,d_{\max}=\frac{24}{13}=\frac{24\sqrt{13}}{13}.

text: 已知圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=4$, 则过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点的直线与已知圆相交的最短弦长等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 4);C:Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),C)
process: 抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点是(1,0),准线方程x=1\because(1-2)^{2}+0^{2}=1<4,\therefore焦点在圆内.过抛物线y^{2}=4x的焦点的直线与已知圆相交,弦长最短,圆心到直线的距离最大此时直线方程为x=1,圆心到直线的距离为1,所以最短弦长等于2\sqrt{4-1}=2\sqrt{3}

text: 设双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-x^{2}=1(a>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)
process: 双曲线\frac{y2}{a^{2}}-x^{2}=1(a>0)的一条渐近线的倾斜角为30^{\circ},所以a=\tan30^{0}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3},e=\frac{\sqrt[2]{3}}{\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}}=2

fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (3, 1);Coordinate(N) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(P) = (x, y);x: Number;y: Number;sqrt(y^2 + (x - 5)^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + 5)^2) = 20

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线右支上一点，点$Q$的坐标为$(-2,3)$，则$|P Q|+|P F_{1}|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(Q) = (-2, 3);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G))
process: 试题分析:由双曲线定义可知|PF_{1}|=|PF_{2}|+2,故PQ|+|PF|=|PQ_{1}|+|PF_{2}|+2,可知当Q,P,F_{2}三点共线时,|PQ|+|PF|最小,且最小值为|QF_{2}|+2=5+2=7.

text: 定长为$2$的线段$A B$的两个端点在抛物线$C$: $y=x^{2}$上运动，点$M$为线段$A B$的中点，则点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;P1: Point;P2: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (y = x^2);Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = {P1, P2};PointOnCurve(P1, C);PointOnCurve(P2, C);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 3 x$，它的一个焦点是$(\sqrt{10}, 0)$，则双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3*x));Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (sqrt(10), 0)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>\sqrt{2})$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过左焦点$F_{1}$作斜率为$-2$的直线与椭圆交于$A$ , $B$两点，$P$是$AB$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，若直线$OP$的斜率为$\frac{1}{4}$，则$a$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>sqrt(2);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, H) = True;Slope(H) = -2;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;P: Point;O: Origin;Slope(LineOf(O, P)) = 1/4
process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{a2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>\sqrt{2}),所以焦点在x轴上因为过左焦点F_{1}作的直线斜率为-2,P是AB的中点,设P(x_{0},y_{0}),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2})将A、B坐标代入椭圆方程,可得\begin{cases}\frac{x_{1}2}{a_{2}}+\frac{y_{1}}{2}=1\\\frac{x_{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{2}}{2}=1\end{cases},两式相减,化简得-\frac{2(x_{1}+x_{2})}{a^{2}(y_{1}+y_{2})}=\frac{y_{1}-y_{2}}{x_{1}-x_{2}},即-\frac{2x_{0}}{a^{2}y_{0}}=k进一步化简得-\frac{2}{a^{2}}=k\times\frac{y_{0}}{x_{0}},代入-\frac{2}{a^{2}}=-2\times\frac{1}{4}解得a=2睛】本题考查了直线与椭圆的位置关系,点差法在解决弦中点问题的应用,属于中档题

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+1}=1$表示双曲线，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m:Number;Expression(G)=(x^2/(m + 2) - y^2/(m + 1) = 1)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$，点$P$为抛物线$C$的准线上的任意一点，过点$P$作抛物线$C$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，则点$M(0,1)$到直线$A B$的距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;B: Point;A: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(C));L1:Line;L2:Line;TangentOfPoint(P, C) = {L1,L2};TangentPoint(L1,C)=A;TangentPoint(L2,C)=B
process: 设P(-1,m),A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}).由题意知在点A处切线的斜率不子在且不为0设在点A处切线的斜率为k,则切线方程为y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1}).所以\begin{cases}y-y_{1}=k(x-x_{1})\\v2=4x\end{cases},整理得y2-\frac{4}{k}y+\frac{4y}{k}-4x_{1}=0,由A=0,解得k=\frac{2}{y},所以在点A处的切线方程为2x-y_{1}y+2x_{1}=0同理可得在点B处的切线方程为2x-y_{2}y+2x_{2}=0.又都过点P所以-2-my_{1}+2x_{1}=0,-2-my_{2}-2x_{2}=0所以直线AB的方程为:-2-my+2x=0,即2x-my-2=0,直线AB恒过定点(1,0),所以点M(0,1)直线AB的距离的最大值为点M(0,1)到定点(1,0)的距离,即为\sqrt{2}

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，经过其准线与$y$轴的交点$Q$的直线与抛物线切于点$P$，则$\triangle F P Q$外接圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G), yAxis) = Q;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, L) = True;L: Line;TangentPoint(L, G) = P;P: Point
process: 试题分析:由题意知F(0,1),设P(x_{0},\frac{1}{4}x_{0}),由y'=\frac{1}{2}x,则切线方程为y-\frac{1}{4}x_{0}2=\frac{1}{2}x_{0}(x-x_{0}),代入(0,-1)得x_{0}=\pm2,则P(2,1),(-2,1),可得PF\botFQ,则\triangleFPQ外接圆以PQ为直径则(x-1)^{2}+y2=2或(x+1)^{2}+y2=2\cdot故本题答案填(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=2或(x+1)^{2}+y2=2

text: 设直线$l$过双曲线$C$的一个焦点，且与$C$的一条对称轴垂直，$l$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|$为$C$的实轴长的$2$倍，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(C)),l);IsPerpendicular(l,OneOf(SymmetryAxis(C)));Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=2*Length(RealAxis(C))
process: 不妨设双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,焦点F(-c,0),对称轴y=0,由题设知\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,x=c\Rightarrowy=\pm\frac{b^{2}}{a}因为|AB|的长为实轴的二倍,\therefore\frac{2b^{2}}{a}=4a,b^{2}=2a^{2}c^{2}-a^{2}=2a^{2},c^{2}=3a^{2}\thereforee=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3},

text: 经过$M(-4,3)$, $N(\frac{4 \sqrt{3}}{3},-1)$两点的双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-4, 3);Coordinate(N) = ((4*sqrt(3))/3, -1);G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(M,G) = True;PointOnCurve(N,G) = True
process: 设双曲线的标准方程将点坐标代入求参数,即可确定标准方程(详解)令\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则\begin{cases}\frac{16}{a^{2}}-\frac{9}{b^{2}}=1\\\frac{16}{3a^{2}}-\frac{1}{b^{2}}=1\end{cases},可得\begin{cases}a^{2}=4\\b^{2}=3\end{cases}令\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,则\begin{cases}\frac{9}{a^{2}}-\frac{16}{b^{2}}=1\\\frac{1}{a^{2}}-\frac{16}{212}=1\end{cases}无解.故双曲线的标准方程是\frac{x^{3}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/81 + y^2/25 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 由椭圆的标准方程可知:a=9,由椭圆的定义可知:|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=18,而|PF_{1}|=2|PF_{2}|.所以解得|PF_{2}|=6,因此|PF|=2\times6=12.

process: \because抛物线y^{2}=20x,\thereforep=10,则焦点到准线的距离为10.

text: 已知双曲线$2 m x^{2}-m y^{2}=2$的一个顶点是$(0,1)$，则$m$的值是?

process: 由题可判断焦点在y轴上,且-\frac{2}{m}=1,可求出.[详解]双曲线2mx^{2}-my^{2}=2化为\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1,\because一个顶点是(0,1),故焦点在y轴上,且a=1\thereforem<0,且-\frac{2}{m}=1,解得m=-2

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点为$F$、$P$为双曲线$C$右支上的动点，$A(0,4)$，则$\triangle P A F$周长的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 4);LeftFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C))
process: 试题分析:求出右焦点H的坐标,由双曲线的定义可得|PF|+|PA|=2a+|PH|+|PA|\geqslant2a+|AH|,求得2a+|AH|的值,即可求出\trianglePAF周长的最小值.\becauseF是双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1的左焦点,\thereforea=2,b=\sqrt{5}c=3,F(-3,0)右焦点为H(3,0)由双曲线的定义可得|PF|+|PA|=2a+|PH|+|PA|\geqslant2a+|AH|=4+\sqrt{(3-0)^{2}+(0-4)^{2}}=4+5=9\because|AF|=\sqrt{(-3-0)^{2}+(0-4)^{2}}=5\therefore\trianglePAF周长的最小值为14

text: 双曲线$8 k x^{2}-ky^{2}=8$的一个焦点为$(0 , 3)$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;Expression(G) = (8*k*x^2 - k*y^2 = 8);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0, 3)
process: 试题分析:先把双曲线8kx^{2}-ky^{2}=8的方程化为标准形式,焦点坐标得到c^{2}=9,利用双曲线的标准方程中a,b,c的关系即得双曲线方程中的k的值.解:根据题意可知双曲线8kx^{2}-ky^{2}=8在y轴上,即\frac{y^{2}}{\frac{8}{k}}-\frac{x^{2}}{-\frac{1}{k}}\therefore焦点坐标为(0,3),c^{2}=9\frac{8}{k}-\frac{1}{k}=9,\thereforek=-1,

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=a x$的焦点与双曲线的右焦点重合，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;a: Number;Expression(H) = (y^2 = a*x);Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)
process: 试题分析:因为抛物线y^{2}=ax的焦点为(\frac{a}{4},0),所以\frac{a}{4}=2,a=8

text: 已知点$F(c , 0)$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点，点$B$为双曲线虚轴的一个端点，直线$B F$与双曲线的一条渐近线垂直，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);RightFocus(C) = F;OneOf(Endpoint(ImageinaryAxis(C))) = B;IsPerpendicular(LineOf(B, F), OneOf(Asymptote(C)))
process: 由对称性知,选取双曲线C的一条渐近线方程为y=\frac{b}{a}x相应直线BF方程为\frac{x}{c}+\frac{y}{b}=1,知k_{BF}=-\frac{b}{c}从而\frac{b}{a}.(-\frac{b}{c})=-1,即ac=b^{2},则ac=c^{2}-a^{2},两边同时除以a^{2},得e^{2}-e-1=0.因为e>1所以双曲线的离心率e=\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离是?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1)
process: 试题分析:已知抛物线的焦点为F(1,0),双曲线的渐近线方程为x\pm2y=0,所求距离为\frac{|1\pm0|}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的中心在原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为左、右焦点，$A$、$B$分别是椭圆的上顶点和右顶点，$P$是椭圆上一点，且$P F_{1} \perp x$轴，$P F_{2} / / A B$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;B: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), xAxis);IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(P, F2), LineSegmentOf(A, B))
process: 如图所示,把x=-c代入椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)可得P(-c,\frac{b^{2}}{a})又A(0,b),B(a,0),F_{2}(c,0),\thereforek_{AB}=-\frac{b}{2ac}\becausePF_{2}/\!/AB,\therefore-\frac{b}{a}=-\frac{b^{2}}{2ac},化简得b=2c\cdot4c^{2}=b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2},即a^{2}=5c^{2},\thereforee=\sqrt{\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k+2}-\frac{y^{2}}{k+1}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 2) - y^2/(k + 1) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)

text: 以点$A(0,5)$为圆心、双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的渐近线为切线的圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 5);Center(H)=A;IsTangent(Asymptote(G),H)
process: 双曲线的渐近线方程为:y=\pm\frac{3}{4}x.点A到双曲线的渐近线的距离d=\frac{|0-5|}{\sqrt{1+(\frac{3}{4})^{2}}}=4所以圆的半径为4.故所求圆的标准方程为x^{2}+(y-5)^{2}=16

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的点$P$到一个焦点的距离为$3$，则$P$到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;Distance(P, F1) = 3;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F2;Negation(F1 = F2)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=12 x$与点$M(-3 , 4)$，过$C$的焦点且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$ , $B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{M A}\cdot\overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 12*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 4);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), L);Slope(L) = k;k: Number;L: Line;Intersection(L, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0
process: 试题分析:由已知可求过A,B两点的直线方程为y=k(x\cdot3),然后联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=12x\\y=k(x-3)\end{cases},可得,k^{2}x^{2}-2(6+3k^{2})x+9k^{2}=0,可表示x_{1}+x_{2},x_{1}x_{2},y_{1}+y_{2},y_{1}y_{2},由\overrightarrow{MA}\cdot\overrightarrow{MB}=0,代入整理可求k.解:\because抛物线C:y^{2}=12x的焦点F(3,0),\therefore过A,B两点的直线方程为y=k(x-3)联立\begin{cases}y^{2}=12x\\y=k(x-3)\end{cases},可得,k^{2}x^{2}\cdot2(6+3k^{2})x+9k^{2}=0,设A(x_{1},y_{1}),B(x_{2},y_{2}),则x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{12+6k^{2}}{k^{2}},x_{1}x_{2}=9\thereforey_{1}+y_{2}=k(x_{1}+x_{2}\cdot6)=\frac{12}{k},y_{1}y_{2}=k^{2}(x_{1}\cdot3)(x_{2}\cdot3)=k^{2}[x_{1}x_{2}\cdot3(x_{1}+x_{2})+9]=\cdot36,\becauseM(3,4),\therefore\overrightarrow{MA}=(x_{1}+3,y_{1}-4),\overrightarrow{m}=(x_{2}+3,y_{2}-4)\because\overrightarrow{MA}\cdot\overrightarrow{MB}=0,(x_{1}+3)(x_{2}+3)+(y_{1}\cdot4)(y_{2}-4)=0整理可得,x_{1}x_{2}+3(x_{1}+x_{2})+y_{1}y_{2}-4(y_{1}+y_{2})+25=0,\therefore9+3\times\frac{12+6k^{2}}{2}-36\cdot4\times\frac{12}{k}+25=0,\thereforek=\frac{3}{2}.

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$, $P$是两条曲线的一个交点，则$PF_{1} \cdot PF_{2}$的值是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;n: Number;m > n;n > 0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = {F1, F2};F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$是双曲线右支上一点，满足$(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$  ($O$为坐标原点），且$3|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|=4|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));O: Origin;DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, P)),VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;3*Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 4*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))
process: 试题分析:由于点P在双曲线的右支上,则由双曲线的定义可得PF_{1}-|PF_{2}|=2a|PF_{1}|=\frac{4}{3}|PF_{2}|,\therefore|PF_{1}|=8a,|PF_{2}|=6a,\because(\overrightarrow{OP}+\overrightarrow{OF_{2}})\cdot\overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0,\therefore(\overrightarrow{OP}+\overrightarrow{OF_{2}})\cdot(\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}-\overrightarrow{OP})=0,\therefore\overrightarrow{OP}^{2}=\overrightarrow{OF_{2}}^{2}则APF_{1}F_{2}中,|OP|=|OF_{2}|=|OF|,则\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}由勾股定理得PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}^{2}=|F_{1}F_{2}^{2},即有64a^{2}+36a^{2}=4c^{2},\thereforec=5a,\thereforee=5

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=4$与$y$轴的交点为$P$，与抛物线$C$的交点为$Q$，且$|Q F|=2|P Q|$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;Q: Point;F: Point;P: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(G) = (y = 4);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(G, yAxis) = P;Intersection(G,C)=Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q))
process: 易知抛物线C的焦点为F(\frac{p}{2},0),联立\begin{cases}y=4\\y2=2px\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}x=\frac{8}{p}\\y=4\end{cases},即点Q(\frac{8}{p},4)由|QF|=2|PQ|可得\frac{8}{p}+\frac{p}{2}=2\times\frac{8}{p},\becausep>0,解得p=4.因此,抛物线C的方程为y^{2}=8x.

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=m x(m>0)$的焦点$F$作斜率为$2 \sqrt{2}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，以$A B$为直径的圆与准线$l$有公共点$M$，若$|M F|=\sqrt{2}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = m*x);m: Number;m>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F, Z);Slope(Z) = 2*sqrt(2);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(Z, G) = {A, B};H: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), H);l: Line;Directrix(G) = l;M: Point;Intersection(H, l) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = sqrt(2)
process: 解:不妨设A在x轴上方,根据抛物线的性质可得,以AB为直径的圆与准线l有公共点M,\thereforeMA\botMB,取AB中点C,连结MC,根据抛物线性质,\thereforeMC平行于x轴,且MF\botAB,\therefore|MF|^{2}=|AF|\cdot|BF|,\because直线AB过抛物线y^{2}=mx(m>0)的焦点F且斜率为2\sqrt{2},根据抛物线的定义和直角梯形的性质可得|AF|=2|BF|,\because|MF|=\sqrt{2},\therefore(\sqrt{2})^{2}=2|BF|^{2},\therefore|BF|=1,|AF|=2,\therefore|AB|=3,

text: 已知$A(2,0)$, $B(0,1)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的两个顶点，直线$y=k x(k>0)$与直线$A B$相交于点$D$，与椭圆相交于$E$、$F$两点，若$\overrightarrow{E D}=6 \overrightarrow{D F}$，则斜率$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (0, 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;In(A, Vertex(G));H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);k: Number;k>0;Intersection(H, LineOf(A, B)) = D;D: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {E, F};E: Point;F: Point;VectorOf(E, D) = 6*VectorOf(D, F);Slope(H) = k;In(B, Vertex(G))
process: 由题可知,该椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1,直线AB,EF的方程分别为x+2y=2,y=kx设D(x_{0},y_{0}),E(x_{1},kx_{1}),F(x_{2},kx_{2}),其中x_{1}<x_{2}.联立方程\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1\\y=kx\end{cases}\Rightarrow(1+4k^{2})x^{2}=4,故x_{2}=-x_{1}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{1+4k^{2}}}由\overrightarrow{ED}=6\overrightarrow{DF},知x_{0}-x_{1}=6(x_{2}-x_{0}),x_{0}=\frac{1}{7}(6x_{2}+x_{1})=\frac{5}{7}x_{2}=7.11.412由点D在直线AB上,则x_{0}+2kx_{0}=2\Rightarrowx_{0}=\frac{2}{1+2k},所以\frac{2}{1+2k}=\frac{10}{7\sqrt{1+4k^{2}}}\Rightarrow24k^{2}-25k+6=0\Rightarrowk=\frac{2}{3}或\frac{3}{8}

text: 点$M(5,3)$到抛物线$y=a x^{2}(a \neq 0)$的准线的距离为$6$，那么抛物线的方程是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左顶点为$M$，右焦点为$F$，过左顶点且斜率为$1$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$的右支交于点$N$, 若$\Delta M N F$的面积为$\frac{3}{2} b^{2}$, 则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

process: 由题,双曲线的左顶点M(-a,0),则直线l:y=x+a,与书安心方程联立\begin{cases}\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1\\y=x+a\end{cases},解得N(\frac{a2+ab^{2}}{b^{2}-a^{2}},\frac{2ab^{2}}{b^{2}-a^{2}}),则AMNF的面积为\frac{1}{2}\cdot(a+c)\cdot\frac{b^{2}-a^{2}}{b^{2}-a^{2}}=\frac{3}{2}b^{2},\therefore2(a^{2}+ac)=3(c^{2}-2a^{2}),\therefore2(1+e)=3(e^{2}-2)即3e^{2}-2e-8=0,\thereforee=2即答案为2.

text: 已知三角形$A B C$的周长是$8$，顶点$B$、$C$的坐标分别为$(-1,0)$ ,$(1 , 0)$，则顶点$A$的轨迹方程为?

process: 利用三角形周长得|AB|+|AC|=8-2=6>2,结合椭圆定义,即可求得顶点A的轨迹方程[详解]设A(x,y),|BC|=2,所以|AB|+|AC|=8-2=6>2,即点A是以顶点B,C为焦点的椭圆,2a=6,2c=2.则b^{2}=a^{2}-c^{2}=8,所以椭圆方程\frac{x^{2}}{0}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1,因为三点A,B,C不能共线,所以y\neq0,则顶点A的轨迹方程为\frac{x^{2}}{0}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(y\neq0).

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{2}$与双曲线的一条渐近线平行的直线交双曲线于点$P$，若$|P F_{1}|=3|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);IsParallel(H, OneOf(Asymptote(G)));H: Line;Intersection(H, G) = P;P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 解:设过F_{2}与双曲线的一条渐近线y=\frac{b}{a}x^{平}行的直线交双曲线于点P由双曲线的定义可得|PF_{1}|-|PF_{2}|=2a.由|PF_{1}|=3|PF_{2}|,可得|PF_{1}|=3a,|PF_{2}|=a,|F_{1}F_{2}|=2c由\tan\angleF_{1}F_{2}P=\frac{b}{a}可得^{\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}P=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+\frac{b^{2}}{a2}}}=\frac{a}{c}在三角形PF_{1}F_{2}中,由余弦定理可得:|PF_{1}|^{2}=|PF_{2}|+|F_{1}F_{2}|-2|PF_{2}|\cdot|F_{1}F_{2}|\cos\angleF_{1}F_{2}P即有9a^{2}=a^{2}+4c^{2}-2a\cdot2c\cdot\frac{a}{c}化简可得,c^{2}=3a^{2}则双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{3}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m+2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(-1<m<0)$上的点到两焦点距离之和为$\frac{8}{3}$，则该椭圆的短轴长为?

process: 根据椭圆定义,椭圆上的点到两焦点距离之和为2a,可得2a=\frac{8}{3},即2\sqrt{m+2}=\frac{8}{3},求出m的值,再根据b^{2}=-m,即可求出椭圆的短轴长.羊解]\because-1<m<0,\thereforem+2>-m,\therefore2a=2\sqrt{m+2}=\frac{8}{3},\thereforem=-\frac{2}{9},\thereforeb^{2}=-m=\frac{2}{9},2b=\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{3}.

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在双曲线$C$上，$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=15^{\circ}$. 若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$b^{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(15, degree);Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = b^2
process: 解:设\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=\theta,|PF_{1}|=n,|PF_{2}|=m由题意可得\frac{1}{2}mn\sin\theta=b^{2}.由双曲线的性质可知n-m=2a,则m^{2}-2mn+n^{2}=4a^{2}由余弦定理可得m^{2}+n^{2}-2mn\cos\theta=4c^{2},则2mn-2mn\cos\theta=4(c^{2}-a^{2})=4b^{2}从而2mn-2mn\cos\theta=2mn\sin\theta.即\sin\theta+\cos\theta=\sqrt{2}\sin(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4})=1,解得\theta=\frac{\pi}{2},即\angleF_{1}PF_{2}=90^{\circ}在Rt\trianglePF_{1}F_{2}中,n=|PF_{1}|=2c\cdot\cos15^{\circ},m=|PF_{2}|=2c\cdot\sin15^{\circ}n-m=2c\cdot\cos15^{\circ}-2c\cdot\sin15^{\circ}=2a所以e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{1}{\cos15^{\circ}-\sin15^{\circ}}=\sqrt{2}.

text: 一条线段的长等于$4$，两端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$轴和$y$轴上移动，若动点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{A P}=3 \overrightarrow{P B}$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程是?

process: 解:设P(x,y),A(a,0),B(0,b)则a^{2}+b^{2}=16'则\overrightarrow{AP}=(x-a,y),\overrightarrow{PB}=(-x,b-y)因为\overrightarrow{AP}=3\overrightarrow{PB},即(x-a,y)=(-3x,3b-3y)所以\begin{cases}x-a=-3x\\y=3b-3y\end{cases},解得\begin{cases}a=4x\\b=\frac{4}{3}y\end{cases}所以a^{2}+b^{2}=16x^{2}+\frac{16}{9}y^{2}=16,所以动点P的轨迹方程是x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1

text: 已知$O$是坐标原点，$F$是双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过$F$作$x$轴的垂线，垂线交该双曲线的一条渐近线于点$A$，在另一条渐近线上取一点$B$，使得$\overrightarrow{O A}=\lambda \overrightarrow{B F}(\lambda>0)$，若$\overrightarrow{A B} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

process: 设双曲线C的半焦距为c,且不妨设A(-c,\frac{bc}{a})由\overrightarrow{OA}=\lambda\overrightarrow{BF}(\lambda>0)知,OA//FB,所以直线FB的方程为y=-\frac{b}{a}(x+c)'由\begin{cases}y=-\frac{b}{a}(x+c)\\y=\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases},解得B(-\frac{c}{2},-\frac{bc}{2a})又\overrightarrow{AB}\cdot\overrightarrow{OB}=0,所以(-\frac{c}{2}-(-c),-\frac{bc}{2a}-\frac{bc}{a}).(-\frac{c}{2},-\frac{bc}{2a})=0,解得a^{2}=3b^{2},所以双曲线C的离心率e=\sqrt{\frac{a2+b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}

process: 椭圆\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1的右顶点为A(3,0),上顶点为B(0,2)所以过A,B,C三点的圆M的方程可设为x^{2}+y^{2}+Dx+Ey+F=0(D^{2}+E^{2}-4F>0)所以\begin{cases}9+3D+F=0,\\4+2E+F=0,\\29+2D+5E+F=0\end{cases}\Rightarrow\begin{cases}5+3D-2E=0,\\20-D+5E=0\end{cases}\RightarrowD=-5,E=-5,F=6所以圆M的方程为x^{2}+y^{2}-5x-5y+6=0.标准方程为(x-\frac{5}{2})^{2}+(y-\frac{5}{2})^{2}=\frac{13}{2}

text: 圆心在抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}(x<0)$上，并且和该抛物线的准线及$y$轴都相切的圆的标准方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的焦点重合，离心率互为倒数，设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$的左，右焦点，$P$为右支上任意一点，则$\frac{P F_{1}^{2}}{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);InterReciprocal(Eccentricity(C), Eccentricity(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C))
process: 求出椭圆的离心率和焦点,从而得双曲线的离心率,双曲线的实半轴长a,可得PF_{2}\geqslant1,由双曲线的定义得PF_{1}=PF_{2}+2,这样\frac{PF_{1}^{2}}{PF_{2}}就可表示为PF_{2}的函数,于是可利用基本不等式求得最小值设椭圆的长半轴长为a_{1},短半轴长为b_{1},半焦距为c,则c=\sqrt{a_{1}^{2}-b_{1}^{2}}=\sqrt{16-12}=2,故椭圆的离心率e_{1}=\frac{c}{a_{1}}=\frac{1}{2}从而双曲线的离心率e=\frac{c}{a}=\frac{2}{a}=2^{,}可得a=1,根据双曲线的定义有PF_{1}-PF_{2}=2a,即PF_{1}=PF_{2}+2,故\frac{PF_{1}^{2}}{PF_{2}}=\frac{(PF_{2}+2)^{2}}{PF_{2}}=\frac{PF_{2}^{2}+4PF_{2}+4}{PF_{2}}=PF_{2}+\frac{4}{PF_{2}}+4由双曲线的范围可得PF_{2}\geqslantc-a=1根据基本不等式可得PF_{2}+\frac{4}{PF_{2}}+4\geqslant2\sqrt{PF_{2}\times\frac{4}{PF_{2}}}+4=8,当且仅当PF_{2}=\frac{4}{PF_{2}}即PF_{2}=2时取“=”所以\frac{PF_{1}^{2}}{PF_{2}}的最小值为8.

text: 已知抛物线$C_{1}$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$与双曲线$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点重合，若点$F$到双曲线$C_{2}$的一条渐近线的距离为$1$，则$C_{1}$的焦点$F$到其准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C1:Parabola;C2:Hyperbola;Expression(C1) = (y^2=2*p*x);p:Number;p>0;Expression(C2) = (x^2/3-y^2/b^2=1);F:Point;Focus(C1)=F;OneOf(Focus(C2))=F;Distance(F,OneOf(Asymptote(C2)))=1
process: 抛物线C_{1}:y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点与双曲线C_{2}:\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1的一个焦点重合则\frac{p}{2}=c,又c^{2}=3+b^{2}=\frac{p^{2}}{4},点F(c,0)到双曲线渐近线bx-\sqrt{3}y=0的距离为1,即\sqrt{3+b^{2}}=1,又c^{2}=3+b^{2},解得b=1,即c=2,所以p=2c=4,故抛物线的焦点到准线的距离p=4

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$在$C$的一条渐近线上，$O$为坐标原点，若$|P O|=|P F|$，则$\triangle P F O$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, O)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))
process: 双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1,-条渐近线方程为:y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}xOF=\sqrt{6}过点P作x轴垂线PM,|PO|=|PF|OM=\frac{1}{2}OF=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{6}PM=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\times\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\trianglePFO的面积为\frac{1}{2}\times\sqrt{6}\times\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{3\sqrt{2}}{4}

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$AB$的长为$8$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8
process: 设点A,B的坐标分别为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2}),过抛物线y^{2}=2px(p>0)的焦点F且倾斜角为45^{\circ}的直线方程为y=x-\frac{p}{2},把y=x-\frac{p}{2}代入y^{2}=2px,得x^{2}-3px+\frac{1}{4}p^{2}=0,\thereforex_{1}+x_{2}=3p,\because|AB|=x_{1}+x_{2}+p=4p=8,\thereforep=2.

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F(3,0)$，过点$F$的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点. 若$A B$的中点坐标为$(1 ,-1)$，则$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = (1, -1);Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);RightFocus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, E) = {A, B}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 过$F_{1}$且斜率为$\frac{a}{b}$的直线$l$与双曲线的右支交于点$P$，与其中一条渐近线交于点$M$，且有$\overrightarrow{P M}=3 \overrightarrow{M F_{1}}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1,l);Slope(l)=a/b;Intersection(l,RightPart(C))=P;Intersection(l,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=M;VectorOf(P, M) = 3*VectorOf(M, F1)
process: 设双曲线的左焦点为(-c,0),所以直线l的方程为:y=\frac{a}{b}(x+c),由直线l与其中一条渐近线交于点M,且有\overrightarrow{PM}=3\overrightarrow{MF_{1}},可知\begin{cases}y=\frac{a}{b}(x+c)\\y=-\frac{b}{a}x\end{cases},解方程可得\begin{cases}x=-\frac{a^{2}}{c}\\y=\frac{ab}{c}\end{cases},即M(-\frac{a2}{c},\frac{ab}{c})过点M、P分别作x轴垂线,垂足为A、B因为\overline{D}in=3\overrightarrow{MF}所以|AF_{1}|=\frac{1}{4}|BF_{1}|,|AM|=\frac{1}{4}|BP|.不妨设P(x_{0},\frac{4ab}{c}),则c-\frac{a^{2}}{c}=\frac{c+x_{0}}{4},解得x_{0}=3c-\frac{4a^{2}}{c}所以P(3c-\frac{4a^{2}}{c},\frac{4ab}{c}),将点P(3c-\frac{4a^{2}}{c},\frac{4ab}{c})代入\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)即\underline{(3c-\frac{4a^{2}}{a^{2}})^{2}}-\frac{(4ab}{b^{2}})^{2}=1(a>0,b>0)'整理可得9c^{2}=25a^{2},即9(a^{2}+b^{2})=25a^{2},解得\frac{b^{2}}{a2}=\frac{16}{9},\therefore\frac{b}{a}=\frac{4}{3},所以双曲线的渐近线方程为y=\pm\frac{4}{3}x

text: 若直线$y=k x+1(k \in R)$与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=2$有且仅有一个公共点，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 2);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(H, G)=1
process: 联立\begin{cases}y=kx+1\\x2-y2=2\end{cases},可得(1-k^{2})x^{2}-2kx-3=0\textcircled{1}当1-k^{2}=0时,可得k=\pm1,此时直线与双曲线的渐近线平行直线与双曲线有且只有一个交点,满足题意;\textcircled{2}当1-k^{2}\neq0时,由直线与双曲线有且只有一个公共点,可得\triangle=4k^{2}+12(1-k^{2})=0,解得_{k}=\pm\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2},满足条件综上可得:k=\pm1,\pm\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}.

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{k^{2}-3}=-1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/(k - 1) + y^2/(k^2 - 3) = -1);k:Number
process: 解:\because方程\frac{x2}{k-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{k^{2}-3}=-1表示椭圆,\therefore\begin{cases}3-k^{2}>0\\1-k>0\\1-k\neq3-k^{2}\end{cases}.\therefore-\sqrt{3}<k<1且k\neq-

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点为$F(2 \sqrt{5} , 0)$，且离心率为$e=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;e:Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F)=(2*sqrt(5),0);OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Eccentricity(G)=e;e=sqrt(5)/2
process: 双曲线\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的一个焦点为F(2\sqrt{5},0),所以c=2\sqrt{5},又因为双曲线C:\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)的离心率为\frac{c}{a}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}=\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{a},所以a=4,b=2;双曲线方程为\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1,

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点$F$，与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=16$，则$A B$的中点$D$到$x$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = (1/4)*x^2);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 16;D: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = D

text: 已知椭圆$m x^{2}+n y^{2}=1(m>0 , n>0)$与直线$x+y-1=0$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\frac{n}{m}=\sqrt{2}$，则过原点与线段$A B$的中点$M$的连线的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;n: Number;m: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;m>0;n>0;Expression(G) = (m*x^2 + n*y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + y - 1 = 0);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B};n/m = sqrt(2);O: Origin;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
process: 由直线x+y-1=0,可得y=x+1代入mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1得:(m+n)x^{2}-2nx+n-1=0,利用韦达定理,确定M的坐标,即可求出利用过原点与线段AB中点的直线的斜率.[详解]由直线x+y-1=0,可得y=x+1代入mx^{2}+ny^{2}=1得:(m+n)x^{2}-2nx+n-1=0设A、B的坐标为(x_{1},y_{1}),(x_{2},y_{2}),则有x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{2n}{m+n},y_{1}+y_{2}=1-x_{1}+1-x_{2}=2-(x_{1}+x_{2})=\frac{2m}{m+n}\thereforeM的坐标为:(\frac{n}{m+n},\frac{m}{m+n}),\therefore过原点与线段AB的中点M的连线的斜率为|\frac{m}{n}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}

text: 从抛物线 $y^2=4x$上一点$P$ 引其准线的垂线，垂足为$M$，设抛物线的焦点为 $F$，且$|P F|=5$，则$\triangle M P F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H);IsPerpendicular(H, Directrix(C)) = True;M: Point;FootPoint(H, Directrix(C)) = M;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5;Expression(C)=(y^2=4*x)

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上的一点，若点$P$到$x$轴的距离为$12$，则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, xAxis) = 12
process: 由P是抛物线y^{2}=16x上的一点,且它到x轴的距离为12,得点P的纵坐标为\pm12,代入y2=16x,得x=9.又点P到焦点的距离即为其到准线的距离,且y^{2}=16x的准线方程为x=-4,所以点P到焦点的距离为9+4=13.不睛】本题主要考查了抛物线的标准方程及抛物线的定义,属于中档题

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上运动，$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|| \overrightarrow{P F_{2} } |$的最大值为$m$, $\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为$n$，且$m \geq 2 n$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;m:Number;n:Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);Max(Abs(VectorOf(P,F1))*Abs(VectorOf(P,F2)))=m;Min(DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2))) = n;m >= 2*n

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{20}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在此椭圆上，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/20 + y^2/8 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2))
process: 由题意可知:a=2\sqrt{5},b=2\sqrt{2},c=2\sqrt{3}\because|PF_{1}|+|PF_{2}|=2a=4\sqrt{5},\therefore|PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}|^{2}+2|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=80-\textcircled{1}又\becausePF_{1}\botPF_{2},\therefore|PF_{1}^{2}+|PF_{2}|=|F_{1}F_{2}^{2}|=(2c)^{2}=(4\sqrt{3})^{2}=48联立\textcircled{1}\textcircled{2}解得|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=16,\thereforeS_{\DeltaPF_{1}F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}|PF_{1}||PF_{2}|=\frac{1}{2}\times16=8

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，若直线$y=k x$与其一个交点的横坐标为$b$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;k: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(2)/2;XCoordinate(OneOf(Intersection(H,G))) = b

text: 过抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$焦点$F$的直线交该抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|\overrightarrow{A F}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)
process: 分析:首先由抛物线方程可得p=\frac{1}{4},再利用抛物线的性质|\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=\frac{2}{p},结合条件即可得解详解:抛物线y=2x^{2}的焦点坐标为:F(0,\frac{1}{8})由抛物线的性质可知:\frac{1}{|AF|}+\frac{1}{|BF|}=\frac{2}{p}=8又\overrightarrow{AF}=2\overrightarrow{FB},所以|AF|=2|FB|,将|FB|=\frac{1}{2}|AF代入上式,可得|\overrightarrow{AF}|=\frac{3}{8}

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{n^{2}}=1(m>0, n>0)$的两个焦点，曲线上一点与$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$构成的三角形的周长是$16$，曲线上的点到$F_{1}$的最小距离为$2$，则$n$=?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;n: Number;m: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;m>0;n>0;Expression(G) = (y^2/n^2 + x^2/m^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);Perimeter(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2))=16;Min(Distance(P,F1))=2
process: 由题知曲线\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{n^{2}}=1(m>0,n>0)表示的是椭圆,且曲线上一点与F_{1},F_{2}构成的三角形的周长是16,所以2a+2c=16\Rightarrowa+c=8,因为曲线上的点到F_{1}的最小距离为2,所以a-c=2,有\begin{cases}a+c=8\\a-c=2\end{cases}\Rightarrowa=5,c因为a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}\Rightarrowb=4,由于不能确定椭圆焦点所在轴.所以n=4或n=5.

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=\lambda(\lambda>0)$右支上的一点$P$，经过点$P$的直线与双曲线$C$的两条渐近线分别相交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$A$、$B$分别位于第一、第四象限，$O$为坐标原点，当$\overrightarrow{A P}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{P B}$时，$\triangle A O B$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则$\lambda$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = lambda);lambda: Number;lambda>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));G: Line;PointOnCurve(P, G);L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(C) = {L1, L2};A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, L1) = A;Intersection(G, L2) = B;Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 4;O: Origin;VectorOf(A, P) = (1/2)*VectorOf(P, B);Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = sqrt(3)

text: 已知点$P(1,-1)$和抛物线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$，过抛物线$C$的焦点且斜率为$k$的直线与抛物线$C$分别交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}=0$，则$k$=?

text: 已知直线$l$过点$P(2 , 1)$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$P$为$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$,过$F_{1}$且垂直于长轴的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$A B F_{2}$内切圆的半径为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H:Line;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1,H);IsPerpendicular(H,MajorAxis(G));Intersection(H,G) = {A, B}
process: 根据题意,设\triangleABF_{2}内切圆的半径为r,三角形的周长为4a,进而求出三角形面积的表达式,重AF_{1},BF_{1},求出\triangleABF_{2}的面积,进而求出内切圆的半径.详解】根据题意,设\triangleABF_{2}内切圆的半径为r;椭圆的方程为\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1,三角形的周长为20,故S=\frac{1}{2}\times20\timesr=10r,过F1且垂直于长轴的直线交椭圆于A,B两点,则AB=2\sqrt{9(1-\frac{16}{25}})=\frac{18}{5},故S=\frac{1}{2}\times8\times\frac{18}{5}=\frac{72}{5},\therefore10r=\frac{72}{5},解得r=\frac{36}{25},所以内切圆的半径为\frac{36}{25}
